src: 威爾斯國會議員 (AM) 擔心「看起來像布偶」
mt: Member of Parliament for Wales (AM) is worried that "it looks like a doll."
ref: Welsh AMs worried about 'looking like muppets'

src: 一些議員對於將他們的稱號改為威爾斯國會成員 (Member of the Welsh Parliament, MWP) 這一建議感到驚愕。
mt: Some MPs were shocked by the proposal to change their title to the Member of the Welsh Parliament (MWP).
ref: There is consternation among some AMs at a suggestion their title should change to MWPs (Member of the Welsh Parliament).

src: 此建議源於將會議名稱改為威爾斯國會的這一計畫。
mt: This proposal originated from a plan to change the name of the conference to the Welsh National Assembly.
ref: It has arisen because of plans to change the name of the assembly to the Welsh Parliament.

src: 政治界的各個國會議員擔心這可能淪為笑柄。
mt: Members of parliament from the political world are worried that this may become a joke.
ref: AMs across the political spectrum are worried it could invite ridicule.

src: 一名工黨議員稱工黨黨員擔心「這個名稱與愚笨 (Twp) 和大便 (Pwp) 押韻。」
mt: A Labour MP said the party was worried that "this name rhymes with stupidity (Twp) and poop (Pwp)"
ref: One Labour AM said his group was concerned "it rhymes with Twp and Pwp."

src: 對於不是威爾斯人的讀者，我們特意在此附上解釋：在威爾斯語，「twp」指愚笨，而「pwp」是指大便。
mt: For non-Welsh readers, we specifically attach an explanation here: in Welsh, "twp" refers to stupidity, and "pwp" refers to feces.
ref: For readers outside of Wales: In Welsh twp means daft and pwp means poo.

src: 一名威爾斯黨議員稱威爾斯黨黨員整體對此「不滿」並提出其他建議。
mt: A Welsh Party member said that the Welsh party members are overall "dissatisfied" with this and put forward other suggestions.
ref: A Plaid AM said the group as a whole was "not happy" and has suggested alternatives.

src: 威爾斯保守黨員稱保守黨對是次改名持「開放態度」，但認為 MWP 的確很容易被讀成「布偶 (Muppet)」。
mt: A Welsh Conservative Party member said the Conservatives have an "open attitude" towards this change, but believes that MWPs are indeed easily read as "muppets".
ref: A Welsh Conservative said his group was "open minded" about the name change, but noted it was a short verbal hop from MWP to Muppet.

src: 尤其是威爾斯字母「w」的發音與約克郡口音英語中的字母「u」發音相似。
mt: Especially the pronunciation of the Welsh letter "w" is similar to that of the Yorkshire accent English letter "u".
ref: In this context The Welsh letter w is pronounced similarly to the Yorkshire English pronunciation of the letter u.

src: 國會委員會現正草擬落實改名的立案，表示：「毫無疑問地，國會成員任何名稱的最終決定將是關切到議員自身的一個問題。」
mt: The Congressional Committee is currently drafting a bill to change the name, saying: "There is no doubt that the final decision of any name of a member of Congress will be a matter of concern for the members themselves."
ref: The Assembly Commission, which is currently drafting legislation to introduce the name changes, said: "The final decision on any descriptors of what Assembly Members are called will of course be a matter for the members themselves."

src: 《2017 年威爾斯地方政府法案》予以威爾斯國會更改其名稱的權力。
mt: The Local Government of Wales Act 2017 gives the Welsh Assembly the power to change its name.
ref: The Government of Wales Act 2017 gave the Welsh assembly the power to change its name.

src: 在六月，委員會發布了公眾諮詢結果，相關結果顯示大眾普遍支持將國會成為「威爾斯國會 (Welsh Parliament)」的這一立案。
mt: In June, the committee released public consultation results, with related results showing widespread support for making Parliament a "Welsh Parliament" case.
ref: In June, the Commission published the results of a public consultation on the proposals which found broad support for calling the assembly a Welsh Parliament.

src: 至於國會議員的稱號，委員會傾向支持「威爾斯國會成員 (Welsh Parliament Members)」或「WMP」，但公眾資訊結果顯示大眾更支持「MWP」這一稱號。
mt: As for the title of Member of Parliament, the committee tends to support "Welsh Parliament Members" or "WMP", but public information shows that the public is more supportive of the title "MWP".
ref: On the matter of the AMs' title, the Commission favored Welsh Parliament Members or WMPs, but the MWP option received the most support in a public consultation.

src: 議員同時也提出其他替代稱號，但對投票官 Elin Jones 而言，達成共識可能是讓其無比頭疼的嚴重問題，因為她需要在數星期內提交有關改名的立法草案。
mt: Members also proposed other alternative titles, but for voting officer Elin Jones, reaching a consensus could be a serious issue that would cause her immense headaches because she needed to submit a legislative bill on the name change within weeks.
ref: AMs are apparently suggesting alternative options, but the struggle to reach consensus could be a headache for the Presiding Officer, Elin Jones, who is expected to submit draft legislation on the changes within weeks.

src: 是次改革的立法將包括有關議會運行的其他變動，其中包括取消議員資格的規條及委員會系統的設計。
mt: The legislation of this reform will include other changes related to the operation of the parliament, including rules for abolishing parliamentary qualifications and the design of the committee system.
ref: The legislation on the reforms will include other changes to the way the assembly works, including rules on disqualification of AMs and the design of the committee system.

src: 議員將在就立法進行辯論時，有機會對改名投下最後的決定票權。
mt: Members will have the opportunity to vote for a final decision on renaming during legislative debates.
ref: AMs will get the final vote on the question of what they should be called when they debate the legislation.

src: 馬其頓公民就更改國家名稱法案進行公投
mt: A referendum on the change of national name for Macedonian citizens
ref: Macedonians go to polls in referendum on changing country's name

src: 選民將在禮拜天進行投票，決定是否將他們的國家名稱改為「北馬其頓共和國」。
mt: Voters will vote on Sunday to decide whether to change their country name to "North Macedonia".
ref: Voters will vote Sunday on whether to change their country's name to the "Republic of North Macedonia."

src: 是次投票是為了解決與鄰國希臘已經持續了數十年的紛爭，因為希臘也有一個名為馬其頓的省份。
mt: This vote was to resolve the decades-long conflict with neighboring Greece, as Greece also had a province called Macedonia.
ref: The popular vote was set up in a bid to resolve a decades-long dispute with neighboring Greece, which has its own province called Macedonia.

src: 雅典長久以來一直堅持其北方鄰居的這一名稱代表對其領土的所有權，因此重覆表明反對馬其頓對歐盟 (EU) 和北大西洋公約組織 (NATO) 的加入申請。
mt: Athens has long insisted that its northern neighbor's name represents ownership of its territory, thus repeatedly expressing opposition to Macedonia's application to join the European Union (EU) and the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO).
ref: Athens has long insisted that its northern neighbor's name represents a claim on its territory and has repeatedly objected to its membership bids for the EU and NATO.

src: 馬其頓總統 Gjorge Ivanov 反對是次改名公投，表明他將棄票。
mt: Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov opposed this referendum, stating that he would abstain from voting.
ref: Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov, an opponent of the plebiscite on the name change, has said he will disregard the vote.

src: 但是，是次公投的支持者，其中包括總理 Zoran Zaev，認為改名為加入歐盟和北大西洋公約組織的小小代價。
mt: However, supporters of this referendum, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, consider it a small price to join the EU and NATO.
ref: However, supporters of the referendum, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, argue that the name change is simply the price to pay to join the EU and NATO.

src: 聖馬丁大教堂的鐘聲隨著哈林區的教堂沒落驟停
mt: The chimes of St. Martin's Cathedral came to a halt as the churches in Harlem fell.
ref: The Bells of St. Martin's Fall Silent as Churches in Harlem Struggle

src: 「在歷史上，一些老年人告訴我那裡幾乎每個街角都有一間酒吧和教堂，」Adams 先生說道。
mt: “In history, some of the older people told me that there was a bar and a church on almost every street corner,” Mr. Adams said.
ref: "Historically, the old people I've talked to say there was a bar and a church on every corner," Mr. Adams said.

src: 「到了今天，兩樣都沒有了。」
mt: "To this day, there's nothing left."
ref: "Today, there's neither."

src: 他認為酒吧的沒落情有可原。
mt: He thinks the decline of the bar has its roots.
ref: He said the disappearance of bars was understandable.

src: 「人們在現在用各種不同的方式進行社交，」他說。
mt: "People are socializing in a variety of ways now," he says.
ref: "People socialize in a different way" nowadays, he said.

src: 「酒吧不再是人們經常去的社區友誼廳。」
mt: “Bars are no longer community friendship halls that people go to regularly.”
ref: "Bars are no longer neighborhood living rooms where people go on a regular basis."

src: 至於教堂，他擔心銷售這些資產所賺取的金錢不會如政府所願可以支撐長久的運行，「很快地，他們會回到原點。」
mt: As for the church, he is worried that the money earned from selling these assets will not be able to support long-term operation as the government wishes, "and soon they will return to their roots."
ref: As for churches, he worries that the money from selling assets will not last as long as leaders expect it to, "and sooner or later they'll be right back where they started."

src: 他表示，教堂可以改建為公寓大樓，讓那些不會幫助社區其他小團體的人們居住。
mt: He said that the church can be rebuilt into an apartment building, allowing people who will not help other small groups in the community to live.
ref: Churches, he added, could be replaced by apartment buildings with condominiums filled with the kind of people who will not help the neighborhood's remaining sanctuaries.

src: 「購入公寓的極大量人們會是白人，」他說道，「所以他們將熱切期待這些教堂關閉的那一天，因為這些搬入公寓的人幾乎不可能會成為這些教堂的一分子。」
mt: “The extremely large number of people who buy apartments will be white,” he said. “So they’ll be eagerly looking forward to the day these churches close, because those who move into the apartments will almost never become part of these churches.”
ref: "The overwhelming majority of people who buy condominiums in these buildings will be white," he said, "and therefore will hasten the day that these churches close altogether because it is unlikely that most of these people who move into these condominiums will become members of these churches."

src: 兩座由白人教會在哈林區變成黑人社區前建造的教堂— 建於 1870 年的都會社區、建於十年後的聖馬丁大教堂。
mt: Two churches built by white churches in Harlem before it became a black community—a metropolitan community built in 1870, St. Martin's Cathedral, ten years later.
ref: Both churches were built by white congregations before Harlem became a black metropolis - Metropolitan Community in 1870, St. Martin's a decade later.

src: 原來的白人循道宗教會在 1930 年代遷出。
mt: The original white Methodist religion was moved out in the 1930s.
ref: The original white Methodist congregation moved out in the 1930s.

src: 附近的黑人教會在此之後佔用了這座建築物。
mt: The nearby black church then occupied this building.
ref: A black congregation that had been worshiping nearby took title to the building.

src: 聖馬丁大教堂由以 John Howard Johnson 教士為首的黑人教會佔用。為首的教士更發起了抵制哈林區的主要商業街道— 125th Street 店鋪的活動，因為他們拒絕雇用或推銷黑人店員或產品。
mt: St. Martin's Cathedral is occupied by a black church led by John Howard Johnson, who initiated a boycott of the 125th Street shop in Harlem, the main commercial street, because they refused to hire or sell black shopkeepers or products.
ref: St. Martin's was taken over by a black congregation under the Rev. John Howard Johnson, who led a boycott of retailers on 125th Street, a main street for shopping in Harlem, who resisted hiring or promoting blacks.

src: 1939 年的一場大火嚴重燒毀了大教堂，但 Johnson 教父的教友們合力支持教堂的重建，並訂做了編鐘。
mt: In 1939, a major fire burned down the cathedral, but the parishioners of the Johnson Godfather united to support the rebuilding of the church and made a bell.
ref: A fire in 1939 left the building badly damaged, but as Father Johnson's parishioners made plans to rebuild, they commissioned the carillon.

src: Johnson 教父的兒子 David Johnson 教士，同時也是聖馬丁大教堂的下一任領袖，把編鐘稱為「窮人的銅鐘」。
mt: The son of Johnson's godfather, Father David Johnson, and the next leader of St. Martin's Cathedral, calls the bell "the bronze bell of the poor."
ref: The Rev. David Johnson, Father Johnson's son and successor at St. Martin's, proudly called the carillon "the poor people's bells."

src: 在七月彈奏編鐘的專家卻有不同的見解，並把它稱為：「文化寶藏」和「無法替代的歷史樂器」。
mt: In July, the experts who played the bell had different views and called it "cultural treasure" and "an irreplaceable historical instrument".
ref: The expert who played the carillon in July called it something else: "A cultural treasure" and "an irreplaceable historical instrument."

src: 來自於密西根大學的專家 Tiffany Ng，亦表示這是世界上第一個由黑人音樂家演奏的編鐘。該黑人音樂家為 Dionisio A. Lind，他在 18 年前搬到了河濱教堂演奏更大的編鐘去了。
mt: According to Tiffany Ng, a specialist from the University of Michigan, this is the world's first bell to be played by a black musician. The black musician is Dionisio A. Lind, who moved to Riverside Church 18 years ago to play a larger bell.
ref: The expert, Tiffany Ng of the University of Michigan, also noted that it was the first carillon in the world to be played by a black musician, Dionisio A. Lind, who moved to the larger carillon at the Riverside Church 18 years ago.

src: Merriweather 先生表示聖馬丁大教堂並沒有解雇他。
mt: Mr. Merriweather said St. Martin's Cathedral did not fire him.
ref: Mr. Merriweather said that St. Martin's did not replace him.

src: 聖馬丁大教堂過去數月發生的事情是界乎建築師和承包商的複雜事宜，其中一些是由信徒領袖介紹的，另一些為由主教區委派的人士。
mt: The past few months of St. Martin's Cathedral have been a complex matter for architects and contractors, some of which were introduced by the leaders of the faithful, others appointed by the bishopric.
ref: What has played out at St. Martin's over the last few months has been a complicated tale of architects and contractors, some brought in by the lay leaders of the church, others by the Episcopal diocese.

src: 祭衣室—由信徒領袖組成的教區管理機構—在七月寫信至主教區懇請主教區「考慮將撥款撥予」祭衣室所用，即便祭衣室未參與聘用主教區未派的建築師和承包商。
mt: The ceremonial vestment room—a diocesan governing body composed of ecclesiastical leaders—in July wrote a letter to the bishopric asking the bishopric "to consider allocating funds" for the ceremonial vestment room, even if the sacrificial room did not participate in hiring architects and contractors not assigned by the bishopric.
ref: The vestry - the parish's governing body, made up of lay leaders - wrote the diocese in July with concerns that the diocese "would seek to pass along the costs" to the vestry, even though the vestry had not been involved in hiring the architects and contractors the diocese sent in.

src: 一些教區人士認為主教區辦事欠缺透明度，並對其感到不滿。
mt: Some diocesan people believe that the affairs of the bishopric are lack of transparency and are dissatisfied with them.
ref: Some parishioners complained of a lack of transparency on the diocese's part.

src: 鯊魚在加州咬傷潛水捕龍蝦的 13 歲青年
mt: A 13-year-old shark bites a dive into lobsters in California.
ref: Shark injures 13-year-old on lobster dive in California

src: 官員表示，在禮拜六的龍蝦季節開幕日，一條鯊魚在加州攻擊並咬傷一名參加潛水捕龍蝦的 13 歲青年。
mt: Officials say that on Saturday, the opening day of the lobster season, a shark attacked and bit a 13-year-old boy who participated in diving and catching lobsters in California.
ref: A shark attacked and injured a 13-year-old boy Saturday while he was diving for lobster in California on the opening day of lobster season, officials said.

src: 事件發生在早上 7 點前恩西尼塔斯 (Encinitas) 的 Beacon's Beach 附近。
mt: The incident occurred near Beacon's Beach, Encinitas, before 7 a.m.
ref: The attack occurred just before 7 a.m. near Beacon's Beach in Encinitas.

src: Chad Hammel 在聖地牙哥向 KSWB-TV 表示他在禮拜六當天早上已經與朋友潛水大約半小時後聽到男孩的呼救聲，便與一群熱心人士一起游過去協力將男孩從水中拉起來。
mt: Chad Hammel told KSWB-TV in San Diego that he had dived with friends for about half an hour before hearing the boy's cry for help on Saturday morning, so he went on a swim with a group of enthusiastic people to help pull the boy out of the water.
ref: Chad Hammel told KSWB-TV in San Diego he had been diving with friends for about half an hour Saturday morning when he heard the boy screaming for help and then paddled over with a group to help pull him out of the water.

src: Hammel 說在一開始，他以為男孩只是因為捉到龍蝦而興奮大叫，但之後他才「意識到男孩在大喊『我被咬了！
mt: Hammel said at first he thought the boy was just screaming excitedly after catching a lobster, but then he realized the boy was yelling 'I've been bitten!
ref: Hammel said at first he thought it was just excitement of catching a lobster, but then he "realized that he was yelling, 'I got bit!

src: 我被咬了！』
mt: I've been bitten!'
ref: I got bit!'

src: 他的整個鎖骨都被咬了開來，」Hammel 說他在接近男孩後馬上注意到他的傷勢。
mt: His entire collarbone was bitten open, "Hammel said he noticed his injuries as soon as he got close to the boy.
ref: His whole clavicle was ripped open," Hammel said he noticed once he got to the boy.

src: 「我馬上叫其他人趕快離開水裡：『海裡有鯊魚！』」Hammel 說道。
mt: "I immediately told the others to get out of the water: 'There are sharks in the sea!'" Hammel said.
ref: "I yelled at everyone to get out of the water: 'There's a shark in the water!'" Hammel added.

src: 男孩被直升飛機送至聖地牙哥的雷迪兒童醫院 (Rady Children's Hospital)，而其傷況被醫院列為危急。
mt: The boy was taken to the Rady Children's Hospital in San Diego by a helicopter, and his condition was listed as critical.
ref: The boy was airlifted to Rady Children's Hospital in San Diego where he is listed in critical condition.

src: 是次傷人的鯊魚品種不明。
mt: The species of shark that was injured this time is unknown.
ref: The species of shark responsible for the attack was unknown.

src: 救生員領隊 Larry Giles 在一次媒體採訪中表示數星期前曾在該領域目擊鯊魚出沒，但當下被判定為不屬於危險的鯊魚品種。
mt: Lifeguard leader Larry Giles said in a media interview that several weeks ago, he had seen sharks appear in the area, but was immediately judged to be not a dangerous shark species.
ref: Lifeguard Capt. Larry Giles said at a media briefing that a shark had been spotted in the area a few weeks earlier, but it was determined not to be a dangerous species of shark.

src: Giles 透露傷者上身軀受到嚴重創傷。
mt: Giles revealed that the victim suffered severe trauma to the upper body.
ref: Giles added the victim sustained traumatic injuries to his upper torso area.

src: 官員已出於安全考慮關閉從 Casablad 的 Ponto Beach 至恩西尼塔斯 (Encinitas) 的 Swami's 海灘 48 小時以進行調查。
mt: Officials have closed 48 hours from Ponto Beach in Casablad to Swami's Beach in Encinitas for security purposes to investigate.
ref: Officials shut down beach access from Ponto Beach in Casablad to Swami's in Ecinitas for 48 hours for investigation and safety purposes.

src: Giles 表示該領域擁有超過 135 個品種的鯊魚，但其中大部分都不會對泳客構成危險。
mt: Giles says there are more than 135 species of sharks in the field, but most of them are not dangerous to swimmers.
ref: Giles noted that there are more than 135 shark species in the area, but most are not considered dangerous.

src: 森寶利超市 (Sainsbury's) 計畫打入英國的美妝市場
mt: Sainsbury's plans to break into the UK beauty market
ref: Sainsbury's plans push into UK beauty market

src: 森寶利超市 (Sainsbury's) 推出配有專業助理的百貨風格美妝專區，對抗 Boots、Superdrug 和德本漢姆 (Debenhams)。
mt: Sainsbury's launches a department store-style beauty zone with professional assistants against Boots, Superdrug and Debenhams.
ref: Sainsbury's is taking on Boots, Superdrug and Debenhams with department store-style beauty aisles staffed with specialist assistants.

src: 隨著時裝及家用品銷售下降，森寶利計畫打入持續增長的英國 £28 億元美妝市場，並將在全國的 11 家分店中推出變得更大的美妝專區。如果該試驗計畫結果理想，將於明年推行至更多分店。
mt: As fashion and household goods sales decline, Samboli plans to break into the UK’s £2.8 billion beauty market, and will launch a larger beauty section in 11 stores across the country. If the pilot is successful, it will be expanded to more stores next year.
ref: As part of a substantial push into the UK's £2.8bn beauty market, which is continuing to grow while fashion and homeware sales fall back, the larger beauty aisles will be tested out in 11 stores around the country and taken to more stores next year if it proves a success.

src: 由於超級市場正積極尋求方法以利用曾經用來擺放電視、微波爐和家用電器的空間，從而促成了是次針對美妝市場的投資。
mt: Due to the supermarket actively seeking ways to utilize the space previously used for placing TVs, microwaves and household appliances, it has led to this year's investment in the beauty market.
ref: The investment in beauty comes as supermarkets hunt for ways to use up shelf space once sued for TVs, microwaves and homeware.

src: 森寶利表示將增加雙倍的美妝產品至高達 3,000 個產品，其中包括例如露華濃 (Revlon)、Essie、修美人 (Tweezerman) 和 Dr.PawPaw 等首次羅列的品牌。
mt: Samboli said it will double its number of beauty products to up to 3,000 products, including the first-ever list of brands such as Revlon, Essie, Tweezerman and Dr. PawPaw.
ref: Sainsbury's said it would be doubling the size of its beauty offering to up to 3,000 products, including brands such as Revlon, Essie, Tweezerman and Dr. PawPaw for the first time.

src: 巴黎萊雅 (L'Oreal)、媚比琳 (Maybelline) 和小蜜蜂爺爺 (Burt's Bees) 等現有品牌亦將享有更多屬於該品牌的獨立空間，就好像在 Boots 等藥妝商店可見一樣。
mt: Existing brands such as L'Oreal, Maybelline and Burt's Bees will also enjoy more independent spaces belonging to the brand, just as they can be seen in drugstores like Boots.
ref: Existing ranges from L'Oreal, Maybelline and Burt's Bees will also get more space with branded areas similar to those found in shops like Boots.

src: 森寶利亦將重新推出它的精品化妝品系列，且其中的大部分產品皆為純素友善—從而回應年輕消費者日漸熱烈的訴求。
mt: Sam Po Lee will also re-launch its luxury cosmetics series, with most of its products being vegan friendly, thus responding to the increasingly enthusiastic demands of young consumers.
ref: The supermarket is also relaunching its Boutique makeup range so that the majority of products are vegan-friendly - something increasingly demanded by younger shoppers.

src: 除此以外，亦將在兩家森寶利分店推出 Fragrance Shop 這一香水零售商的合作優惠專櫃。第一個合作專櫃已於上禮拜在南倫敦的 Croydon 開幕，第二個將在今年於伯明罕的 Selly Oak 開幕。
mt: In addition, the Fragrance Shop co-branded counters will also be launched at two stores in Sambolite. The first co-branded counter opened last week at Croydon in South London, and the second one will open this year at Selly Oak in Birmingham.
ref: In addition, perfume retailer the Fragrance Shop will be testing out concessions in two Sainsbury's stores, the first of which opened in Croydon, south London, last week while a second opens in Selly Oak, Birmingham, later this year.

src: 隨著網上購物的普及，和越來越多的人們在附近的便利店在每天購買少量的食物，意味著超級市場需要採取更多的戰略以吸引顧客光臨。
mt: As online shopping becomes popular, and more and more people are buying a small amount of food at nearby convenience stores every day, it means that supermarkets need to take more strategies to attract customers to visit.
ref: Online shopping and a shift towards buying small amounts of food daily at local convenience stores means supermarkets are having to do more to persuade people to visit.

src: 森寶利的執行長 Mike Coupe 表示隨著連鎖超級市場試圖通過提供更多的服務和非食品商品來反擊折扣店 Aldi 和 Lidl，森寶利旗下的銷售點將變得越來越像百貨公司的專櫃。
mt: As the chain of supermarkets attempted to counterattack discount stores Aldi and Lidl by providing more services and non-food items, the sales points under Sam's will become increasingly like those of department stores.
ref: Mike Coupe, the chief executive of Sainsbury's, has said the outlets will look increasingly like department stores as the supermarket chain tries to fight back against the discounters Aldi and Lidl with more services and non-food.

src: 森寶利已在其旗下數百家分店設置 Argos 銷售點，並已引入了一些 Habitats 銷售點，因為集團已於兩年前買下這兩個連鎖品牌。森寶利更表示引入的這些銷售點有助日用品的銷售，讓收購這兩個品牌變得更有價值。
mt: Samboli has set up Argos outlets in its hundreds of stores and has introduced some Habitats outlets, as the group bought both of these chains two years ago. Samboli also said that the introduction of these outlets helps the sale of daily necessities, making the acquisition of these two brands more valuable.
ref: Sainsbury's has been putting Argos outlets in hundreds of stores and has also introduced a number of Habitats since it bought both chains two years ago, which it says has bolstered grocery sales and made the acquisitions more profitable.

src: 森寶利以前改造其美妝和藥房部門的嘗試都以失敗告終。
mt: The attempts to renovate his beauty and pharmacy department before all ended in failure.
ref: The supermarket's previous attempt to revamp its beauty and pharmacy departments ended in failure.

src: 森寶利更曾在 2000 年代初與 Boots 合作，但是次合作隨著關於超級市場中的藥商收入分配的討論就此結束了。
mt: Sampo also collaborated with Boots in the early 2000s, but this collaboration ended with a discussion about the distribution of pharmacy income in supermarkets.
ref: Sainsbury's tested a joint venture with Boots in the early 2000s, but the tie-up ended after a row over how to split the revenues from the chemist's stores in its supermarkets.

src: 三年前，在以 £1.25 億向 Lloyds Pharmacy 連鎖集團的所有人— Celesio 出售它的 281 家分店的藥房業務後，森寶利開始發展這一新戰略。
mt: Three years ago, after selling the pharmacy business of its 281 outlets to Celesio, owner of Lloyds Pharmacy chain, for £125 million, Sam Po Lee began developing this new strategy.
ref: The new strategy comes after Sainsbury's sold its 281-store pharmacy business to Celesio, the owner of the Lloyds Pharmacy chain, for £125m, three years ago.

src: 謠言指 Lloyds 將在是次計畫中扮演重要角色，並在四家分店中加入包括理膚寶水 (La Roche-Posay) 和薇姿 (Vichy) 的更多奢華保養品品牌。
mt: Rumors have it that Lloyds will play an important role in the project, adding more luxury skincare brands including La Roche-Posay and Vichyy to four stores.
ref: It said Lloyds would play a role in the plan, by adding an extended range of luxury skincare brands including La Roche-Posay and Vichy in four stores.

src: 森寶利的商務總監 Paul Mills-Hicks 表示：「我們已改變了我們美妝專區的外貌及感覺，以向我們的顧客提供更專業的環境氛圍。
mt: Paul Mills-Hicks, Commercial Director of Sam Po Lee, said, “We’ve changed the look and feel of our Beauty Zone to provide a more professional environment to our customers.
ref: Paul Mills-Hicks, Sainsbury's commercial director, said: "We've transformed the look and feel of our beauty aisles to enhance the environment for our customers.

src: 我們亦已投資聘請受過專業訓練的員工以向顧客提供現場建議。
mt: We have also invested in hiring professionally trained staff to provide on-site advice to our customers.
ref: We've also invested in specially trained colleagues who will be on hand to offer advice.

src: 我們所提供的豐富品牌系列是為了滿足不同需求，而吸引人的環境設計和便利的地點讓我們成為人們樂於前往的美妝購物地點，一反傳統消費習慣。」
mt: Our extensive range of brands is designed to meet different needs, and our attractive environment and convenient location make us a beauty shopping destination that people are happy to go to, contrary to traditional consumption habits. "
ref: Our range of brands is designed to suit every need and the alluring environment and convenient locations mean we're now a compelling beauty destination which challenges the old way of shopping."

src: Holly Willoughby 退出 £1100 萬合作投資，「激怒」Peter Jones
mt: Holly Willoughby withdraws from £11 million co-investment, “infuriating” Peter Jones
ref: Peter Jones 'furious' after Holly Willoughby pulls out of £11million deal

src: 電視主播 Holly Willough 退出與龍穴 (Dragons Den) 明星 Peter Jones 生活品牌業務的 £1100 萬合作投資，以專注於她與瑪莎百貨 (Marks and Spencer) 和 ITV 的全新合約，讓 Jones 「憤怒不已」
mt: Holly Willough, a TV anchor, exits a £11 million investment in her life brand business with Peter Jones, a Dragons Den star, to focus on her new contract with Marks and Spencer and ITV, leaving Jones "angry"
ref: Dragons Den star Peter Jones left 'furious' after TV presenter Holly Willoughby pulls out of £11million deal with his lifestyle brand business to focus on her new contracts with Marks and Spencer and ITV

src: Willoughby 已經無暇照顧他們的家居服飾及配件品牌 Truly。
mt: Willoughby has no time to take care of their home apparel and accessories brand, Truly.
ref: Willoughby has no time for their homewear and accessories brand Truly.

src: 他們二人的生意被喻為另一個 Gwyneth Paltrow 的 Goop 品牌。
mt: Their business was referred to as another Goop brand by Gwyneth Paltrow.
ref: The pair's business had been likened to Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop brand.

src: 這名 37 歲的 This Morning 主持在 Instagram 宣布退出合作。
mt: The 37-year-old This Morning host announced on Instagram that he has withdrawn from the partnership.
ref: This Morning presenter, 37, took to Instagram to announce she is leaving.

src: Holly Willoughby 在最後關頭退出與龍穴 (Dragons Den) 明星 Peter Jones 的利潤豐厚的生活品牌業務合作，是為了專注於她與瑪莎百貨 (Marks and Spencer) 和 ITV 的全新合約，讓 Jones 「憤怒不已」。
mt: Holly Willoughby left his lucrative lifestyle brand business with Dragons Den star Peter Jones at the last minute to focus on her new contract with Marks and Spencer and ITV, leaving Jones "angry".
ref: Holly Willoughby has left Dragons" Den star Peter Jones fuming by pulling out of their lucrative lifestyle brand business at the last minute - to focus on her own new bumper contracts with Marks & Spencer and ITV.

src: 消息稱在禮拜二，在白金漢郡 Marlow 的 Jones 商業帝國總部，電視玉女 Holly Willoughby 在與 Jones 的一場緊張討論中表示她新簽訂的合約—其價值高達 £150 萬—讓她已無暇專注於兩人的家居服飾及配件品牌 Truly，讓 Jones 「憤怒不已」。
mt: It was reported that on Tuesday, at the Jones Commercial Empire headquarters in Marlow, Buckinghamshire, TV star Holly Willoughby, in a tense discussion with Jones, she said her new contract worth £1.5 million had left her with no time to focus on their homewear and accessories brand Truly, leaving Jones "angry".
ref: Sources say Jones was "furious" when TV's golden girl admitted during a tense meeting on Tuesday at the headquarters of his business empire in Marlow, Buckinghamshire, that her new deals - worth up to £1.5 million - meant she no longer had enough time to devote to their homewear and accessories brand Truly.

src: 這個品牌被喻為另一個 Gwyneth Paltrow 的 Goop 品牌，更被指將使 Willoughby 預計為 £1100 萬的財富帶來雙倍的增幅。
mt: This brand is referred to as another Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop brand, and it is said that it will double Willoughby's expected wealth of £11 million.
ref: The business had been likened to Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop brand and was tipped to double Willoughby's estimated £11 million fortune.

src: 隨著 37 歲的 Willoughby 在 Instagram 宣布退出 Truly，Jones 亦搭乘飛機離開英國到他的其中一個度假屋去散心。
mt: With 37-year-old Willoughby announcing his withdrawal from Truly on Instagram, Jones also took a plane to leave the UK to take a break at one of his vacation homes.
ref: As Willoughby, 37, took to Instagram to announce she was leaving Truly, Jones jetted out of Britain to head for one of his holiday homes.

src: 消息稱：「Truly 之前一直是 Holly 的首要考慮。
mt: The message said: "Truly has been Holly's primary concern ever since.
ref: A source said: "Truly was by far the top of Holly's priorities.

src: 這本來是她的長遠未來計畫，以支持她未來數十年的發展。
mt: This was originally her long-term future plan to support her development over the next few decades.
ref: It was going to be her long-term future that would see her through the next couple of decades.

src: 她退出的決定讓所有涉及的人士無比震驚。
mt: Her decision to withdraw left all those involved in the incident utterly shocked.
ref: Her decision to pull out left everyone involved absolutely stunned.

src: 沒有人可以相信禮拜二所發生的事情，尤其是在這個品牌即將推出的重大關頭。
mt: No one can believe what happened on Tuesday, especially at a major moment when this brand is about to launch.
ref: Nobody could believe what was happening on Tuesday, it was so close to the launch.

src: 在 Marlow 總部已經有一整個倉庫的商品準備好隨時推出作銷售。」
mt: There's a whole warehouse ready for sale at Marlow headquarters."
ref: There is a warehouse full of goods at the Marlow HQ which are ready to be sold."

src: 這名 This Morning 主持是英國最賺錢的明星之一，專家相信她的退出可能導致公司承受先前投資至從抱枕和蠟燭到時裝和家居服等不同產品的數百萬虧損，更可能進一步延遲品牌的上市。
mt: This Morning host is one of the UK's most profitable stars, experts believe that her exit may lead to the company suffering hundreds of millions of losses from previously invested in various products such as pillows and candles to fashion and homewear, further delaying the brand's listing.
ref: Experts believe the departure of the This Morning presenter, who is among Britain's most bankable stars, could cost the firm millions due to hefty investment in products ranging from cushions and candles to clothing and homewear, and the potential for further delays to its launch.

src: 這也可能意味著一段長久的友情也走到了盡頭。
mt: This may also mean that a long-term friendship has come to an end.
ref: And it could mean the end of a long friendship.

src: 育有三名子女的 Willoughby 和丈夫 Dan Baldwin 已與 Jones 和 Tara Capp 夫妻交好十年。
mt: Willoughby and her husband Dan Baldwin, who have three children, have been married to Jones and Tara Capp for 10 years.
ref: Mother-of-three Willoughby and husband Dan Baldwin have been close to Jones and his wife Tara Capp for ten years.

src: Willoughby 與 Capp 在 2016 年設立了 Truly，而 52 歲的 Jones 在三月加入擔任總裁一職。
mt: Willoughby and Capp opened Truly in 2016, while 52-year-old Jones joined as president in March.
ref: Willoughby set up Truly with Capp in 2016 and Jones, 52, joined as chairman in March.

src: 兩對夫婦更時常一同出遊。Jones 也在 Baldwin 的電視製作公司擁有百分之 40 的股權。
mt: The two couples often travel together. Jones also owns a 40 percent stake in Baldwin's TV production company.
ref: The couples holiday together and Jones has a 40 per cent stake in Baldwin's TV production firm.

src: Willoughby 將成為瑪莎百貨的品牌大使，並將代替 Ant McPartlin 成為 ITV 的節目 I'm A Celebrity 主持。
mt: Willoughby will be the brand ambassador for Martha, and will be hosting I'm A Celebrity instead of Ant McPartlin.
ref: Willoughby is to become a brand ambassador for M&S and will replace Ant McPartlin as host of ITV's I'm A Celebrity.

src: Jones 身邊的一個消息在昨晚表示「我們不會對他的生意發表任何意見。」
mt: A message by Jones' side said last night, "We will not comment on his business."
ref: A source close to Jones said last night "We wouldn't comment on his business affairs."

src: 唇槍舌劍「然後我們墜入愛河」
mt: "Then we fall in love."
ref: Tough talk 'and then we fell in love'

src: 他發表了一些人可能認為「不應該是總統說出」的話，也對北韓領導人持有正面評價。他對新聞媒體可能就此作出的批評一笑置之。
mt: He has published words that some people might think “should not be what the president is saying” and that he has a positive evaluation of the North Korean leaders. He has a laugh at the criticisms the media may have made about this.
ref: He joked about criticism he would get from the news media for making a comment some would consider "unpresidential" and for being so positive about the North Korean leader.

src: 為什麼川普總統放棄了這麼多東西？
mt: Why did President Trump give up so much?
ref: Why has President Trump given up so much?

src: 川普用模仿「新聞主播」的腔調說：
mt: Trump, in a tone that imitates a "news anchor," said:
ref: Trump said in his mock "news anchor" voice.

src: 「我沒有放棄任何東西。」
mt: "I didn't give up anything."
ref: "I didn't give up anything."

src: 他透露金 (Kim) 在六月的新加坡第一次會談後表示希望舉行第二次會談。兩人的第一次會談被川普稱為北韓棄核的重大一步。
mt: He revealed that Kim expressed a desire to hold a second meeting after the first meeting in Singapore in June, which Trump called a major step forward for North Korea to abandon its nuclear weapons.
ref: He noted that Kim is interested in a second meeting after their initial meeting in Singapore in June was hailed by Trump as a big step toward denuclearization of North Korea.

src: 但棄核討論卻已停滯不前。
mt: But the debate on abandoning nuclear power has stalled.
ref: But denuclearization negotiations have stalled.

src: 在新加坡六月會談後的超過三個月後，北韓的最高外交部長李容浩 (Ri Yong Ho) 在禮拜六的聯合國會議中向國際領導人表示，北韓未從美國身上看到對北韓早期的解除武器舉動的任何「相應回應」。
mt: More than three months after the June talks in Singapore, Ri Yong Ho, North Korea's highest foreign minister, told international leaders at a UN conference on Saturday that North Korea had not seen any "relative response" from the US to North Korea's early disarmament.
ref: More than three months after the June summit in Singapore, North Korea's top diplomat Ri Yong Ho told world leaders at the U.N. General Assembly Saturday that the North doesn't see a "corresponding response" from the U.S. to North Korea's early disarmament moves.

src: 他表示，相反，美國方面持續制裁以繼續施壓。
mt: He said, on the contrary, the US side continues to impose sanctions to continue pressuring.
ref: Instead, he noted, the U.S. is continuing sanctions aimed at keeping up pressure.

src: 川普卻在他的整合演講中表達了更為樂觀的看法。
mt: Trump, on the other hand, expressed a more optimistic view in his integrated speech.
ref: Trump took a much more optimistic view in his rally speech.

src: 「我們在北韓問題上進度良好，」他說道。
mt: "We've made good progress on the North Korean issue," he says.
ref: "We're doing great with North Korea," he said.

src: 「我們本來差點要與北韓開戰。
mt: "We were about to go to war with North Korea.
ref: "We were going to war with North Korea.

src: 數萬人可能會在戰爭中喪命。
mt: Tens of thousands of people could die in the war.
ref: Millions of people would have been killed.

src: 但現在我們已經建立起了友好的關係。」
mt: But now we've established friendly relationships."
ref: Now we have this great relationship."

src: 他表示他對與金改善關係方面所作出的努力已帶來正面結果—終結飛彈測試、幫助救出人質及讓剩下的美國公僕順利回家。
mt: He said his efforts to improve relations with Gold have brought positive results—ending missile tests, helping to rescue hostages, and allowing the remaining US public servants to return home safely.
ref: He said his efforts to improve relations with Kim have brought positive results - ending rocket tests, helping free hostages and getting the remains of American servicemen returned home.

src: 他也為就與金的關係方面所作出的言論辯護。
mt: He also defended his remarks on the relationship with Gold.
ref: And he defended his unusual approach in talking about relations with Kim.

src: 「其實很容易就會說出了總統該說的言論。外面可能會有 10,000 人想要進入到這個擁擠的小小場地，但事實上我們有大約 200 人就站在這裡，」川普指著眼前站著的人群說道。
mt: “It’s really easy to say what the President should say. There may be 10,000 people out there who want to go into this crowded, small space, but in fact we have about 200 of them standing right here,” Trump said, pointing to the crowd standing right in front of us.
ref: "It's so easy to be presidential, but instead of having 10,000 people outside trying to get into this packed arena, we'd have about 200 people standing right there," Trump said, pointing at the crowd directly in front of him.

src: 印尼海嘯和地震震驚全國，數百人死亡
mt: The Indonesian tsunami and earthquake have shocked the country, killing hundreds of people
ref: Indonesia Tsunami and Quake Devastate an Island, Killing Hundreds

src: 龍目島地震發生後，外國非政府組織被告知已經不需要他們的救助。
mt: After the Long Island earthquake, foreign non-governmental organizations were told that they no longer needed their help.
ref: In the aftermath of the Lombok earthquake, for instance, foreign nongovernmental organizations were told they were not needed.

src: 即便超過百分之 10 的龍目島人口已然流離失所，卻為發布任何國家災難警報。這應該是要求國際援助的先決條件。
mt: Even if more than 10 percent of the population of Lombok are already displaced, it is a prerequisite for any national disaster alert. This should be a prerequisite for international aid.
ref: Even though more than 10 percent of Lombok's population had been dislocated, no national disaster was declared, a prerequisite for catalyzing international aid.

src: 「不幸的是，在很多情況下，他們已表明不需要國際援助，所以情況可能有點棘手，」Sumbung 女士表示。
mt: "Unfortunately, in many cases, they have indicated that they do not need international assistance, so the situation may be a bit tricky," says Ms. Sumbung.
ref: "In many cases, unfortunately, they've been very clear that they're not requesting international assistance, so it's a bit challenging," Ms. Sumbung said.

src: 救助兒童會正組織團隊前往帕盧，但未能確認外國人員是否可以展開實地救援。
mt: The Save the Children are organizing a team to go to Palu, but it has been unable to confirm whether foreign personnel can carry out on-site rescue.
ref: While Save the Children is putting together a team to travel to Palu, it is not yet sure whether foreign staff can work on the ground.

src: 國家災難機構發言人 Sutopo 先生表示，印尼官員在評估帕盧的情況以確認國際組織是否可以參與救災。
mt: Sutopo, a spokesman for the National Disaster Agency, said Indonesian officials are evaluating the situation in Palu to confirm whether international organizations can participate in the relief efforts.
ref: Mr. Sutopo, the national disaster agency spokesman, said Indonesian officials were assessing the situation in Palu to see whether international agencies would be allowed to contribute to the aid effort.

src: 即便印尼時常發生地震，國家卻仍然無力面對大自然的無情摧毀。
mt: Even though Indonesia frequently experiences earthquakes, the country is still unable to face the relentless destruction of nature.
ref: Given the earth shaking that Indonesia constantly endures, the country remains woefully underprepared for nature's wrath.

src: 雖然在亞齊省已建造了海嘯避難所，但在其他沿海地區卻是極為罕見。
mt: Although tsunami shelters have been built in Aceh Province, they are extremely rare in other coastal areas.
ref: While tsunami shelters have been built in Aceh, they are not a common sight on other coastlines.

src: 帕盧未設有海嘯警報，而即便在設有警報的情況下，仍然可能造成嚴重傷亡。
mt: Palu has not set up a tsunami warning, and even if there is one, it may still cause serious casualties.
ref: The apparent lack of a tsunami warning siren in Palu, even though a warning had been in effect, is likely to have contributed to the loss of life.

src: 即便在天氣晴朗的情況下，穿梭於印尼的許多島嶼之間也絕非易事。
mt: Even on a clear day, it's not easy to travel between many islands in Indonesia.
ref: At the best of times, traveling between Indonesia's many islands is challenging.

src: 天然災害使物流運輸變得加倍困難。
mt: Natural disasters have made logistics transportation twice as difficult.
ref: Natural disasters make logistics even more complicated.

src: 本來停靠在龍目島的一艘治療地震傷患的醫療船隻正前往帕盧，但也需要至少三天才能抵達新的災難現場。
mt: A medical ship originally anchored on Lombok Island was heading to Palu for the treatment of earthquake victims, but it also took at least three days to arrive at the new disaster site.
ref: A hospital ship that had been stationed in Lombok to treat earthquake victims is making its way to Palu, but it will take at least three days to reach the site of the new calamity.

src: 總統 Joko Widodo 把改善印尼的破舊基礎建設列為他的競選主要承諾，並且已耗費大量資金修繕道路和鐵路。
mt: President Joko Widodo listed improving Indonesia's dilapidated infrastructure as his primary campaign promise and has spent a lot of money on road and rail repairs.
ref: President Joko Widodo made improving Indonesia's tattered infrastructure a centerpiece of his election campaign, and he has lavished money on roads and railways.

src: 但資金短缺已成為 Joko 先生明年競選連任的一個重大施政難題。
mt: But the lack of funds has become a major policy challenge for Mr. Joko to run for re-election next year.
ref: But funding shortfalls have plagued Mr. Joko's administration as he faces re-election next year.

src: Joko 先生亦面對來自印尼揮之不去的宗派緊張局勢的壓力，其中佔人口多數的穆斯林成員採取更保守的宗教形式。
mt: Mr. Joko also faced the pressures of sectarian tensions raging across Indonesia, with Muslim members, the majority of the population, adopting a more conservative form of religion.
ref: Mr. Joko is also facing pressure from lingering sectarian tensions in Indonesia, where members of the Muslim majority have embraced a more conservative form of the faith.

src: 隨著基督徒和穆斯林幫派在街上使用大砍刀、弓箭和其他原始武器鬥毆，超過 1,000 人已確認死亡，上千名人民亦流離失所。
mt: As Christian and Muslim gangs used large knives, bows and arrows and other primitive weapons to fight on the streets, more than 1,000 people had been confirmed dead, with over a thousand people also displaced.
ref: More than 1,000 people were killed and tens of thousands dislocated from their homes as Christian and Muslim gangs battled on the streets, using machetes, bows and arrows, and other crude weapons.

src: 觀看：利物浦的 Daniel Sturridge 驚險追平切爾西
mt: Watch: Liverpool's Daniel Sturridge narrows Chelsea
ref: Watch: Liverpool's Daniel Sturridge dips deep equalizer vs. Chelsea

src: 在禮拜六的倫敦斯坦福橋，Daniel Sturridge 在第 89 分鐘成功入球，幫助利物浦在超級聯賽中從落後切爾西的情況下反勝。
mt: On Saturday at London's Sturridge Bridge, Daniel Sturridge scored in the 89th minute to help Liverpool win the Super League from behind Chelsea.
ref: Daniel Sturridge saved Liverpool from a Premier League loss to Chelsea with a score in the 89th minute on Saturday at Stamford Bridge in London.

src: Xherdan Shaqiri 將球傳給了 Sturridge，當時他離切爾西龍門距離約 30 碼且利物浦正落後 1-0。
mt: Xherdan Shaqiri sent the ball to Sturridge, about 30 yards from Chelsea Dragon Gate and Liverpool were 1-0 behind.
ref: Sturridge received a pass from Xherdan Shaqiri while about 30 yards out from the Chelsea goal with his team trailing 1-0.

src: 他將球踢到左邊，再一腳直射向遙遠的龍門處。
mt: He kicked the ball to the left, and then shot it straight into a distant dragon's goal.
ref: He tapped the ball to his left before scooping a shot toward the far post.

src: 球被踢起後，以驚人的速度直指龍門網的右上角。
mt: After the ball was kicked up, it pointed straight at the top right corner of the Dragon's Gate net with an incredible speed.
ref: The attempt sailed high above the box as it drifted toward the right top corner of the net.

src: 球最後避開守門的 Kepa Arrizabalaga 並成功射入龍門。
mt: The ball finally dodged the goalkeeper's Kepa Arrizabalaga and successfully shot into the dragon's goal.
ref: The ball eventually dropped over a leaping Kepa Arrizabalaga and fell into the net.

src: 「關鍵是要齊集射門的條件，要拿到球而好像 Shaq 這樣的球員常常儘量在前方運球，所以我需要儘量給自己預留更多的時間，」Sturridge 向 LiverpoolFC.com 表示。
mt: "The key is to gather the conditions for the goal, to get the ball, and players like Shaq often do their best to move the ball forward, so I need to give myself as much time as possible," Sturridge told LiverpoolFC.com.
ref: "It was just trying to get into that position, to get on the ball and players like Shaq always play it forward as much as possible, so I just tried to create myself as much time as possible," Sturridge told LiverpoolFC.com.

src: 「我看到 Kante 正趕來，踢了一下，沒有多想就直接射門。」
mt: "I saw Kante coming, kicking, and shooting straight into the door without thinking too much."
ref: "I saw Kante coming and took one touch and didn't think about it too much and just took the shot on."

src: 切爾西在比利時明星球員 Eden Hazard 在第 25 分鐘射門後，直至中場休息仍然保持 1-0 的領先局面。
mt: Chelsea maintained a 1-0 lead after the 25th minute of shooting with Belgian star player Eden Hazard until midfield break.
ref: Chelsea led 1-0 at halftime after getting a score in the 25th minute from Belgian star Eden Hazard.

src: 這名身穿藍衣的前鋒先把球傳給了 Mateo Kovacic，再轉到中場並飛奔入利物浦的場地。
mt: This forward, dressed in blue, first passed the ball to Mateo Kovacic, then moved to midfield and flew into Liverpool's field.
ref: The Blues striker heeled a pass back to Mateo Kovacic on that play, before spinning off near midfield and sprinting into the Liverpool half.

src: Kovacic 在中場果斷傳球。
mt: Kovacic makes a decisive pass in the middle of the game.
ref: Kovacic did a quick give-and-go at midfield.

src: 他再射出完美一球，將 Hazard 引入射門的罰球區。
mt: He shot a perfect ball again, introducing Hazard into the penalty area of the shot.
ref: He then fired a beautiful through ball, leading Hazard into the box.

src: Hazard 成功甩掉防衛，左腳一踢，球避開利物浦的 Alisson Becker 成功遠柱入網。
mt: Hazard managed to shake off the defenses, kicking the ball away from Liverpool's Alisson Becker with a left foot.
ref: Hazard outran the defense and finished into the far post netting with a left footed shot past Liverpool's Alisson Becker.

src: 利物浦將在禮拜三下午 3 點進行歐洲冠軍聯賽小組賽，在義大利那不勒斯的聖保羅球場對戰那不勒斯。
mt: Liverpool will play the European Champions League group stage on Wednesday afternoon at 3 pm, against Naples at St. Paul's Stadium in Naples, Italy.
ref: Liverpool battles Napoli in the group stage of the Champions League at 3 p.m. on Wednesday at Stadio San Paolo in Naples, Italy.

src: 切爾西將在禮拜四下午 3 點參加歐洲足協歐霸盃，在倫敦迎戰維迪。
mt: Chelsea will participate in the UEFA Europa League on Thursday afternoon at 3 pm, playing against Vidi in London.
ref: Chelsea faces Videoton in the UEFA Europa Leaguge at 3 p.m. on Thursday in London.

src: 印尼海嘯死亡人數升至 832 人
mt: Indonesian tsunami death toll rises to 832
ref: Death toll from Indonesia tsunami rises to 832

src: 在禮拜六稍早，國家災難機構表示印尼地震及海嘯死亡人數已攀升至 832 人。
mt: Earlier this Saturday, the National Disaster Agency reported that the death toll from the Indonesian earthquake and tsunami had risen to 832.
ref: The death toll in Indonesia's earthquake and tsunami has climbed to 832, the country's disaster agency said early Sunday.

src: 機構發言人 Sutopo Purwo Nugroho 在新聞發佈會表示，自禮拜五的 7.5 地震發生起，引發的海嘯浪潮高達 20 英尺，很多人民亦求救稱被困在倒塌的建築物中。
mt: A spokesperson for the organization, Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, said at a press conference that since the 7.5 earthquake on Friday, the tsunami wave has reached as high as 20 feet, with many people also seeking help saying they are trapped in collapsed buildings.
ref: Many people were reported trapped in the rubble of buildings brought down in the 7.5 magnitude earthquake which struck Friday and triggered waves as high as 20 feet, agency spokesman Sutopo Purwo Nugroho told a news conference.

src: 擁有超過 380,000 人口的帕盧市，街頭遍佈倒塌的建築物殘骸。
mt: With a population of over 380,000, the streets of Pallu are covered with collapsed building remnants.
ref: The city of Palu, which has more than 380,000 people, was strewn with debris from collapsed buildings.

src: 警察了逮捕了 32 男子，懷疑為刺死女性殺人犯
mt: Police have arrested 32 men suspected of murdering a female killer.
ref: Police arrest man, 32, on suspicion of murder after woman is stabbed to death

src: 今晨在 Birkenhead, Merseyside 發現女屍，警方以謀殺案展開調查。
mt: This morning, a female corpse was found at Birkenhead, Merseyside, and the police launched an investigation into the murder case.
ref: A murder investigation has been launched after woman's body was found in Birkenhead, Merseyside this morning.

src: 44 歲死者在早上 7:55 分被發現倒臥在 John Street 的 Grayson Mews，身上發現多處刀傷。警方後來逮捕了一名 32 歲男子，懷疑為殺人兇手。
mt: A 44-year-old victim was found lying on John Street’s Grayson Mews at 7:55 a.m. with multiple stab wounds. Police later arrested a 32-year-old man suspected of murder.
ref: The 44-year-old was found at 7.55am with stab wounds on Grayson Mews on John Street, with a 32-year-old man being arrested on suspicion of murder.

src: 警方呼籲附近居民如果有看到或聽到什麼，應儘快與警方聯絡。
mt: The police urge nearby residents to contact the police as soon as possible if they see or hear anything.
ref: Police have urged people in the area who saw or heard anything to come forward.

src: 負責調查的警官 Brian O'Hagan 表示：「調查仍處於初步階段，但我懇請任何在 Birkenhead 的 John Street 附近看到或聽到任何可疑內容的人士與我們聯絡。
mt: Brian O'Hagan, the officer in charge of the investigation, said: "The investigation is still in its preliminary stage, but I would like to ask anyone who sees or hears anything suspicious near John Street in Birkenhead to contact us.
ref: Detective Inspector Brian O'Hagan said: 'The investigation is in the early stages but I would appeal to anyone who was in the vicinity of John Street in Birkenhead who saw or heard anything suspicious to contact us.

src: 我亦呼籲任何人，尤其是計程車司機，如果在行車記錄器拍到任何相關內容也儘快與我們聯繫，因為這些資訊可能對我們的調查有莫大幫助。」
mt: I also urge anyone, especially taxi drivers, to contact us as soon as possible if any relevant content is captured on the tachograph, as this information may be of great help to our investigation.”
ref: I would also appeal to anyone, particularly taxi drivers, who may have captured anything on dashcam footage to contact us as they may have information which is vital to our investigation.'

src: 警方發言人已確認被發現的女死者為 Birkenhead 當地居民，而她也是在家中被發現的。
mt: A police spokesperson has confirmed that the female victim found is a local resident of Birkenhead, and she was also found at home.
ref: A police spokesman has confirmed the woman whose body was found is local to Birkenhead and she was found inside a property.

src: 在今天下午，自稱女死者的朋友抵達現場詢問有關她今晨是在哪裡被發現的。
mt: This afternoon, a friend claiming to be the deceased woman arrived at the scene and asked about where she had been found this morning.
ref: This afternoon friends who believe they know the woman have arrived at the scene to ask questions about where she was found this morning.

src: 調查仍然持續進行中。警方也表示他們正在通知死者的近親。
mt: The investigation is still ongoing. Police also said they are notifying the close relatives of the deceased.
ref: Investigations are ongoing as police have said they are in the process of informing the victim's next of kin.

src: 一名居住在 Grayson Mews 的計程車司機嘗試回到他的公寓，但被警方通知沒有人可以出入相關建築物。
mt: A taxi driver living in Grayson Mews tried to return to his apartment, but was informed by the police that no one could enter or exit the relevant building.
ref: A taxi driver who lives in Grayson Mews has just tried to get back into his flat but is being told by police no one is allowed in or out of the building.

src: 他在瞭解發生了什麼事情之後十分震驚。
mt: He was extremely shocked after understanding what had happened.
ref: He was speechless when he discovered what happened.

src: 現場居民被告知他們在數小時後將可以進入相關建築物。
mt: On-site residents were informed that they would be able to enter related buildings within hours.
ref: Residents are now being told it will be hours until they are allowed back in.

src: 現場人士透露聽到一名警官告訴一名男子一整個範圍都被視為案發地點。
mt: On-site personnel revealed that they heard a police officer telling a man that the entire area was considered the location of the crime.
ref: A police officer was heard telling one man that the entire area is now being treated as a crime scene.

src: 一名女子在現場忍不住大哭。
mt: A woman couldn't help but cry at the scene.
ref: A woman appeared at the scene in tears.

src: 她不斷重複說道「這太可怕了」。
mt: She kept saying, "That's terrible."
ref: She keeps repeating 'it's so awful'.

src: 在下午 2 點，兩輛警車駛進警哨線範圍，而另一輛警車就停靠在外圍不遠處。
mt: At 2 p.m., two police cars drove into the range of the patrol line, while another police car stopped near the periphery.
ref: At 2pm two police vans were inside the cordon with another van just outside.

src: 數名警官在警哨線內站崗，監控公寓情況。
mt: Several police officers stood guard inside the guard post, monitoring the apartment situation.
ref: A number of officers were stood inside the cordon monitoring the block of flats.

src: 任何人如果有相關資訊，請直接私信 @MerPolCC、致電 101 或聯絡 Crimestoppers。您可以撥打 0800 555 111 並說明為 9 月 30 日的編號 247 以進行匿名投報。
mt: If anyone has information, please write to @MerPolCC directly, call 101 or contact Crimestoppers. You can make an anonymous tip by calling 0800 555 111 with the number 247 of September 30.
ref: Anyone with information is asked to DM @MerPolCC, call 101 or contact Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111 quoting log 247 of 30th September.

src: 國會的克倫威爾 (Cromwell) 雕像成為被「改寫歷史」風潮影響的最新紀念雕像
mt: Parliament’s Cromwell statue became the latest monument to be influenced by the “historical” trend
ref: Parliament's statue of Cromwell becomes latest memorial hit by 'rewriting history' row

src: 考慮到他那群清教徒狂熱追隨者對英國的文化及宗教文物造成的「塔利班」式損毀，撤下克倫威爾的雕像正好體現因果報應。
mt: Considering the "Taliban" style of damage caused by his Puritan fanatic followers to British culture and religious artifacts, removing the statue of Cromwell was a perfect reflection of karma.
ref: Its banishment would be poetic justice for his Taliban-like destruction of so many of England's cultural and religious artefacts carried out by his fanatical Puritan followers.

src: 但 Cromwell Society 將 Crick 先生的建議形容為「愚蠢」且「意圖改寫歷史」的行為。
mt: But Cromwell Society described Mr. Crick's proposal as "stupid" and "an attempt to rewrite history."
ref: But the Cromwell Society described Mr Crick's suggestion as "folly" and "attempting to rewrite history."

src: Cromwell Society 的主席 John Goldsmith 表示：「就目前的討論來看，撤下西敏宫外的克倫威爾雕像可以說是不可避免的議題。
mt: John Goldsmith, president of the Cromwell Society, said, “The removal of the Cromwell statue outside the Westminster Palace is an inevitable issue in the current discussion.
ref: John Goldsmith, chairman of the Cromwell Society, said: "It was inevitable in the present debate about the removal of statues that the figure of Oliver Cromwell outside the Palace of Westminster would become a target.

src: 引發英國內戰的這一反傳統決定並不是由克倫威爾下令或執行的。
mt: This anti-traditional decision that triggered the English Civil War was not ordered or executed by Cromwell.
ref: The iconoclasm of the English civil wars was neither ordered nor carried out by Cromwell.

src: 或許需要被裁決的克倫威爾家在上一個世紀出生的祖先 Thomas Cromwell。
mt: Perhaps the Cromwell family, whose ancestors, Thomas Cromwell, were born in the last century, needed to be judged.
ref: Perhaps the wrong Cromwell would be sacrificed for the actions of his ancestor Thomas in the previous century.

src: 從 William Hamo Thorneycroft 爵士製作的克倫威爾雕像中，可以看出 19 世紀對其良好評價及許多人認為他仍然值得追捧的這部分有關克倫威爾的史學內容。
mt: From the Sir William Hamo Thorneycroft's Cromwell statue, it can be seen that this part of the 19th century was highly praised and many people thought he was still worth following about the historical content of Cromwell.
ref: Sir William Hamo Thorneycroft's magnificent representation of Cromwell is evidence of 19th century opinion and part of the historiography of a figure who many believe is still worth celebrating.

src: Goldsmith 先生向週日電訊報 (Sunday Telegraph) 表示：「很多人將克倫威爾視為，或許在 19 世紀末比今天有更多人這樣認為，保護國會免受外來壓力的偉人。而這在他的情況下，自然是指來自王室的壓力。
mt: Mr. Goldsmith told the Sunday Telegraph: “Many people think of Cromwell as, perhaps, in the late 19th century, more people than today, protecting Congress from outside pressure. And in his case, it naturally refers to the pressure from the royal family.
ref: Mr Goldsmith told The Sunday Telegraph: "Cromwell is regarded by many, perhaps more in the late 19th century than today, as a defender of parliament against external pressure, in his case of course the monarchy.

src: 這是否為歷史的真相，則是史學上持續多年仍然無解的爭論。
mt: Whether this is a true historical fact is an ongoing debate in the field of history that has been unresolved for many years.
ref: Whether that is a wholly accurate representation is the subject of continuing historical debate.

src: 可以確定的是，在 17 世紀中的矛盾造就了後來我們國家的發展，而 Cromwell 則是代表該矛盾一方意見的代表人物。
mt: It can be confirmed that the contradictions in the 17th century led to the development of our country, and Cromwell was a representative figure representing the opinions of the conflicting party.
ref: What is certain is that the conflict of the mid 17th century has shaped the subsequent development of our nation, and Cromwell is an individual recognizable figure who represents one side of that divide.

src: 他作為「護國公」的功績亦值得後世歌頌及紀念。」
mt: His achievements as the protector of the nation are also worthy of later generations to be celebrated and commemorated. "
ref: His achievements as Lord Protector are also worth celebrating and commemorating."

src: 殺人豬攻擊中國籍農夫致其死亡
mt: The killing of a pig attacked a Chinese farmer and caused his death.
ref: Killer Pig Mauls Chinese Farmer to Death

src: 根據當地媒體報導，在中國西南部，一名農夫在市場遭一頭豬襲擊致死。
mt: According to local media reports, a farmer in southwestern China was killed by a pig on the market.
ref: A farmer was attacked and killed by a pig in a market in southwest China, according to local media reports.

src: 根據南華早報在禮拜日的報導，受害人「袁 (Yuan)」某，大動脈遭割斷被發現時已死亡。被發現時滿身是血，倒臥在貴州省六盤水市市場的一個豬圈附近。
mt: According to a Sunday newspaper report by the South China Morning Post, the victim Yuan died when his aorta was found to have been cut off. When he was discovered, he was covered in blood and lay near a pigpen in Liupanshui, Guizhou Province.
ref: The man, identified only by his surname "Yuan," was found dead with a severed artery, covered in blood near a sty at the market in Liupanshui in Guizhou province, the South China Morning Post reported Sunday.

src: 在中國青海省西寧，一名豬農在 2005 年 5 月 30 日準備向豬隻注射疫苗。
mt: On May 30, 2005, a pig farmer in Xining, Qinghai Province, China was preparing to vaccinate pigs.
ref: A pig farmer prepares to inject vaccines into pigs at a hoggery on May 30, 2005 in Xining of Qinghai Province, China.

src: 根據報導，他已在禮拜三與他的表親從鄰近的雲南省到這裡的市場希望出售 15 隻豬。
mt: According to reports, he and his cousin from nearby Yunnan Province to this market on Wednesdays, hoping to sell 15 pigs.
ref: He had reportedly travelled with his cousin from the neighboring Yunnan province Wednesday to sell 15 pigs at the market.

src: 第二天，他的表親發現他已經死亡，且到隔壁豬圈的一道門是打開的。
mt: The next day, his cousin found out that he had died and a door to the next pigpen was opened.
ref: The following morning, his cousin found him dead, and discovered a door to a neighboring pig sty open.

src: 他說豬圈裡一頭大公豬滿口是血。
mt: He said that a big pig in the pigpen had a mouth full of blood.
ref: He said that in the sty was a large male pig with blood on its mouth.

src: 報導指，根據法醫分析，這頭 550 磅重豬已確認為襲擊農夫致死的兇手。
mt: According to reports, according to forensic analysis, this 550-pound pig has been confirmed as the killer who killed the farmer.
ref: A forensic examination confirmed that the 550 pound hog had mauled the farmer to death, according to the report.

src: 根據貴陽晚報的報導，「我表親的雙腿斷掉，且佈滿鮮血，」死者的表親「吳 (Wu)」某表示。
mt: According to a report by the Guiyang Evening News, "My cousin's legs were severed and blood was everywhere," says Wu, the deceased's cousin.
ref: "My cousin's legs were bloody and mangled," the cousin, referred to by his surname "Wu," said, as quoted by the Guiyang Evening News.

src: 監控錄像顯示袁在禮拜四下午 4:40 分進入市場餵豬。
mt: Surveillance footage shows that Yuan entered the market to feed pigs at 4:40 pm on Thursday.
ref: Security camera footage showed Yuan entering the market at 4.40 am Thursday to feed his pigs.

src: 一個小時候，他的屍體被發現。
mt: When he was a child, his body was found.
ref: His body was found about an hour later.

src: 殺人的那頭豬不屬於袁或他的表親所有。
mt: The pig who killed did not belong to Yuan or his cousin.
ref: The animal who killed the man did not belong to Yuan or his cousin.

src: 一名市場經理向晚報表示，警方在現場蒐集證據的同時，那頭豬已被關押在別處以避免牠攻擊其他人。
mt: A market manager told the evening newspaper that while police were gathering evidence on site, the pig had been detained elsewhere to prevent it from attacking others.
ref: A market manager told the Evening News that the pig had been locked away to prevent it attacking anyone else, while police gathered evidence at the scene.

src: 袁的親人和市場負責人員據報導正商討有關其死亡的賠償。
mt: Yuan's relatives and market personnel are reportedly discussing compensation for his death.
ref: Yuan's family and market authorities are reportedly negotiating compensation for his death.

src: 雖然罕見，但根據紀錄，豬隻攻擊人的事件也曾發生。
mt: Although rare, according to records, incidents of pigs attacking people have also occurred.
ref: Though rare, cases of pigs attacking humans have been recorded before.

src: 在 2016 年，一頭豬在麻薩諸塞州在農場攻擊了農場主人夫婦，男主人因此身受重傷。
mt: In 2016, a pig attacked a farm owner couple in Massachusetts on a farm, causing the owner to be severely injured.
ref: In 2016, a pig attacked a woman and her husband at their farm in Massachusetts, leaving the man with critical injuries.

src: 十年前，一頭 650 磅重的豬將一名威爾斯農夫撲倒至他的拖拉機一側，直至後來農夫妻子成功趕走了襲擊人的豬隻。
mt: Ten years ago, a 650-pound pig knocked down a Welsh farmer on one side of his tractor until the farmer's wife successfully chased away the attacked pig.
ref: Ten years previously, a 650 pound pig pinned a Welsh farmer to his tractor until his wife scared the animal away.

src: 在 2012 年一名奧勒岡州農夫被他飼養的豬吃掉。一名曼尼托巴農婦向 CBC 新聞表示豬隻一般來說並無攻擊性，但在嚐到鮮血的味道後可能會「觸發」豬的攻擊性。
mt: In 2012, an Oregon farmer was eaten by a pig he had raised. A Manitoban woman told CBC News that pigs are generally not aggressive, but they may “trigger” the aggressiveness of a pig after tasting the taste of fresh blood.
ref: After an Oregon farmer was eaten by his pigs in 2012, one Manitoba farmer told CBC News that pigs are not normally aggressive but the taste of blood can act as a "trigger."

src: 「他們只是在和你打鬧。
mt: "They're just messing with you.
ref: "They're just being playful.

src: 他們喜歡輕輕咬，小小的一口…他們的本意不是要傷害你。
mt: They like a gentle bite, a tiny bite... they didn't mean to hurt you.
ref: They're nippers, very inquisitive ... they aren't out to hurt you.

src: 你只需要給予他們同等的尊重，」他說道。
mt: You just have to give them the same respect, "he says.
ref: You just have to pay them the right amount of respect," he said.

src: 颶風羅莎的餘威持續為美國西南部帶來廣泛的大雨
mt: Hurricane Rosa's Yuwe continues to bring widespread heavy rain to the American Southwest
ref: Hurricane Rosa's remnants to bring widespread heavy rain to southwest US

src: 根據天氣預測，颶風羅莎在橫掃墨西哥北岸的較冷海域時正在逐漸減弱。
mt: According to weather forecasts, Hurricane Rosa is gradually weakening as it sweeps through the cooler waters off Mexico's northern coast.
ref: As forecast, Hurricane Rosa is weakening as it moves over the cooler waters of the northern coast of Mexico.

src: 但是，羅莎將在未來幾天持續為墨西哥北部和美國西南部帶來暴雨。
mt: However, Rosa will continue to bring heavy rain to northern Mexico and southwestern United States over the next few days.
ref: However, Rosa will bring flooding rains across northern Mexico and the southwest U.S. over the coming days.

src: 羅莎在東部時間禮拜天上午 5 點錄得每小時 85 英里的風速，為一級颶風。當時颶風位於墨西哥 Punta Eugenia 西南部 385 英里處。
mt: Rosa recorded an hourly wind speed of 85 mph at 5 a.m. ET, a Category 1 hurricane. The hurricane was located 385 mph southwest of Punta Eugenia, Mexico.
ref: Rosa had winds of 85 mph, a Category 1 Hurricane, as of 5 a.m. Eastern time Sunday, and was located 385 miles southwest of Punta Eugenia, Mexico.

src: 羅莎預計將在禮拜天往北移。
mt: Rosa is expected to move north on Sunday.
ref: Rosa is expected to move north on Sunday.

src: 同時，一道低壓槽在太平洋逐漸形成，並往東向美國西岸方向移動。隨著羅莎作為熱帶氣旋在禮拜一逼近下加利福尼亞半島，它將開始把深熱帶水氣往北的方向帶入美國西南部。
mt: At the same time, a low-pressure trough is forming over the Pacific Ocean and moving east toward the West Coast of the United States. As a tropical cyclone approaches the Baja California Peninsula on Monday, it will begin to bring the deep-tropical water vapor north into the American Southwest.
ref: Meanwhile, a trough is beginning to take shape over the Pacific Ocean and move east toward the West Coast of the U.S. As Rosa approaches the Baja California peninsula on Monday as a tropical storm it will begin to push deep tropical moisture northward into the southwest U.S.

src: 羅莎將在禮拜一為墨西哥部分地區帶來高達 10 英吋的降雨量。
mt: Rosa will bring as much as 10 inches of rain to parts of Mexico on Monday.
ref: Rosa will bring up to 10 inches of rain in parts of Mexico on Monday.

src: 之後，熱帶水氣將與逼近的低壓槽形成反應，在之後幾天為的西南部帶來大範圍的暴雨。
mt: Subsequently, tropical water vapor will form a reaction with the approaching low-pressure trough, bringing large-scale heavy rain to the southwest in the following days.
ref: Then, tropical moisture interacting with the approaching trough will create widespread heavy rainfall in the Southwest over the coming days.

src: 在沙漠地區，1 至 4 英吋的降雨量可能引發危險暴洪、泥石流，甚至是山泥傾瀉。
mt: In desert areas, one to four inches of rainfall may trigger dangerous flash floods, mudslides, and even landslides.
ref: Locally, 1 to 4 inches of rain will cause dangerous flash flooding, debris flows and possibility landslides in the desert.

src: 深熱帶水氣將導致部分地區的降雨量逼近每小時 2 到 3 英吋，尤其是在南內華達州和亞利桑那州。
mt: Deep tropical moisture will cause rainfall in some areas to approach two to three inches per hour, especially in southern Nevada and Arizona.
ref: Deep tropical moisture will cause rainfall rates to approach 2 to 3 inches per hour in spots, especially in parts of southern Nevada and Arizona.

src: 在西南地區預計將錄得高達 2 至 4 英吋的降雨量，尤其是在亞利桑那州的大多地區。
mt: Rainfall is expected to reach as high as 2-4 inches in the southwestern region, especially in most areas of Arizona.
ref: As much as 2 to 4 inches of rain is expected in parts of the Southwest, especially over much of Arizona.

src: 由於熱帶雨的分散性質，可能引致泥石迅速崩解出現暴洪情況。
mt: Due to the dispersed nature of tropical rain, it may lead to rapid collapse of mudstones resulting in a flood situation.
ref: Flash flooding is possible with rapidly deteriorating conditions due to the scattered nature of tropical rain.

src: 當局不建議民眾在熱帶暴雨的威脅下徒步進入沙漠地區。
mt: The authorities do not recommend that people walk into desert areas under the threat of tropical rain.
ref: It would be extremely ill advised to venture out into the desert on foot with the threat of tropical rainfall.

src: 暴雨可能導致峽谷變成急流，而雷雨更可能為當地帶來暴風並捲起沙塵。
mt: Heavy rain may cause the canyon to become a rapid, and thunderstorms are more likely to bring gale-force winds and roll up dust in the area.
ref: Heavy rain could cause canyons to become raging rivers and thunderstorms will bring locally gusty winds and blowing dust.

src: 逐漸逼近的低壓槽將為加州沿岸部分地區當地帶來陣陣暴雨。
mt: A gradually approaching low-pressure trough will bring torrential rain to parts of California's coastal areas.
ref: The approaching trough will bring some locally heavy rain to parts of the Southern California coastline.

src: 可能出現超過半英吋的降雨量，可能導致輕微的泥石流並讓道路變得濕滑。
mt: Heavy rainfall of more than half an inch may cause minor mudslides and make roads wet.
ref: Rainfall totals of over half an inch are possible, which could cause minor debris flows and slick roadways.

src: 這可能是地區梅雨季節的第一次降雨。
mt: This may be the first rainfall of the region's rainy season.
ref: This would be the region's first rainfall of their wet season.

src: 一些零散的熱帶陣雨將在禮拜天稍晚和禮拜一早上逐漸接近亞利桑那州，並在禮拜一晚間和禮拜二增強為廣泛地區到來降雨。
mt: Some scattered tropical showers will gradually approach Arizona in the late Sunday and early Monday morning, intensifying to a wide range of rainfall on Monday nights and Tuesdays.
ref: Some scattered tropical rain showers will begin to approach Arizona late Sunday and early Monday, before the rain becomes more widespread late Monday and Tuesday.

src: 暴雨將在禮拜二和禮拜三時間蔓延至四角地區 (Four Corners)。
mt: Heavy rain will spread to the Four Corners on Tuesdays and Wednesdays.
ref: Heavy rain will spread into the Four Corners on Tuesday and last through Wednesday.

src: 在十月，隨著北冰洋降溫，可以在美國看到一些強烈的氣溫波動，但熱帶地區將繼續保持溫暖天氣。
mt: In October, as the Arctic Ocean cools down, some strong temperature fluctuations can be seen in the United States, but tropical regions will continue to maintain warm weather.
ref: October can see some intense temperature swings across the U.S. as the Arctic gets cooler, but the tropics remain quite warm.

src: 有時候，這可能導致距離不遠的兩地出現截然不同的氣溫。
mt: At times, this may lead to sharply different temperatures between the two places not far away.
ref: Sometimes this leads to dramatic changes in temperature over short distances.

src: 在禮拜天美國中部地區則出現了類似情形。
mt: Similar incidents occurred on Sunday in the central United States.
ref: There is a great example of dramatic temperature differences through the central U.S. on Sunday.

src: 密蘇里州堪城與內布拉斯加州奧馬哈，還有聖路易斯和愛荷華州得梅因之間有著將近 20 度的溫差。
mt: The temperature difference between Kamehameha, Missouri and Omaha, Nebraska, as well as St. Louis and Des Moines, Iowa is nearly 20 degrees.
ref: There is nearly a 20-degree temperature difference between Kansas City, Missouri, and Omaha, Nebraska, and between St. Louis and Des Moines, Iowa.

src: 在之後幾天，殘留的夏季暖流將試圖重新匯集並再次席捲附近地區。
mt: Over the next few days, the remaining summer warm currents will attempt to reassemble and sweep through the surrounding area again.
ref: Over the next few days, lingering summer warmth will try to build and expand again.

src: 美國中部和東部大部分地區預計將在十月初一嚐暖流帶來的溫暖，從南部平原 (Southern Plains) 到東北部廣泛地區預計將出現 80 幾度高溫。
mt: Much of the U.S. central and eastern regions are expected to experience the warmth of a warm current by early October, with temperatures expected to reach over 80 degrees from the Southern Plains to the northeast.
ref: Much of the central and eastern U.S. is expected to see a warm start to October with widespread 80s from the Southern Plains to parts of the Northeast.

src: 紐約市在禮拜二有望達到 80 度，這可能高出平均將近 10 度。
mt: New York City is expected to reach 80 degrees on Tuesday, which may be nearly 10 degrees above the average.
ref: New York City could reach 80 degrees on Tuesday, which would be approximately 10 degrees above average.

src: 我們的長期天氣預測顯示在十月上半旬，在美國東部地區有很大機會出現高於平均值的氣溫。
mt: Our long-term weather forecast shows that there is a high chance of higher temperatures above average in the eastern United States during the first half of October.
ref: Our long term climate forecast is indicating high chances for above-average temperatures for the eastern U.S. through the first half of October.

src: 超過 2000 萬人收看布雷特·卡瓦諾 (Brett Kavanaugh) 聽證會
mt: Over 20 million people watched Brett Kavanaugh hearings
ref: More than 20 million people watched Brett Kavanaugh hearing

src: 超過 2000 萬人在六大電視頻道收看了禮拜四的布雷特·卡瓦諾 (Brett Kavanaugh) 最高法院大法官任命聽證會。一名女性，Christine Blasey Ford，控指卡瓦諾在 1980 年代對其進行性侵。
mt: More than 20 million people watched a hearing on Thursday’s Brett Kavanaugh Supreme Court appointment on six major television channels. A woman, Christine Blasey Ford, accused Kavanaugh of sexually assaulting her in the 1980s.
ref: More than 20 million people watched Thursday's gripping testimony by Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh and the woman who accused him of a sexual assault that allegedly occurred in the 1980s, Christine Blasey Ford, on six television networks.

src: 同時，這場政治僵局持續膠著，電視業者更為禮拜五的最後反轉暫停播放預定的電視節目：由亞利桑那州參議員傑夫·弗萊克 (Jeff Flake) 提出建議聯邦調查局 (FBI) 就控訴開展歷時一個禮拜的調查。
mt: Meanwhile, the political stalemate continued to stalemate, with television operators even suspending scheduled TV programs at Friday's last turn: Arizona State Senator Jeff Flake suggested that the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) file a complaint to launch a week-long investigation.
ref: Meanwhile, the political standoff continued, with broadcasters interrupting regular programming for Friday's last-minute twist: an agreement engineered by Arizona Sen. Jeff Flake for the FBI to conduct a one-week investigation of the charges.

src: Ford 向參議院司法委員會表示她百分之百確定卡瓦諾在一場高中派對中在喝醉酒的情況下，猥褻她並嘗試脫去她的衣物。
mt: Ford told the Senate Judiciary Committee that she was 100% sure that Cavanaugh was intoxicated at a high school party, lewd her and tried to take off her clothes.
ref: Ford told the Senate Judiciary Committee that she's 100 percent certain that Kavanaugh groped her drunkenly and tried to take off her clothes at a high school party.

src: 卡瓦諾則在其慷慨激昂的證詞中表示，他百分之百確定指控為無中生有。
mt: In his generous testimony, Cavanaugh stated that he was 100% certain the charges were unfounded.
ref: Kavanaugh, in impassioned testimony, said he's 100 percent certain that it didn't happen.

src: 根據尼爾森 (Nielsen) 的報告，約莫有超過 2040 萬人次在禮拜五收看了這次聽證會。
mt: According to Nielsen's report, more than 20.4 million people watched this hearing on Friday.
ref: It's likely that more than the 20.4 million people reported by Nielsen on Friday watched it.

src: 公司統計了 CBS、ABC、NBC、CNN、Fox 新聞頻道和 MSNBC 的平均收看人次。
mt: The company counted the average viewership of CBS, ABC, NBC, CNN, Fox News Channel and MSNBC.
ref: The company was counting average viewership on CBS, ABC, NBC, CNN, Fox News Channel and MSNBC.

src: 統計人次未包括其他播放聽證會的頻道，其中包括 PBS、C-SPAN 和 Fox 財經頻道。
mt: Statistics do not include other channels that broadcast hearings, including PBS, C-SPAN and Fox Financial channels.
ref: Figures weren't immediately available for other networks that showed it, including PBS, C-SPAN and the Fox Business Network.

src: 而且尼爾森通常無法計算在辦公室的觀看人次。
mt: Moreover, Nelson is usually unable to calculate the number of viewers in an office.
ref: And Nielsen usually has some trouble measuring people who watch in offices.

src: 從這方面考慮，有類似一個足球比賽或金像獎廣播大小的觀眾未被納入統計。
mt: From this perspective, viewers of a similar size to a football game or Golden Image Award broadcasting are not included in the statistics.
ref: To put that in perspective, that's an audience size similar to that for a playoff football game or the Academy Awards.

src: 尼爾森表示，在 Fox 新聞頻道，邀請到的意見嘉賓主持強烈支持卡瓦諾的證詞。其這次日間聽證會的觀看人次也以平均 569 萬領先所有新聞頻道。
mt: Nielsen said that in Fox News, invited guest speakers to host a strong support for Kavanaugh's testimony. The day-time hearing also saw an average of 5.69 million viewers leading all news channels.
ref: Fox News Channel, whose opinion hosts have strongly backed Kavanaugh's appointment, led all networks with an average of 5.69 million viewers during the all-day hearing, Nielsen said.

src: 其次為 ABC 的 326 萬人次。
mt: Second is ABC's 3.26 million.
ref: ABC was second with 3.26 million viewers.

src: 尼爾森表示，CBS 則有 31 萬人次，NBC 有 29.4 萬人次，MSNBC 有 28.9 萬人次而 CNN 則有 25.2 萬人次。
mt: Nielsen said that CBS had 310,000 people, NBC 294,000 people, MSNBC 289,000 people and CNN 252,000 people.
ref: CBS had 3.1 million, NBC had 2.94 million, MSNBC had 2.89 million and CNN had 2.52 million, Nielsen said.

src: 聽證會過後，人們對其的興趣依然未見減退。
mt: After the hearing, people's interest in it has not diminished.
ref: Interest remained high after the hearing.

src: 弗萊克為禮拜五發生的事件中的主角。
mt: Fleck is the main character of the events that occurred on Friday.
ref: Flake was the central figure in Friday's drama.

src: 在其共和黨辦公室發出聲明稱他將投下支持卡瓦諾的一票後，他在禮拜五早上被 CNN 和 CBS 鏡頭拍到在進入參議院司法委員會的電梯時遭反對人士大聲呼罵。
mt: After his Republican office issued a statement saying he would cast a vote in support of Cavanaugh, he was shot on Friday morning by CNN and CBS and was verbally abused by opponents as he entered the Senate Judiciary Committee's elevator.
ref: After the moderate Republican's office issued a statement that he would be voting in favor of Kavanaugh, he was caught be CNN and CBS cameras Friday morning being shouted at by protesters as he tried to ride an elevator to a Judiciary Committee hearing.

src: 在 CNN 電視直播可見，他在被斥罵的數分鐘期間保持站立且低著頭。
mt: On CNN's live television, he stood up and looked down for several minutes of being scolded.
ref: He stood with eyes downcast for several minutes as he was berated, televised live on CNN.

src: 「我現在正站在你的面前，」一名女士說道。
mt: "I'm standing right in front of you right now," said a woman.
ref: "I'm standing right here in front of you," one woman said.

src: 「你覺得他在對著整個國家說實話嗎？
mt: "Do you think he's telling the truth to the whole country?
ref: "Do you think he's telling the truth to the country?

src: 有人和他說，「你有權力而那麼多女人根本沒有力量。」
mt: Someone told him, "You have power, and so many women have no power at all."
ref: He was told, "you have power when so many women are powerless.""

src: 弗萊克表示他的辦公室已發出聲明，並在電梯關門之前表示他在委員會聽證會中將有更多話要說。
mt: Fleck stated that his office had issued a statement, and before the elevator closed, he said he would have more to say at the committee hearing.
ref: Flake said that his office had issued a statement and said, before the elevator closed, that he would have more to say at the committee hearing.

src: 有線電視及廣播網絡都在之後實時轉播司法委員會對是否通過卡瓦諾的提名晉升為參議員進行的投票。
mt: Cable television and radio networks later broadcast live the judicial committee's vote on whether to be promoted to senator through Kavano's nomination.
ref: The cable and broadcast networks were all covering live hours later, when the Judiciary Committee was to vote to advance Kavanaugh's nomination to the full Senate for a vote.

src: 但弗萊克表示他只會在確定聯邦調查局將在未來一個禮拜調查對提名人的指控後才會這樣做，這也是少數民主黨員的訴求。
mt: However, Fleck said he would only do so after confirming that the Federal Bureau of Investigation would investigate allegations against the nominees within a week, which is also a demand from minority Democrats.
ref: But Flake said he would only do so with the understanding that the FBI would look into the allegations against the nominee for the next week, which minority Democrats have been urging.

src: 弗萊克在和他的朋友，民主黨參議員柯里斯·昆斯 (Chris Coons) 交談後更堅定了其信念。
mt: After talking to his friend, Democratic Senator Chris Coons, Fleck became even more firm in his belief.
ref: Flake was convinced in part by conversations with his friend, Democratic Sen. Chris Coons.

src: 在與昆斯和數名參議員交談後，弗萊克做出了決定。
mt: After talking to Quins and several senators, Fleck made a decision.
ref: After a conversation with Coons and several senators afterwards, Flake made his decision.

src: 弗萊克的決定具有權力，因為很明顯的是共和黨員不會在沒有進行調查的情況下投下支持卡瓦諾的一票。
mt: Fleck's decision had power, because it was clear that Republicans would not vote in favor of Cavanaugh without conducting an investigation.
ref: Flake's choice had power, because it was evident Republicans would not have the votes to approve Kavanaugh without the investigation.

src: 川普總統已對針對卡瓦諾的指控展開聯邦調查。
mt: President Trump has launched a federal investigation into allegations against Kavanaugh.
ref: President Trump has opened an FBI investigation into the allegations against Kavanaugh.

src: 英國首相梅 (May) 指控評論家為對英國脫歐進行「政治遊戲」
mt: UK Prime Minister May accuses critics of "political games" about Brexit
ref: British PM May accuses critics of 'playing politics' over Brexit

src: 針對指其脫歐計畫為將英國的未來置於「政治遊戲」的籌碼並破壞國家利益的評論，首相特蕾莎·梅 (Theresa May) 在星期日泰晤士報 (Sunday Times) 的訪問中指控相關評論。
mt: In response to comments that the Brexit plan was intended to place Britain's future in a "political game" and undermine national interests, Prime Minister Theresa May accused relevant comments in an interview with Sunday Times.
ref: Prime Minister Theresa May accused critics of her plans to leave the European Union of "playing politics" with Britain's future and undermining the national interest in an interview with the Sunday Times newspaper.

src: 英國首相特蕾莎·梅在 2018 年 9 月 29 日參加英國伯明罕的保守黨會議。
mt: UK Prime Minister Theresa May attended the Conservative Party Conference in Birmingham, UK on 29 September 2018.
ref: Britain's Prime Minister Theresa May arrives for the Conservative Party Conference in Birmingham, Britain, September 29, 2018.

src: 在她登上報紙頭條的訪問的另一個訪問中，她的內閣前任外交大臣 Boris Johnson 繼續攻擊她的契克斯脫歐計畫，表示讓英國和歐盟向對方收取關稅的建議為「荒謬至極」。
mt: In another interview where she was featured on the headlines of a newspaper, her former cabinet minister Boris Johnson continued to attack her Chequers' Brexit plan, saying that the proposal to have Britain and the European Union collect tariffs from each other was "absurd".
