ref: In another interview next to the one with her on the newspaper's front page, her former foreign minister Boris Johnson pressed his attack of her so-called Chequers plan for Brexit, saying a proposal that Britain and the EU should collect each other's tariffs was "entirely preposterous."

src: Wayde Sims 槍擊案：警方逮捕 LSU 球星死亡槍擊案的嫌疑人 Dyteon Simpson
mt: Wayde Sims shooting: Police arrest suspect Dyteon Simpson of LSU shooting
ref: Wayde Sims shooting: Police arrest suspect Dyteon Simpson in LSU player's death

src: 警方已逮捕涉嫌 20 歲 LSU 籃球球星 Wayde Sims 的死亡槍擊案嫌犯。
mt: Police have arrested a suspect in the shooting of 20-year-old basketball star Wayde Sims.
ref: Police have arrested a suspect in the fatal shooting death of Wayde Sims, a 20-year-old basketball player at LSU.

src: 巴頓魯治警察部門稱，20 歲的 Dyteon Simpson 已被以二級殺人罪名逮捕並監押。
mt: The Baton Rouge Police Department said that the 20-year-old Dyteon Simpson has been arrested and detained on second-degree murder charges.
ref: Dyteon Simpson, 20, has been arrested and booked into prison on a second-degree murder charge, the Baton Rouge Police Department said.

src: 警方釋出 Sims 與 Simpson 的糾紛影片，並表示 Sims 在打鬥中丟失了其眼鏡。
mt: Police released a video of the Sims vs. Simpson dispute, saying that Sims lost his glasses in the fight.
ref: Officials released video of the confrontation between Sims and Simpson, and police said Sims lost his glasses during the fight.

src: 根據 CBS 的附屬公司 WAFB 的報告，警方在案發現場拾獲其眼鏡，並表示在上面找到 Simpson 的 DNA 基因。
mt: According to a report by WAFB, a subsidiary of CBS, police found his glasses at the crime scene and said they had found Simpson's DNA gene on it.
ref: Police recovered the glasses from the scene and said they found Simpson's DNA on them, CBS affiliate WAFB reports.

src: 在審問 Simpson 後，警方表示他已承認槍殺 Wayde。
mt: After interrogating Simpson, police said he had admitted to shooting Wayde.
ref: After questioning Simpson, police said he admitted to fatally shooting Wayde.

src: 代訴人表示，他的保釋金已被定為 $350,000。
mt: The plaintiff stated that his bail has been set at $350,000.
ref: His bond has been set at $350,000, the Advocate reports.

src: 東巴頓魯治教區驗屍官辦公室在禮拜五釋出一份初步報告，指死因為從頭部打向脖子的一次槍擊。
mt: A preliminary report was released on Friday by the East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office, stating that the cause of the death was a gunshot to the neck from the head.
ref: The East Baton Rouge Parish Coroner's Office released a preliminary report Friday, saying the cause of death is a gunshot wound to the head into the neck.

src: 部門讚揚路易斯安那州警方逃犯專案小組、洲警方罪證化驗室、南方大學 (Southern University) 警方及地區市民的熱心配合，讓調查人員可以順利逮捕嫌犯。
mt: The department praised the enthusiastic cooperation of the Louisiana State Police Fugitive Offenders Special Task Force, the Continental Police Crime Laboratory, Southern University Police and local citizens, allowing investigators to successfully apprehend suspects.
ref: The department is crediting the Louisiana State Police fugitive task force, the state police crime lab, Southern University police and area citizens in assisting in the investigation leading to the arrest.

src: LSU 運動指導員 Joe Alleva 感謝地區執法機關「對追求正義的辛勤偵查」。
mt: LSU Sports Supervisor Joe Alleva thanks the regional law enforcement agency for “hard work investigating the pursuit of justice.”
ref: LSU athletic director Joe Alleva thanked area law enforcement for its "diligence and pursuit of justice."

src: Sims 年僅 20 歲。
mt: Sims is 20 years old.
ref: Sims was 20 years old.

src: 這名身高 6 英尺 6 英寸的前鋒在巴頓魯治長大，其父親 Wayne，亦是 LSU 的籃球好手。
mt: This six-foot-six-inch forward grew up in Baton Rouge, his father Wayne also a basketball player of LSU.
ref: The 6-foot-6 forward grew up in Baton Rouge, where his father, Wayne, also played basketball for LSU.

src: 他在上一季獲得每場平均 5.6 分和 2.6 個籃板的成績。
mt: He averaged 5.6 points and 2.6 rebounds per game in the previous season.
ref: He averaged 5.6 points and 2.6 rebounds a game last season.

src: 在禮拜五早上，LSU 籃球教練 Will Wade 稱球隊對於 Wayde 的死訊感到「悲憤」且「震驚不已」。
mt: On Friday morning, LSU basketball coach Will Wade said the team was "deeply saddened" and "shocked" by the news of Wayde's death.
ref: On Friday morning, LSU basketball coach Will Wade said the team is "devastated" and "in shock" by Wayde's death.

src: 「這是你在任何時間都會擔心發生的事情，」Wade 說道。
mt: “It’s something you’re worried about at any time,” Wade said.
ref: "This is what you worry about at all times," Wade said.

src: 墨西哥城火山噴出灰燼
mt: Mexico City volcano erupts with ash.
ref: Volcano spews ash on Mexico City

src: 波波卡特佩特火山噴出的灰燼已蔓延至墨西哥首都南部街頭。
mt: The ash from the Popocatepet volcano has spread to southern streets of Mexico's capital.
ref: Ash spewing from the Popocatepetl volcano has reached the southern neighborhoods of Mexico's capital.

src: 國家防止災害中心 (National Center for Disaster Prevention) 在火山口偵查到了活動並在 24 小時內錄得 183 次噴氣情況，在禮拜六警告墨西哥人民不要接近火山。
mt: The National Center for Disaster Prevention detected activity at the volcano crater and recorded 183 eruptions within 24 hours, warning Mexicans on Saturday not to approach the volcano.
ref: The National Center for Disaster Prevention warned Mexicans on Saturday to stay away from the volcano after activity picked up in the crater and it registered 183 emissions of gas and ash over 24 hours.

src: 中心持續錄得多次轟聲和震動。
mt: The center has been continuously recording multiple blasts and vibrations.
ref: The center was monitoring multiple rumblings and tremors.

src: 社交媒體的圖像顯示在墨西哥城如 Xochimilco 等地區車輛擋風玻璃已鋪上薄薄的一層灰燼。
mt: Social media images show a thin layer of ash on the windshields of vehicles in Mexico City, such as Xochimilco.
ref: Images on social media showed thin layers of ash coating car windshields in neighborhoods of Mexico City such as Xochimilco.

src: 在 2017 年 9 月撼動墨西哥中部的 7.1 級地震後，地球物理學家已注意到這座座落於首都東南處 45 英里（72 公里）的火山活動增加。
mt: Following the 2017 September earthquake that struck central Mexico, geophysicists have noted an increase in volcanic activity at a distance of 45 miles (72 kilometers) southeast of the capital.
ref: Geophysicists have noticed an increase in activity at the volcano that sits 45 miles (72 kilometers) southeast of the capital since a 7.1-magnitude earthquake rocked central Mexico in September 2017.

src: 這座被稱為「Don Goyo」的火山自 1994 年以來已然處於活躍狀態。
mt: This volcano, known as "Don Goyo," has been active since 1994.
ref: The volcano known as "Don Goyo" has been active since 1994.

src: 在獨立投票週年前，警方與加泰隆尼亞分裂主義者發生衝突
mt: Police clashed with Catalan separatists before the anniversary of the independence vote
ref: Police clash with Catalan separatists ahead of independence vote anniversary

src: 在禮拜六，一群支持獨立的反對人士在巴塞羅納與暴動警察發生衝突，六名人士被逮捕。數千名民眾加入反對示威以紀念加泰隆尼亞對國家分裂獨立的兩極化投票結果一週年。
mt: On Saturday, a group of pro-independence opponents clashed with riot police in Barcelona, and six were arrested. Thousands joined the protests in memory of a week-long bipolarized vote in Catalonia to separate the country.
ref: Six people were arrested in Barcelona on Saturday after pro-independence protesters clashed with riot police, and as thousands joined rival demonstrations to mark the first anniversary of Catalonia's polarizing vote on secession.

src: 一群被暴動警察攔阻且戴著面罩的支持分裂人士向他們扔擲雞蛋並傾倒粉末顏料，在平日裡佈滿旅客的街頭掀起以灰塵製造的朵朵黑雲。
mt: A group of riot police blocking them and wearing masks to support the split, throwing eggs at them and pouring powder paint over them, creating a dark cloud made of dust on the streets filled with tourists every day.
ref: A group of masked pro-separatists held back by riot police pelted them with eggs and hurled powder paint, creating dark clouds of dust in streets that would usually be thronged with tourists.

src: 當天稍晚亦爆出混戰，警方使用警棍控制鬥毆人群。
mt: The night also broke out into chaos, and the police used batons to control the fighting crowd.
ref: Scuffles also broke out later in the day with police using their batons to contain the fighting.

src: 在支持獨立團隊高呼「不會忘記，不會原諒」口號的數小時間，統一主義者也在對面高喊「西班牙萬歲」。
mt: During the hours of supporting independent teams shouting slogans such as "Don't forget, won't forgive," Uni-President also shouted across the street, "Long live Spain."
ref: Over several hours pro-independence groups chanting "No forgetting, no forgiveness" faced off with unionist protesters shouting, "Long live Spain."

src: 根據當地報導，十四名人士在示威中蒙受輕傷並接受治療。
mt: According to local reports, 14 people were lightly injured and treated during the protest.
ref: Fourteen people received treatment for minor injuries received in the protests, local press reported.

src: 在去年 10 月 1 日公投後，馬德里視是次公投為不合法而獨立主義人士卻為此連夜慶祝，這個充滿獨立主義的地區緊張局勢持續。
mt: Following the October 1 referendum last year, Madrid celebrated the night after viewing it as an illegal and independent citizen, a region filled with independence and tension that continues.
ref: Tensions remain high in the independence-minded region a year after the October 1 referendum deemed illegal by Madrid but celebrated by separatist Catalans.

src: 絕大部分投票人士投下獨立一票，但由於大量反對分裂統一人士選擇杯葛投票，是次公投投票率很低。
mt: Most of the voters cast their own ballots, but due to a large number of those against split reunification choosing to boycott the vote, this referendum has had a very low turnout.
ref: Voters chose overwhelmingly to become independent, though turnout was low with those against secession largely boycotting the vote.

src: 加泰隆尼亞政府稱在去年警方試圖阻止公投票站繼續進行投票時，地區多處爆發流血衝突，近 1000 人受傷。
mt: The Catalan government said that when police tried to prevent the public polling station from continuing to vote last year, violent clashes broke out in several places in the area, with nearly 1,000 people injured.
ref: According to Catalan authorities almost 1000 people were injured last year after police tried to stop the vote going ahead at polling stations across the region in violent clashes.

src: 支持獨立團體在禮拜五連夜在外紮營以阻止支持國家警方示威行動。
mt: Support for independent groups to set up camp outside on Friday nights to prevent supporting national police demonstrations.
ref: Pro-independence groups had camped out overnight on Friday to prevent a demonstration in support of the national police.

src: 示威如期舉行，但被迫採用另一條路徑。
mt: Protests were held as scheduled, but were forced to adopt another route.
ref: The demonstration went ahead but was forced to take a different route.

src: 68 歲的電工 Narcis Termes 與他的妻子參加分裂獨立示威，表示他不再對加泰隆尼亞成功爭取獨立抱有希望。
mt: Narcis Termes, a 68-year-old electrician, and his wife took part in a split independence demonstration, stating that he no longer had hope for Catalonia's success in its struggle for independence.
ref: Narcis Termes, 68, an electrician attending the separatist protest with his wife said he was no longer hopeful about the prospects of Catalonia gaining independence.

src: 「去年我們經歷了我們人生最美好的時刻之一。
mt: "Last year we had one of the best moments of our lives.
ref: "Last year we lived through one of our best moments.

src: 我看到我的父母因為可以投票而流下高興的眼淚，但我們現在卻止步不前，」他說道。
mt: I saw tears of joy from my parents, who were able to vote, but now we can't move forward, "he said.
ref: I watched my parents cry with joy at being able to vote but now we are stuck," he said.

src: 雖然在去年 12 月在地區投票獲得一次重要且驚險的的成功，加泰隆尼亞的支持獨立政黨卻因在他們許多最有名氣的領袖因為在組織公投和後續宣布獨立中扮演的角色自我流放或靜候偵訊而在今年後繼無力。
mt: Although Catalan's pro-independence party won an important and treacherous success in the region's vote last December, many of its most famous leaders have been unable to support the movement this year because of their role in organizing referendums and subsequent declarations of independence as self-disbanded or awaiting questioning.
ref: Despite managing a vital if narrow victory in regional elections last December, Catalan pro-independence parties have struggled to retain momentum this year with many of their best known leaders either in self imposed exile or in detention awaiting trial for their role in organizing the referendum and subsequent declaration of independence.

src: 42 歲的機械工 Joan Puig 用他的手機錄下支持警察的示威，表示這次的矛盾是由雙方政客燃起的。
mt: A 42-year-old mechanical worker, Joan Puig, used his mobile phone to record the protests in support of the police, saying that this conflict was ignited by politicians on both sides.
ref: Joan Puig, a 42-year-old mechanic recording the protest in support of the police on his phone, said the conflict had been stoked by politicians on both sides.

src: 「局勢變得越來越緊張，」他說道。
mt: "The situation is getting more and more tense," he said.
ref: "It's getting more and more tense," he said.

src: 九名加泰隆尼亞領袖之一的 Oriol Junqueras 在去年年末開始就遭到審前監禁。在禮拜六，他宣布將在明年參選歐盟議會。
mt: Oriol Junqueras, one of nine Catalan leaders, was tried for pre-trial detention at the end of last year. On Saturday, he announced his candidacy for the European Parliament next year.
ref: On Saturday, Oriol Junqueras, one of nine Catalan leaders in pre-trial jail since late last year, announced he would run in European Parliament elections next year.

src: 「參選歐盟議會是譴責我們從西班牙政府看到的民主價值觀和鎮壓的倒退的最佳辦法，」他表示。
mt: “To run for the European Parliament is the best way to condemn the democratic values and repression we have seen from the Spanish government,” he said.
ref: "Standing as a candidate for the European elections is the best way to denounce the regression in democratic values and repression we have seen from the Spanish government," he said.

src: 倫敦德里：男子開車撞擊房子後被捕
mt: Londonderry: Man arrested after driving into a house
ref: Londonderry: Men arrested after house rammed by car

src: 在倫敦德里，三名分別為 33、34 和 39 歲男子在一輛車反覆撞擊一間房子後被逮捕。
mt: In Delhi, London, three men, aged 33, 34 and 39, were arrested after being hit by a car repeatedly hitting a house.
ref: Three men, aged 33, 34 and 39, have been arrested after a car was repeatedly rammed into a house in Londonderry.

src: 事件在禮拜四下午約 7:30 分（英國夏令時間）發生在 Ballynagard Crescent。
mt: The event took place on Thursday afternoon around 7:30 pm (British Summer Time) at Ballynagard Crescent.
ref: The incident unfolded in Ballynagard Crescent on Thursday at about 19:30 BST.

src: 負責調查的警官 Bob Blemmings 表示事件對大門和建築本身造成了破壞。
mt: Police officer Bob Blemmings, who was in charge of the investigation, said the incident had caused damage to the main gate and the building itself.
ref: Det Insp Bob Blemmings said damage was caused to the gates and the building itself.

src: 在其中，也可能有人向汽車發射強孥。
mt: In some cases, there may also be someone firing a strong slug at a car.
ref: A crossbow may also have been fired at the car at some point.

src: Menga 助利雲斯頓 (Livingston) 1-0 險勝流浪 (Rangers)
mt: Menga helps Livingston 1-0 Rangers
ref: Menga strike gives Livingston 1-0 win over Rangers

src: Dolly Menga 射入的第一個入球讓利雲斯頓獲得凱旋勝利
mt: Dolly Menga scored his first goal to give Livingston a triumphant victory
ref: Dolly Menga's first goal for Livingston secured victory

src: 升級的利雲斯頓重挫流浪，讓 Steven Gerrard 迎來作為 Ibrox 俱樂部經理 18 場比賽中的第二場敗仗。
mt: The upgraded Livingstone thwarted the drift, bringing Steven Gerrard to a second defeat in 18 games as Ibrox Club Manager.
ref: Promoted Livingston stunned Rangers to consign Steven Gerrard to just his second defeat in 18 games as manager of the Ibrox club.

src: 隨著 Gary Holt 的球隊與喜百年 (Hibernian) 比分同為榜單上的第二位，Dolly Menga 的入球證明了兩隊球隊間的差異。
mt: With Gary Holt's team ranking second on the list along with Hibernian, Dolly Menga's goal proves the difference between the two teams.
ref: Dolly Menga's strike proved to be the difference as Gary Holt's side moved level with Hibernian in second.

src: Gerrard 一方在本賽季的英超聯賽中未獲得客場勝利，並將在下禮拜天對戰分數領先 8 分的赫斯 (Hearts)。
mt: The Gerrard team did not win a away game in the Premier League this season, and will play Hearts, who led by 8 points next Sunday.
ref: Gerrard's side remain without an away win in the Premiership this season and face leaders Hearts, who they trail by eight points, next Sunday.

src: 在那之前，流浪將在禮拜四的歐洲聯賽本場迎戰維也納快速 (Rapid Vienna)。
mt: Prior to that, Rangers would play against Rapid Vienna in the European League on Thursday.
ref: Before then, Rangers host Rapid Vienna in the Europa League on Thursday.

src: 與此同時，利雲斯頓將同賽區的不敗戰績增加至六場比賽。Holt 自上個月取代 Kenny Miler 成為球隊主教練後仍然未嚐到敗績。
mt: Meanwhile, Livingston has increased its undefeated record in the same division to six games. Holt has not tasted a defeat since he replaced Kenny Miler as head coach last month.
ref: Livingston, meanwhile, extend their unbeaten run in the division to six games, with head coach Holt still to taste defeat since replacing Kenny Miler last month.

src: 利雲斯頓在對戰大意的客隊時錯過了領先的機會
mt: Livingstone missed a chance to lead against the big away team.
ref: Livingston miss chances against blunt visitors

src: Holt 的球隊的直接進攻讓流浪無法招架，本應在入球前就領先比分。
mt: Holt's team's direct attack left the vagrant unable to defend themselves, and should have led the score before the goal.
ref: Holt's team should have been ahead long before they scored, with their directness causing Rangers all manner of problems.

src: Scott Robinson 突圍而出但未能及時把握射門機會，之後的 Alan Lithgow 在射門範圍內接到 Craig Halkett 的頂球後也未能順利入球。
mt: Scott Robinson broke through but was unable to catch the shot in time, and later Alan Lithgow failed to score after receiving Craig Halkett's top goal within range of the shot.
ref: Scott Robinson broke through but dragged his effort across the face of goal, then Alan Lithgow could only direct his effort wide after sliding in to meet Craig Halkett's header across goal.

src: 主隊清楚特定戰略可以輕鬆攻陷對方的防衛，因此未對流浪採取積極攻勢。
mt: The main force was clear that a specific strategy could easily capture the enemy's defense, so they did not take an active offensive against the vagrants.
ref: The hosts were content to let Rangers play in front of them, knowing they could trouble the visitors at set pieces.

src: 比賽的關鍵入球也是這麼這麼得來的。
mt: That's how the key goal of the game came about.
ref: And that was the manner in which the crucial goal came.

src: 在流浪的任意球下，利雲斯頓逮到其中的缺口。在 Declan Gallagher 和 Robinson 的聯合夾攻下，Menga 在稍稍停球後直接從罰球區中央射門。
mt: Under a free-throw ball, Livingston caught a gap. In a joint attack between Declan Gallagher and Robinson, Menga shot straight from the center of the penalty area after a slight stop.
ref: Rangers conceded a free-kick and Livingston worked an opening, Declan Gallagher and Robinson combining to set up Menga, who took a touch and scored from the center of the box.

src: 在那個階段，流浪本來在比賽中掌握球的大部分控制權，但在面對主隊得堅固防衛卻遲遲無法成功接近 Liam Kelly 的守門，
mt: At that stage, Wanderers had control of most of the ball in the game, but they were unable to get close to Liam Kelly's goal-keeper despite having to defend themselves against the team.
ref: By that stage, Rangers had dominated possession but had found the home defense impenetrable and goalkeeper Liam Kelly was largely untroubled,

src: 這種情況持續至比賽下半場，儘管 Alfredo Morelos 曾經嘗試射門但被 Kelly 成功救下。
mt: This situation continued until the second half of the game, although Alfredo Morelos had tried to shoot but was successfully rescued by Kelly.
ref: That pattern continued into the second half, though Alfredo Morelos did force a save from Kelly.

src: Scott Pittman 的射球被流浪守門員 Allan McGregor 攔下，而 Lithgow 則以一記外踢攻破利雲斯頓的另一個精彩戰略。
mt: Scott Pittman’s shot was blocked by drifter Allan McGregor, and Lithgow scored a wild kick to break another exciting strategy in Livingstone.
ref: Scott Pittman was denied by the feet of Rangers goalkeeper Allan McGregor and Lithgow flicked wide from another Livingston set play.

src: 兩隊在利雲斯頓罰球區持續交鋒，但皆成功化險為夷，直至兩次犯規換來的罰球— Halkett 因搶走替補球員 Glenn Middleton 的球，以及一次手球，方才打破僵局。
mt: The two teams continued to clash in the Lixton penalty area, but both succeeded in turning danger to nothing until Halkett broke the deadlock after two fouls were replaced by a free throw - Halkett took away the substitute player Glenn Middleton's ball and one handball.
ref: Crosses continually came into the Livingston box and were continually cleared, while two penalty claims - after Halkett's challenge on substitute Glenn Middleton, and one for handball - were waved away.

src: 利雲斯頓的「非凡」表現—分析
mt: Livingston’s “extraordinary” performance – Analysis
ref: 'Phenomenal' from Livingston - analysis

src: BBC 蘇格蘭的 Alasdair Lamont 在 Tony Macaroni Arena 報導
mt: BBC Alasdair Lamont in Scotland on Tony Macaroni Arena
ref: BBC Scotland's Alasdair Lamont at the Tony Macaroni Arena

src: 利雲斯頓的一次非凡表現和賽果。
mt: A remarkable performance and success in Livingston.
ref: A phenomenal performance and result for Livingston.

src: 對於球迷來說，他們表現卓越，並繼續在升班的道路上打出超出預期的精彩表現。
mt: For fans, they performed outstandingly and continued to perform outstandingly beyond expectations on the road to promotion.
ref: To a man, they were excellent, continuing to exceed expectations on this upward trajectory.

src: 他們的踢球風格和人員從回到最高級別以來幾乎從未出現變動，但 Holt 自從來到這個球隊後帶來的推動力讓其應該成為這一切背後的最大功臣。
mt: Their kicking style and personnel have almost never changed since they returned to the top level, but Holt's driving force since coming to this team should be the biggest contributor behind everything.
ref: Their style of play and personnel has scarcely changed since their return to the top flight, but great credit has to go to Holt for the way he has galvanized the team since his arrival.

src: 他有很多英雄。
mt: He has a lot of heroes.
ref: He had so many heroes.

src: 隊長 Halkett 也表現很好，成功組織了嚴密防守，讓 Menga 可以無後顧之憂地壓制 Connor Goldson 和 Joe Worrall。
mt: Captain Halkett also performed well, successfully organizing a tight defense, allowing Menga to suppress Connor Goldson and Joe Worrall without any worries.
ref: Captain Halkett was immense, marshalling a superbly-organized defense, while Menga kept Connor Goldson and Joe Worrall on their toes throughout.

src: 相反，流浪則顯得遜色不少。
mt: On the other hand, vagrants seem to be quite inferior.
ref: Rangers were short of inspiration, though.

src: 儘管他們在 Gerrard 的帶領下偶爾表現出色，卻仍然不符合標準。
mt: Although they occasionally performed well under Gerrard's leadership, they still did not meet the standard.
ref: As good as they have been at times under Gerrard, they fell well short of those standards.

src: 他們欠缺射門好手—並卻只有一次成功突破對手防衛—這對排名後退至榜單中間的流浪來說應該是一個警示。
mt: They lacked a shooting expert—and only once successfully broke through the opponent's defense—which should be a warning for those who retreated to the middle of the list.
ref: Their final ball was lacking - only once did they cut the home side open - and it is something of a wake-up call for Rangers, who find themselves in mid-table.

src: 艾爾多安 (Erdogan) 在科隆遭到毀譽參半的待遇
mt: Erdogan was treated with mixed honors in Cologne.
ref: Erdogan get mixed reception in Cologne

src: 在禮拜六（9 月 29 日）土耳其和德國首領早餐面談中，柏林的天空如民眾的笑臉般一片晴朗。
mt: On Saturday (September 29), breakfast interviews with the Turkish and German leaders showed that the sky in Berlin was as clear as a crowd's smiling face.
ref: There were smiles and blue skies on Saturday (September 29) as the leaders of Turkey and Germany met for breakfast in Berlin.

src: 這是艾爾多安總統德國訪問的最後一天。時次訪問引起多方爭論，其目的為修復與北大西洋公約組織 (NATO) 盟友間的關係。
mt: This was the last day of President Erdogan's visit to Germany. The visit sparked a heated debate over the purpose of repairing relations with NATO allies.
ref: It's the last day of President Erdogan's controversial visit to Germany - which is aimed at repairing relations between the NATO allies.

src: 兩國關係因不同事情出現分歧，其中包括人權、新聞自由和土耳其加入歐盟的申請。
mt: Relations between the two countries have diverged over various issues, including human rights, press freedom and Turkey's application to join the EU.
ref: They've fallen out over issues including human rights, press freedom and Turkey's accession to the EU.

src: 艾爾多安在之後前往科隆參加一間大清真寺的開幕典禮。
mt: After that, Eldoan went to Cologne to attend the opening ceremony of a large mosque.
ref: Erdogan then headed for Cologne to open a giant new mosque.

src: 科隆為土耳其境外擁有最多土耳其人口的地方。
mt: Cologne is the place with the most Turkish population outside of Turkey.
ref: The city is home to the largest Turkish population outside Turkey.

src: 警方引用安全理由阻止 25,000 人潮在清真寺前聚集，但大批支持者仍然抵達現場附近一睹他們總統的真容。
mt: Police cited security reasons to prevent 25,000 people from gathering in front of the mosque, but a large number of supporters still arrived near the scene to see their president's true face.
ref: Police cited security reasons to block a 25,000-strong crowd from gathering in front of the mosque, but plenty of supporters turned out nearby to see their president.

src: 數百名反艾爾多安的示威者—其中很多為庫爾德人—亦聚集對艾爾多安的警察和德國政府迎接其到德國訪問的舉動表示不滿。
mt: Hundreds of anti-Aldoan protesters - many of whom were Kurds - also gathered to express their discontent with the police and the German government's welcoming of their visit to Germany.
ref: Hundreds of anti-Erdogan protesters - many of them Kurdish - also made their voices heard, condemning both Erdogan's policies and the German government's decision to welcome him to the country.

src: 一些土耳其裔德國人把艾爾多安視為英雄，但卻也有人認為他是一名獨裁者。兩邊的聲音正好體現這名訪客的分歧點。
mt: Some Turkish-Germans consider Erdogan a hero, but some also consider him a dictator. The two voices on both sides reflect the point of the visitor's disagreement.
ref: The dueling protests reflect the divisiveness of a visitor hailed as a hero by some German Turks and reviled as an autocrat by others.

src: Deptford 馬路事故：自行車騎士撞車後重傷不治
mt: Deptford Road Accident: The Bike Knight dies from serious injury after colliding with a car
ref: Deptford road crash: Cyclist dies in collision with car

src: 一名自行車騎士在倫敦與汽車相撞後重傷不治。
mt: A cyclist was severely injured and died after colliding with a car in London.
ref: A cyclist has died in a collision involving a car in London.

src: 意外在早上約 10:15 分（英國夏令時間）發生在 Bestwood Street 和 Evelyn Street 交界處附近。該地段位於 Deptford 東南部，為城市的繁忙街段。
mt: The accident occurred around 10:15 a.m. (British Summer Time) near the intersection of Bestwood Street and Evelyn Street. The site is located in the south-east of Deptford and is a busy part of the city.
ref: The crash happened near the junction of Bestwood Street and Evelyn Street, a busy road in Deptford, in the south-east of the city, at about 10:15 BST.

src: 汽車駕駛已及時停車且傷者已受到專業醫護人員的照料，但受傷男子仍在現場不治死亡。
mt: The driver of the car has stopped in time and the injured have been taken care of by professional medical personnel, but the injured man still died on site.
ref: The driver of the car stopped and paramedics attended, but the man died at the scene.

src: 是次意外是繼數月前另一名自行車騎士在 Childers Street 被撞後肇事逃逸死亡後的第二起涉及自行車的意外事件。兩次意外現場相隔僅約一英里。
mt: The accident was the second incident involving a bicycle accident that occurred several months ago after the death of another cyclist who escaped after the collision on Childers Street. The two accidents were only about a mile apart.
ref: The crash comes months after another cyclist died in a hit-and-run on Childers Street, about a mile away from Saturday's crash.

src: 大倫敦警察局稱警官正嘗試找出死者身分並聯絡其近親。
mt: The Greater London Police Department said the police are trying to find out the identity of the deceased and contact his close relative.
ref: The Metropolitan Police said officers were working to identify the man and inform his next-of-kin.

src: 道路已封閉，公車路線亦已安排改道。當局亦呼籲摩托車及自行車騎手避免駛經該區域。
mt: The roads have been closed and bus routes have been rerouted. The authorities have also urged motorcyclists and cyclists to avoid passing through the area.
ref: Road closures and bus diversions are in place and motorists have been advised to avoid the area.

src: Long Lartin 監獄：六名警官在騷亂中受傷
mt: Long Lartin Prison: Six Police Officers Wounded in the Riots
ref: Long Lartin prison: Six officers hurt in disorder

src: 一名獄警表示，六名獄警在高安全等級男子監獄的一場騷亂中受傷。
mt: A prison guard said that six prison guards were injured in a riot at a high-security level men's prison.
ref: Six prison officers have been injured in a disturbance at a high security men's jail, the Prison Office has said.

src: 騷亂在禮拜天早上約 9:30 （英國夏令時間）在伍斯特郡的 HMP Long Lartin 爆發，並仍然持續。
mt: Riots broke out at HMP Long Lartin in Worcestershire around 9:30 am (British Summer Time) on Sunday morning and continued.
ref: Disorder broke out at HMP Long Lartin in Worcestershire at about 09:30 BST on Sunday and is ongoing.

src: 專家「暴風」警官已介入平定騷亂。是次騷亂由關押在同區的八名囚犯引起。
mt: The riot was caused by eight prisoners in the same district.
ref: Specialist "Tornado" officers have been brought in to deal with the disturbance, which involves eight inmates and is contained to one wing.

src: 警官傷況皆為輕微的面部受傷，並已在現場接受治療。
mt: The police officer's condition is all minor facial injuries and has been treated on site.
ref: The officers were treated for minor facial injuries at the scene.

src: 一名監獄署發言人表示：「受過特別訓練的警官已趕往現場以解決 HMP Long Lartin 的這次持續情況。
mt: A prison spokesman said: "Specially trained officers have rushed to the scene to address the ongoing situation of HMP Long Lartin.
ref: A Prison Service spokesperson said: "Specially trained prison staff have been deployed to deal with an ongoing incident at HMP Long Lartin.

src: 六名警官已接受適當治療。
mt: Six police officers have received appropriate treatment.
ref: Six members of staff have been treated for injuries.

src: 我們在我們的監獄裡不容忍暴力行為，並將確保相關人士將被轉介至警方受審，並可能需要延長其服役年數。」
mt: We do not tolerate violence in our prisons and will ensure that the persons involved will be referred to the police for trial and may need to extend their service life.”
ref: We do not tolerate violence in our prisons, and are clear that those responsible will be referred to the police and could spend longer behind bars."

src: HMP Long Lartin 關押了超過 500 名囚犯，其中包括國家的一些頭號危險罪犯。
mt: HMP Long Lartin holds more than 500 prisoners, including some of the nation’s top dangerous criminals.
ref: HMP Long Lartin holds more than 500 prisoners, including some of the country's most dangerous offenders.

src: 在六月，據報監獄的典獄長曾遭受一名囚犯襲擊並需要接受醫院治療。
mt: In June, it was reported that the prison warden had been attacked by a prisoner and needed hospital treatment.
ref: In June it was reported that the prison's governor received hospital treatment after being attacked by a prisoner.

src: 在去年十月，數名防暴警察被召集到監獄以解決警官涉及被撞球打傷的嚴重騷亂事件。
mt: In October of last year, several riot police were summoned to prison to resolve a serious riot involving an officer injured by a billiard ball.
ref: And in October last year riot officers were called to the prison to deal with a serious disturbance in which staff were attacked with pool balls.

src: 颶風羅莎可能為鳳凰城、拉斯維加斯、鹽湖城帶來暴洪（乾旱地區可能因此受益）
mt: Hurricane Rosa could bring flooding to Phoenix, Las Vegas, and Salt Lake City (dry areas could benefit from this)
ref: Hurricane Rosa Threatening Phoenix, Las Vegas, Salt Lake City With Flash Flooding (Drought Areas May Benefit)

src: 熱帶低氣壓很少吹襲亞利桑那州，但這正是預計將在下禮拜初發生的事情。隨著颶風羅莎的餘威掃過西南沙漠 (Desert Southwest)，預計將為附近地區帶來暴洪危機。
mt: Tropical depressions rarely hit Arizona, but that’s exactly what’s expected to happen early next week. With Hurricane Rosa’s sweep across the Desert Southwest, it’s expected to bring a flood crisis to the region.
ref: It's rare for a tropical depression to hit Arizona, but that's exactly what's likely to happen early happen early next week as Hurricane Rosa's remaining energy tracks across the Desert Southwest, delivering flash flooding risks.

src: 國家氣象服務已針對亞利桑那州西部至東部內華達州、加州東南部和猶他州，發布禮拜一至禮拜二的暴洪警報，其中包括鳳凰城、弗拉格斯塔夫 (Flagstaff)、拉斯維加斯、和鹽湖城等地。
mt: The National Meteorological Service has issued a flood warning from Monday to Tuesday for western Arizona to eastern Nevada, southeastern California and Utah, including Phoenix, Flagstaff, Las Vegas, and Salt Lake City.
ref: The National Weather Service has already issued flash flood watches for Monday and Tuesday for western Arizona into southern and eastern Nevada, southeastern California and Utah, including the cities of Phoenix, Flagstaff, Las Vegas, and Salt Lake City.

src: 羅莎預計將在禮拜二直接掃過鳳凰城，並在禮拜一稍晚時段逼近相關地區，同時帶來降雨。
mt: Rosa is expected to directly sweep through Phoenix on Tuesday, and approach the relevant areas later on Monday, bringing rain.
ref: Rosa is expected to take a direct path over Phoenix on Tuesday, approaching late Monday with rain.

src: 鳳凰城的國家氣象服務在一條 tweet 推送中表示，「自 1950 年來，只有十個熱帶氣旋成功以熱帶風暴或低氣壓的形式進入鳳凰城的 200 英里範圍！
mt: "Since 1950, only 10 tropical cyclones have successfully entered the 200-mile radius of Phoenix as tropical storms or low-pressure systems," the National Meteorological Service of Phoenix said in a tweet.
ref: The National Weather Service in Phoenix noted in a tweet that only "ten tropical cyclones have maintained tropical storm or depression status within 200 miles of Phoenix since 1950!

src: 卡特裏娜（1967 年）為距離亞利桑那州邊界 40 英里範圍的一個颶風。」
mt: Katrina (1967) was a hurricane in the 40-mile radius of the Arizona border."
ref: Katrina (1967) was a hurricane within 40 miles of the AZ border."

src: 最新的國家颶風中心模型預測將錄得 2 至 4 英吋的降雨量，並在亞利桑那州的 Mogollon Rim 地區更可能錄得高達 6 英吋的降雨量。
mt: The latest National Hurricane Center model predicts that it will record 2 to 4 inches of rainfall, and in the Mogollon Rim area of Arizona, it is more likely to record as much as 6 inches of rainfall.
ref: The latest National Hurricane Center models predict 2 to 4 inches of rainfall, with isolated amounts up to 6 inches in the Mogollon Rim of Arizona.

src: 西南沙漠的其他地區，包括中間的落磯山脈和大盆地 (Great Basin)，則可能錄得 1 至 2 英吋的降雨量，其中部分地區更可能錄得高達 4 英吋的降雨量。
mt: Other areas of the southwestern desert, including the middle Rocky Mountains and the Great Basin, may have recorded 1 to 2 inches of rainfall, with some areas possibly recording as much as 4 inches of rainfall.
ref: Other areas of the Desert Southwest including the central Rockies and the Great Basin are likely to get 1 to 2 inches, with isolated totals up to 4 inches possible.

src: 對於未受暴洪威脅的地區而言，由於相關地區飽受旱災所困，羅莎帶來的降雨可能是好事。
mt: For areas that are not threatened by floodwaters, the rainfall brought by Rosa can be a good thing due to the drought-stricken areas.
ref: For those out of flash flood risk, Rosa's rain may be a blessing since the region is drought-stricken.

src: 儘管洪水可能引發嚴重問題，但因西南地區目前正受旱災所困，上述預測的降雨可能反而有助於當地居民生活。
mt: Although the flood may cause serious problems, as the southwestern region is currently facing a drought disaster, the above predicted rainfall may actually help local residents live.
ref: Although flooding is a very serious concern, some of this rainfall will likely be beneficial since the Southwest is currently experiencing drought conditions.

src: 根據美國乾旱檢測 (U.S. Drought Monitor)，亞利桑那州超過百分之 40 的地區正受極度乾旱情況困擾，此級別為第二高的旱災等級，」weather.com 報導。
mt: According to the U.S. Drought Monitor, more than 40 percent of Arizona's areas are experiencing extreme drought conditions, the second-highest level of drought,” weather.com reports.
ref: According to the U.S. Drought Monitor, just over 40 percent of Arizona is experiencing at least extreme drought, the second highest category," weather.com reported.

src: 首先，颶風羅莎橫掃墨西哥下加利福尼亞半島，為相關地區帶來泥石流情況。
mt: Firstly, Hurricane Rosa swept across the Baja California Peninsula of Mexico, bringing mudslides to related areas.
ref: First, Hurricane Rosa's path leads to landfall across the Baja California peninsula of Mexico.

src: 羅莎在禮拜天早上仍然保持颶風強度，其最高風速為每小時 85 英里。當時颶風位於墨西哥 Punta Eugenia 西南部 385 英里處，並正以每小時 12 英里的速度北上。
mt: Rosa maintained hurricane strength on Sunday morning, with a maximum wind speed of 85 mph. At the time, the hurricane was located 385 mph southwest of Punta Eugenia, Mexico, and was moving north at a speed of 12 mph.
ref: Rosa, still at hurricane strength Sunday morning with maximum winds of 85 miles per hour, is 385 miles south of Punta Eugenia, Mexico and moving north at 12 miles per hour.

src: 暴風正遭遇太平洋的較冷海域，因此其威力將有所減退。
mt: A typhoon is facing a cooler Pacific Ocean, so its power will be reduced slightly.
ref: The storm is encountering cooler waters in the Pacific and therefore powering down.

src: 因此，預計將在禮拜一下午或傍晚時段，以熱帶暴風強度為墨西哥地區帶來泥石流情況。
mt: Therefore, it is expected to bring mudslides to the Mexican region at the intensity of tropical storms on Monday afternoon or evening.
ref: Thus, it's expected to make landfall in Mexico at tropical storm strength in the afternoon or evening on Monday.

src: 墨西哥部分地區的降雨量可能較多，帶來明顯洪水危險。
mt: Heavy rainfall in parts of Mexico may be greater, bringing a significant flood risk.
ref: Rainfall across portions of Mexico could be heavy, posing a significant flooding risk.

src: 「預計在下加利福尼亞半島至索諾拉 (Sonora) 西北地區將錄得總量為 3 至 6 英吋的降雨，其中部分地區降雨量更可能高達 10 英吋，」weather.com 報導。
mt: “We expect to see 3 to 6 inches of rainfall in the northern part of the Baja California Peninsula to Sonora, with some areas likely to see as much as 10 inches of rainfall,” weather.com reports.
ref: "Rainfall totals of 3 to 6 inches are expected from Baja California into northwestern Sonora, with up to 10 inches possible," weather.com reported.

src: 羅莎在之後將北行以熱帶暴風強度橫掃墨西哥，並在禮拜二清晨以熱帶低氣壓強度抵達亞利桑那州邊界。之後預計將北行橫掃亞利桑那州並最晚將在禮拜二深夜進入猶他州。
mt: Rosa will then head north towards Mexico in a tropical storm and arrive at the Arizona border in the early hours of Tuesday morning as a tropical depression. It is then expected to head north across Arizona and enter Utah by late Tuesday night.
ref: Rosa will then track north across Mexico as a tropical storm before reaching the Arizona border in the early morning hours Tuesday as a tropical depression, which will then track up through Arizona and into southern Utah by late Tuesday night.

src: 「羅莎或其餘威預計將帶來的主要危險為在下加利福尼亞半島、索諾拉西北地區、和美國西南沙漠地區帶來暴雨，」國家颶風中心表示。
mt: "The main danger that Rosa or the rest of the US is expected to bring is heavy rain in the Baja California Peninsula, in the northwest of Sonora, and in the southwestern deserts of the US," the National Hurricane Center said.
ref: "The main hazard expected from Rosa or its remnants is very heavy rainfall in Baja California, northwestern Sonora, and the U.S. Desert Southwest," the National Hurricane Center said.

src: 降雨預計將在沙漠地區帶來危險的暴洪和泥石流情況，以及在山坡地區引發山泥傾瀉的危險。
mt: Rainfall is expected to bring dangerous flash floods and mudslides in desert areas, as well as the danger of landslides in mountain slope areas.
ref: These rains are expected to produce life-threatening flash flooding and debris flows in the deserts, and landslides in mountainous terrain.

src: Midsomer Norton 攻擊：四名殺人未遂罪犯落網
mt: Midsomer Norton Attack: Four attempted murder criminals caught
ref: Midsomer Norton attack: Four attempted murder arrests

src: 一名 16 歲青年在 Somerset 被發現身中多次刀傷。隨後，三名青少年和一名 20 歲男子因涉嫌謀殺未遂被捕。
mt: A 16-year-old was found stabbed several times in Somerset. Three teenagers and a 20-year-old man were later arrested on suspicion of attempted murder.
ref: Three teenage boys and a 20-year-old man have been arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after a 16-year-old was found with stab wounds in Somerset.

src: 在禮拜六上午約 4 點（英國夏令時間），受害青年被發現倒臥在 Midsomer Norton 的 Excelsior Terrace 地區。
mt: On Saturday morning around 4am (British Summer Time), the victim youth was found lying in the Excelsior Terrace area of Midsomer Norton.
ref: The teenage boy was found injured in the Excelsior Terrace area of Midsomer Norton, at about 04:00 BST on Saturday.

src: 他隨即被送往醫院。醫院向外宣告傷者處於「穩定」狀況。
mt: He was immediately taken to the hospital, where the hospital declared that the injured were in a "stable" state.
ref: He was taken to hospital where he remains in a "stable" condition.

src: Avon 和 Somerset 警方表示，一名 17 歲、兩名 18 歲及一名 20 歲男子連夜在 Radstock 地區被逮捕。
mt: Avon and Somerset police say a 17-year-old, two 18-year-olds and a 20-year-old man were arrested overnight in the Radstock area.
ref: A 17-year-old, two 18-year-olds and a 20-year-old man were arrested overnight in the Radstock area, Avon and Somerset Police said.

src: 警官已呼籲任何可能持有事發經過手機錄像的人士與調查組聯絡。
mt: The police have called on anyone who may be holding a mobile video of the incident to contact the investigation team.
ref: Officers have appealed for anyone who may have any mobile phone footage of what happened to come forward.

src: 川普表示卡瓦諾已因來自民主黨的「刻薄和憤怒痛苦不堪」
mt: Trump says Kavano is suffering from "crime and anger" from the Democratic Party
ref: Trump says Kavanaugh 'suffered, the meanness, the anger' of the Democratic Party

src: 「向卡瓦諾投下贊成票即是對民主黨無情又無恥的戰術投下反對一票，」川普在西維吉尼亞 Wheeling 的一場集會中表示。
mt: “To vote for Cavalno is to vote against the Democratic’s ruthless and shameless tactics,” Trump said at a rally in West Virginia at Wheeling.
ref: "A vote for Judge Kavanaugh is a vote to reject the ruthless and outrageous tactics of the Democratic Party," Trump said at a rally in Wheeling, West Virginia.

src: 川普表示卡瓦諾已在其整個提名過程中因來自民主黨的「刻薄和憤怒痛苦不堪」。
mt: Trump said Kavanaugh has been suffering from "crime and anger" from the Democratic Party throughout his nomination process.
ref: Trump said that Kavanaugh has "suffered the meanness, the anger" of the Democratic Party throughout his nomination process.

src: 卡瓦諾在禮拜四到國會作證，義正辭嚴地否認來自 Christine Blasey Ford 的指控。Ford 表示卡瓦諾在數十年前當他們還是青少年的時候對其進行性侵害。
mt: Cavanaugh testified in Congress on Thursday, categorically denying allegations from Christine Blasey Ford. Ford said that Cavanaugh sexually assaulted them decades ago when they were teenagers.
ref: Kavanaugh testified before Congress on Thursday, forcefully and emotionally denying an allegation from Christine Blasey Ford that he sexually assaulted her decades ago when they were teenagers.

src: Ford 亦在聽證會上就她的指控作證。
mt: Ford also testified at the hearing on her charges.
ref: Ford also testified at the hearing about her allegation.

src: 總統在禮拜六表示，「美國民眾在當天看到了卡瓦諾的優秀、品格和勇氣」。
mt: The president said on Saturday, "The American people saw the excellent, moral and courageous qualities of Cavanaugh that day."
ref: The President said on Saturday that the "American people saw the brilliant and quality and courage" of Kavanaugh that day.

src: 「卡瓦諾法官的支持票即是對我們這個時代最有成就的法律思想之一，一位擁有出色的公共服務經驗的法學專家表示認同的一票，」他向西維吉尼亞支持者群眾表示。
mt: "The support vote of Judge Cavanaugh is one of the most successful legal ideas of our time. A legal expert with outstanding public service experience agreed with it," he told a crowd of supporters in West Virginia.
ref: "A vote to confirm Judge Kavanaugh is a vote to confirm one of the most accomplished legal minds of our time, a jurist with a sterling record of public service," he told the crowd of West Virginia supporters.

src: 總統談及共和黨投票在中期選舉中的重要性時，提到了卡瓦諾的提名。
mt: When discussing the importance of Republican voting in midterm elections, the President mentioned Carvano's nomination.
ref: The President obliquely referred to Kavanaugh's nomination while talking about the importance of Republican turnout in the midterm elections.

src: 「五個禮拜後就是我們人生中最重要最重要的選舉之一。
mt: "Five weeks later is one of the most important elections in our lives.
ref: "Five weeks away from one of the most important elections in our lifetimes.

src: 我沒有參選，但我肯定會參與其中，」他表示。
mt: I'm not running, but I'm definitely going to be involved, "he said.
ref: I'm not running, but I'm really running," he said.

src: 「這也是我到處為優秀的候選人爭取支持的原因。」
mt: "That's why I'm fighting for good candidates everywhere."
ref: "That's why I'm all over the place fighting for great candidates."

src: 川普認為民主黨正試圖「抵抗並從中阻撓」。
mt: Trump believes that the Democratic Party is trying to "resist and obstruct from it".
ref: Trump argued that Democrats are on a mission to "resist and obstruct."

src: 一名高級 GOP 領導助理向 CNN 表示，針對卡瓦諾參議員提名的首輪關鍵程序性投票預計將在禮拜五或之前舉行。
mt: A senior GOP leadership assistant told CNN that the first round of critical procedural voting on Senator Cavanaugh's nomination is expected to be held on Friday or before.
ref: The first key procedural vote on the Senate floor on Kavanaugh's nomination is expected to take place no later than Friday, a senior GOP leadership aide has told CNN.

src: 印尼地震、海嘯造成數百人死亡，且死亡人數持續攀升
mt: Hundreds of dead and rising deaths in Indonesia from earthquakes and tsunamis
ref: Hundreds killed by Indonesian quake, tsunami, with toll seen rising

src: 政府官員在禮拜六表示，席捲印尼蘇拉威西島的嚴重地震和海嘯，造成至少 384 人喪命，且很多居民亦被撲向海灘的陣陣巨浪捲走。
mt: Government officials said on Saturday that the severe earthquake and tsunami that swept through Sulawesi Island in Indonesia had killed at least 384 people, and many residents were swept away by a massive tidal wave that also swept onto the beach.
ref: At least 384 people were killed, many swept away as giant waves crashed onto beaches, when a major earthquake and tsunami hit the Indonesian island of Sulawesi, authorities said on Saturday.

src: 在禮拜五傍晚，數百人齊聚於帕盧市歡慶節日，高達六米（18 英尺）的海浪也在這個時候撲向人滿為患的海灘，造成多人死亡並摧毀沿途的一切。
mt: On Friday evening, hundreds of people gathered in the city of Palu to celebrate the festival, and a six-meter (18-foot) high wave also swooped into a crowded beach at this time, causing multiple deaths and destroying everything along the way.
ref: Hundreds of people had gathered for a festival on the beach in the city of Palu on Friday when waves as high as six meters (18 feet) smashed onshore at dusk, sweeping many to their deaths and destroying anything in their path.

src: 海嘯由 7.5 級地震引起。
mt: Tsunami was caused by a 7.5-magnitude earthquake.
ref: The tsunami followed a 7.5 magnitude earthquake.

src: 「昨天發生海嘯的時候，人們仍在海灘進行日常活動，因此未能及時撤離而造成嚴重傷亡，」印尼災害防救機構 BNPB 的發言人 Sutopo Purwo Nugroho 在雅加達的一場簡報會表示。
mt: "When a tsunami occurred yesterday, people were still doing daily activities on the beach, so they were unable to evacuate in time, resulting in serious casualties," said Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, a spokesman for Indonesia's disaster relief organization BNPB, at a briefing in Jakarta.
ref: "When the tsunami threat arose yesterday, people were still doing their activities on the beach and did not immediately run and they became victims," Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, the spokesman for Indonesia's disaster mitigation agency BNPB said in a briefing in Jakarta.

src: 「海嘯帶來的不只是海浪，還夾帶著汽車、木頭、房屋，摧毀陸地上的一切，」Nugroho 說道，並表示海嘯在抵達海岸線前以時速 800 公里（每小時 497 英里）掃過公海海面。
mt: "It's not just waves, it's also cars, wood and houses that carry the tsunami that destroy everything on land," says Nugroho. Nugroho explains that the tsunami swept across the open sea at 800 km/h (497 mph) before reaching the coast.
ref: "The tsunami didn't come by itself, it dragged cars, logs, houses, it hit everything on land," Nugroho said, adding that the tsunami had traveled across the open sea at speeds of 800 kph (497 mph) before striking the shoreline.

src: 他說，一些人在海嘯來襲的時候爬樹並躲過一劫。
mt: He said that some people climbed trees and escaped disaster when a tsunami hit.
ref: Some people climbed trees to escape the tsunami and survived, he said.

src: 近 16,700 名民眾被疏散至帕盧的 24 間避難中心。
mt: Nearly 16,700 people have been evacuated to 24 shelters in Palou.
ref: Around 16,700 people were evacuated to 24 centers in Palu.

src: 防災機構釋出的空拍照片顯示很多建築物和商店被摧毀、橋面斷裂，還有一間清真寺更已經沉沒。
mt: Photos released by the disaster prevention organization show that many buildings and shops have been destroyed, the bridge deck has been broken, and a mosque has also sunk.
ref: Aerial photographs released by the disaster agency showed many buildings and shops destroyed, bridges twisted and collapsed and a mosque surrounded by water.

src: 餘震在禮拜六繼續威脅沿海城市。
mt: Aftershocks continue to threaten coastal cities on Saturday.
ref: Aftershocks continued to rock the coastal city on Saturday.

src: 人口為 240 萬居民的一個地區感受到了一系列的地震。
mt: An area with a population of 2.4 million residents experienced a series of earthquakes.
ref: The series of earthquakes were felt in an area with 2.4 million people.

src: 印尼技術評估和應用機構 (BPPT) 的聲明表示，禮拜五強震釋放出的能量為第二次世界大戰中投放的廣島原子彈能量的約 200 倍。
mt: A statement from the Indonesian Agency for Technical Evaluation and Application (BPPT) said that the energy released by the strong earthquake on Friday was about 200 times the energy of the Hiroshima atomic bomb dropped during World War II.
ref: Indonesia's Agency for the Assessment and Application of Technology (BPPT) said in statement the energy released by Friday's massive quake was around 200 times the power of the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima in World War Two.

src: 聲明表示，城市的地理位置位於一個狹長的海灣盡頭，而可能會放大海嘯的大小。
mt: The statement indicates that the city's geographical location is at the end of a narrow bay, which may amplify the size of the tsunami.
ref: The geography of the city, which sits at the end of a long, narrow bay, could have magnified the size of the tsunami, it said.

src: Nugroho 形容損毀「廣泛」，並表示造成數千間民房、醫院、商場和酒店倒塌。
mt: Nugroho described the damage as "broad" and said it caused thousands of homes, hospitals, shopping malls and hotels to collapse.
ref: Nugroho described the damage as "extensive" and said thousands of houses, hospitals, shopping malls and hotels had collapsed.

src: 他表示，多名受難人的遺體被發現卡在倒塌的建築物廢墟當中，並已確認增加 540 名傷患及 29 名失蹤人口。
mt: He said that many victims' bodies were found stuck in the ruins of collapsed buildings and confirmed an increase of 540 injured people and 29 missing persons.
ref: Bodies of some victims were found trapped under the rubble of collapsed buildings, he said, adding 540 people were injured and 29 were missing.

src: Nugroho 表示，帕盧以北 300 公里（190 英里）的海岸線上的傷亡情況可能更嚴重。該地區被稱為 Donggala，也更接近是次地震震央。
mt: Nugroho says casualties on the coastline 300 kilometres (190 miles) north of Palou could be more serious. The area is known as Donggala and is closer to the epicenter of the earthquake.
ref: Nugroho said the casualties and the damage could be greater along the coastline 300 km (190 miles) north of Palu, an area called Donggala, which is closer to the epicenter of the quake.

src: 與 Donggala 的通訊「已經完全被切斷，我們無法獲知地區消息」Nugroho 說道。
mt: Communication with Donggala "has been completely cut off, we cannot know the area news" Nugroho said.
ref: Communications "were totally crippled with no information" from Donggala, Nugroho said.

src: 那裡有超過 300,000 名人口，」紅十字會在聲明中表示，同時聲明其員工和志願者已動身前往相關受影響地區。
mt: There are more than 300,000 people there, "the Red Cross said in a statement that its employees and volunteers have left to go to the affected areas.
ref: There are more than 300,000 people living there," the Red Cross said in a statement, adding that its staff and volunteers were heading to the affected areas.

src: 「悲劇已然發生，但事情可能變得更糟糕，」它表示。
mt: "Tragedy has already happened, but things may get worse," he says.
ref: "This is already a tragedy, but it could get much worse," it said.

src: 在禮拜六，機構收到多方批評未公告海嘯已襲擊帕盧，即便官員聲稱在發出警報的時候海嘯已經發生了。
mt: On Saturday, the organization received criticism from multiple parties that the tsunami had not been announced to have attacked Palu, even though officials claimed that the tsunami had already occurred at the time of issuing a warning.
ref: The agency on Saturday was widely criticized for not informing that a tsunami had hit Palu, though officials said waves had come within the time the warning was issued.

src: 在社交媒體上分享的民眾錄像中，可以聽見一名身處建築物頂樓的男子向下面的人高喊以提醒他人海嘯來襲。
mt: A video shared on social media can be heard as a man standing on the rooftop of a building shouting at people below to remind others of a tsunami.
ref: In amateur footage shared on social media a man on the upper floor of a building can be heard shouting frantic warnings of the approaching tsunami to people on the street below.

src: 在數分鐘內，一道水牆席捲海岸，帶走沿途的建築物和車輛。
mt: In a few minutes, a water wall swept across the coast, taking away buildings and vehicles along the way.
ref: Within minutes a wall of water crashes onto the shore, carrying away buildings and cars.

src: 路透社無法立即辨認相關錄像的真偽。
mt: Reuters were unable to immediately identify the authenticity of related footage.
ref: Reuters was not able to immediately authenticate the footage.

src: 地震和海嘯引發大斷電，切斷了帕盧周遭的通訊，讓官方機構難以組織救援工作。
mt: Earthquakes and tsunamis triggered a massive power outage, cutting off communication around Palu, making it difficult for official organizations to organize relief work.
ref: The quake and tsunami caused a major power outage that cut communications around Palu making it difficult for authorities to coordinate rescue efforts.

src: 官方表示，軍方已開始以貨運飛機從雅加達和其他城市運送救援物資至帕盧，但撤離人員仍然非常需要食物和其他基本必需品的援助。
mt: Officially, the military has begun to transport relief materials from Jakarta and other cities to Palu with cargo planes, but the evacuees still need assistance with food and other basic necessities.
ref: The military has started sending in cargo planes with aid from Jakarta and other cities, authorities said, but evacuees still badly need food and other basic necessities.

src: 城市的機場以重新開放以支援救援工作，並將在十月以前保持關閉。
mt: The city's airport will be reopened to support relief work and will remain closed until October.
ref: The city's airport has been reopened only for relief efforts and will remain closed until Oct.

src: 總統 Joko Widodo 安排在禮拜天到帕盧探訪疏散中心。
mt: President Joko Widodo has scheduled a Sunday visit to the evacuation center in Palu.
ref: President Joko Widodo was scheduled to visit evacuation centers in Palu on Sunday.

src: 印尼海嘯死亡人數上升至超過 800 人。
mt: The death toll from the Indonesian tsunami has risen to over 800.
ref: Indonesia Tsunami Toll Soars Above 800.

src: 情況非常糟糕。
mt: The situation is very bad.
ref: It Is Very Bad.

src: Doseba 先生表示，來自 Donggala 的世界展望會人員已安全抵達帕盧市，相關人員在他們辦公室的院子裡設置的防水庇護所休息。他們亦向他人表述沿路看到滿目瘡痍的情況。
mt: Mr. Doseba said World Vision staff from Donggala have safely arrived in Pallu City, where they rested in a water-resistant shelter set up in their office courtyard. They also told others that they had seen a path of blemishes along the way.
ref: While World Vision's staff from Donggala have made it safely to Palu city, where employees are sheltering in tarpaulin shelters set up in the courtyard of their office, they passed scenes of devastation on the way, Mr. Doseba said.

src: 「他們告訴我看到很多民房已經被摧毀，」他說道。
mt: "They told me that they saw a lot of houses destroyed," he said.
ref: "They told me they saw lots of houses that were destroyed," he said.

src: 情況非常糟糕。
mt: The situation is very bad.
ref: It is very bad.

src: 儘管支援團體已開始啟動沉重的救災工作，一些人卻抱怨在救災方面擁有豐富經驗的國外救援人員卻被阻止前往帕盧。
mt: Despite the support groups having begun to launch heavy relief work, some people complain that foreign rescue personnel with rich experience in disaster relief have been blocked from going to Palou.
ref: Even as aid groups began the grim motions of starting the gears of disaster relief, some complained that foreign aid workers with deep expertise were being prevented from traveling to Palu.

src: 根據印尼法規規定，來自海外的資金、物資和人員只有在災難現場被宣佈為國家災區後方可進入災區。
mt: According to Indonesian regulations, funds, materials and personnel from overseas can only enter the disaster area after being declared a national disaster area at the scene of the disaster.
ref: According to Indonesian regulations, funding, supplies and staffing from overseas can only start flowing if the site of a calamity is declared a national disaster zone.

src: 然而這還沒發生。
mt: But that hasn't happened yet.
ref: That has not happened yet.

src: 「這目前仍然是省市級別災難，」印尼紅十字會發言人 Aulia Arriani 說道。
mt: "This is still a provincial-level disaster," says Aulia Arriani, a spokesman for the Indonesian Red Cross.
ref: "It's still a province level disaster," said Aulia Arriani, a spokesperson for the Indonesian Red Cross.

src: 「只有在政府表示『好的，這是國家災難』後，我們才可以展開國際救援但這到現在還沒發生。」
mt: "Only when the government says 'Yes, this is a national disaster,' can we begin international relief efforts, but this hasn't happened yet."
ref: "Once the government says, "O.K., this is a national disaster," we can open for international assistance but there's no status yet."

src: 在禮拜五的地震和海嘯過後的第二個晚上，帕盧失蹤人口的親友仍然抱持希望他們的愛人可以奇蹟生還，為這次自然災害帶來一絲希望。
mt: On the second night after the earthquake and tsunami on Friday, relatives and friends of the missing people in Palu still hoped that their loved ones would miraculously survive, bringing a touch of hope to this natural disaster.
ref: As the second night fell on Palu after Friday's earthquake and tsunami, friends and family of those still missing were holding out hope that their loved ones would be the miracles that leaven the bleak story lines of natural disasters.

src: 在禮拜六，一名小男孩被發現在排水管道中並救出。
mt: On Saturday, a small boy was found in a drainage pipe and rescued.
ref: On Saturday, a little boy was plucked from a sewer.

src: 在禮拜天，救援人員解救了一名卡在建築物殘骸中兩天的女子，她的身邊還躺著已經死去的母親遺體。
mt: On Sunday, rescue personnel rescued a woman who had been stuck in the wreckage of a building for two days, with her mother's body lying beside her.
ref: On Sunday, rescuers freed a woman who had been pinned under rubble for two days with the body of her mother next to her.

src: 由印尼國家滑翔傘隊教練 Gendon Subandono 負責訓練的兩名滑翔傘好手也在是次地震中失蹤，他們曾參加在印尼這個月稍早舉辦的亞運會。
mt: Two paragliders trained by Indonesian National Paragliding Team coach Gendon Subandono also disappeared in the earthquake, and they participated in the Asian Games held earlier this month in Indonesia.
ref: Gendon Subandono, the coach of the Indonesian national paragliding team, had trained two of the missing paragliders for the Asian Games, which wrapped up earlier this month in Indonesia.

src: Mandagi 先生亦表示，那些被困在 Roa Roa 酒店的正是他的學生。
mt: Mr. Mandagi also said that those who are trapped at the Roa Roa Hotel are his students.
ref: Others of those trapped at the Roa Roa Hotel, Mr. Mandagi included, were his students.

src: 「作為滑翔傘領域的前輩，我也有我自己情感上的包袱，」他說道。
mt: "As a pioneer in the paraglider field, I also have my own emotional baggage," he says.
ref: "As a senior in the paragliding field, I have my own emotional burden," he said.

src: Gendon 先生回想起在得悉 Roa Roa 酒店倒塌後的數小時，他近乎瘋狂地不斷發送 WhatsApp 訊息給予位於帕盧的滑翔傘競爭對手，而他們在那個時候卻正參與海灘的慶祝活動。
mt: Mr. Gendon recalled how, hours after learning of the fall of Roa Roa, he was nearly crazy to send WhatsApp messages to paraglider competitors in Palou, who were at the time engaged in the beach celebration.
ref: Mr. Gendon recounted how, in the hours after the news of the Roa Roa Hotel collapse circulated among the paragliding community, he had desperately sent WhatsApp messages to the Palu competitors, who were taking part in the beach festival.

src: 但他的訊息卻一直顯示只有一個灰色勾勾，而不是兩個藍勾。
mt: But his message has always shown only a gray hook, rather than two blue hooks.
ref: His messages, though, only resulted in one gray check mark, rather than a pair of blue checks.

src: 「我想這表示我的訊息未成功發送，」他說道。
mt: "I think that means that my message was not sent successfully," he said.
ref: "I think that means the messages were not delivered," he said.

src: 小偷在 Newport on the Levee 趁著自動櫃員機裝鈔時竊取 $26,750
mt: A thief steals $26,750 in an automated teller machine
ref: Thieves take $26,750 during ATM refill at Newport on the Levee

src: 根據 Newport 警察局得一篇新聞稿，在禮拜五早上，數名小偷趁著 Brink 員工在 Newport on the Levee 替自動櫃員機進行裝鈔作業時竊取了 $26,750。
mt: According to a press release from the Newport Police Department, several thieves stole $26,750 on Friday morning while Brink employees were loading cash for ATMs in Newport on the Levee.
ref: Thieves on Friday morning stole $26,750 from a Brink's worker refilling an ATM at Newport on the Levee, according to a news release from the Newport Police Department.

src: 司機當時正清空該娛樂中心的自動櫃員機存放的鈔票，並準備運送更多鈔票，警官 Dennis McCarthy 在新聞稿中表示。
mt: The driver was then clearing out the cash stored at the entertainment center's automated teller machine and preparing to transport more cash, police officer Dennis McCarthy said in a press release.
ref: The car's driver had been emptying an ATM in the entertainment complex and preparing to deliver more money, Det. Dennis McCarthy wrote in the release.

src: 但在他不經意的時候，另一名男子「從 Brink 員工的後方繞過」並偷走一袋本應運送的鈔票。
mt: However, when he was unaware of it, another man "passed around from behind the Brink employees" and stole a bag of bills that should have been shipped.
ref: While he was occupied, another man "ran up from behind the Brink's employee" and stole a bag of money meant for delivery.

src: 根據新聞稿，目擊者看到數名嫌犯逃離現場，但警方未明列涉案人士的總數。
mt: According to the press release, witnesses saw several suspects fleeing the scene, but police did not specify the total number of people involved.
ref: Witnesses spotted multiple suspects fleeing the scene, according to the release, but police did not specify the number involved in the incident.

src: 任何持有關於嫌犯身分資訊的人士應致電 859-292-3680 聯繫 Newport 警察。
mt: Anyone holding information about the identity of the suspect should contact the Newport Police at 859-292-3680.
ref: Anyone with information about their identities should contact Newport police at 859-292-3680.

src: 肯伊·威斯特 (Kanye West)：饒舌歌手改名為 Ye
mt: Kanye West: Rapper renamed to Ye
ref: Kanye West: Rapper changes his name to Ye

src: 饒舌歌手肯伊·威斯特將他的名字改為— Ye。
mt: Rap singer Keny West changed his name to - Ye.
ref: Rapper Kanye West is changing his name - to Ye.

src: 他在禮拜六透過 Twitter 宣布改名，並寫道：「這個本來叫做肯伊·威斯特的人。」
mt: On Saturday, he announced his name change via Twitter, saying, "This man who was originally named Keny West."
ref: Announcing the change on Twitter on Saturday, he wrote: "The being formally known as Kanye West."

src: 41 歲的威斯特擁有 Ye 這個綽號已經一段時間，更以此命名他在六月推出的第八張專輯。
mt: 41-year-old West has been known by the nickname "ye" for some time and named his eighth album released in June.
ref: West, 41, has been nicknamed Ye for some time and used the moniker as the title for his eighth album, which was released in June.

src: 這次改名趕在他在週六夜現場 (Saturday Night Live) 的亮相，且他預計將在現場推出最新專輯 Yandhi。
mt: This time, he was renamed to make his debut on Saturday Night Live and is expected to release the latest album Yandhi live.
ref: The change comes ahead of his appearance on Saturday Night Live, where he is expected to launch his new album Yandhi.

src: 節目監製表示，原本計畫參加錄影的本是歌手亞莉安娜·格蘭德 (Ariana Grande)，但她因為「情緒原因」無奈取消並由威斯特頂上。
mt: The program's producer stated that originally planned to participate in the recording was singer Ariana Grande, but she was cancelled due to "emotional reasons" and topped by West.
ref: He replaces singer Ariana Grande on the show who cancelled for "emotional reasons," the show's creator said.

src: 除了是他現在藝名的縮寫外，威斯特在之前曾表示這個字對他而言有宗教意義。
mt: In addition to being an abbreviation of his current stage name, West had previously stated that this word had a religious significance for him.
ref: As well as being an abbreviation of his current professional name, West has previously said the word has religious significance for him.

src: 「我相信『ye』是在聖經中最常遇到的字眼，而在聖經中，這個字的意思是『你』，」威斯特在今年稍早與電台主播 Big Boy 論及他的專輯名稱時曾說道。
mt: "I believe that 'ye' is the most commonly used word in the Bible, and in the Bible, it means 'you,'" West said earlier this year when discussing the title of his album with radio host Big Boy.
ref: "I believe 'ye' is the most commonly used word in the Bible, and in the Bible it means 'you,'" West said earlier this year, discussing his album title with radio host Big Boy.

src: 「所以我是你，我是我們，這是關於我們的。
mt: "So I'm you, I'm us, it's about us.
ref: "So I'm you, I'm us, it's us.

src: 從肯伊，本來只代表僅此一人，到只有 Ye —反映出我們的好、我們的不好、我們的不解、所有事情。
mt: From Keny, it originally represented only one person to only one person, to only Ye — reflecting our good, our bad, our incomprehensible, all things.
ref: It went from Kanye, which means the only one, to just Ye - just being a reflection of our good, our bad, our confused, everything.

src: 這張專輯不單單反映了我們是誰。」
mt: This album does not just reflect who we are. "
ref: The album is more of a reflection of who we are."

src: 他是眾多著名饒舌歌手中改名的其中一人。
mt: He is one of many well-known rap singers to have been renamed.
ref: He is one of a number of famous rappers to change their name.

src: Sean Combs 本來名為 Puff Daddy、P. Diddy 或 Diddy，但卻在今年宣布改名為 Love 和 Brother Love。
mt: Sean Combs was originally named Puff Daddy, P. Diddy or Diddy, but this year it was renamed to Love and Brother Love.
ref: Sean Combs has been variously known as Puff Daddy, P. Diddy or Diddy, but this year announced his preference for the names Love and Brother Love.

src: 曾與威斯特合作的 JAY-Z，也曾改名加入或去除連字號和大小寫之別。
mt: The JAY-Z, which had collaborated with West, was also renamed to add or remove the distinction between hyphens and capital letters.
ref: A former West collaborator, JAY-Z, has also made do with or without a hyphen and capitals.

src: 墨西哥的 AMLO 承諾不會對平民動用軍方武力
mt: Mexico's AMLO has pledged not to use military force against civilians.
ref: Mexico's AMLO vows not to use military against civilians

src: 隨著國家接近對學生進行血腥鎮壓的 50 週年紀念，墨西哥總統候選人 Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador 承諾永遠不會對平民使用軍方武力。
mt: As the country approaches its 50th anniversary of bloody suppression of students, Mexican presidential candidate Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador has promised never to use military force against civilians.
ref: Mexican President-elect Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador has vowed to never use military force against civilians as the country approaches the 50th anniversary of a bloody reprisal against students.

src: Lopez Obrador 禮拜六在 Tlatelolco Plaza 承諾「永遠不會動用軍方鎮壓墨西哥人民。」
mt: Lopez Obrador pledged on Saturday at Platelolco Plaza that “never use the military to crush the Mexican people.”
ref: Lopez Obrador promised Saturday at Tlatelolco Plaza to "never ever use the military to repress the Mexican people."

src: 當左派學生運動席捲整個拉丁美洲時，在 1968 年 10 月 2 日，軍隊在廣場對一場和平示威開火，殺害高達 300 人。
mt: When the left-wing student movement swept across all of Latin America, on October 2, 1968, troops opened fire on a peaceful protest in the square, killing up to 300 people.
ref: Troops fired on a peaceful demonstration at the plaza on Oct. 2, 1968, killing as many as 300 people at a time when leftist student movements were taking root throughout Latin America.

src: Lopez Obrador 宣誓支持墨西哥年輕一代，向學生提供月例補貼，並將成立更多免費的公立大學。
mt: Lopez Obrador pledges to support the younger generation in Mexico by providing monthly subsidies to students and will establish more free public universities.
ref: Lopez Obrador has pledged to support young Mexicans by giving monthly subsidies to those who study and opening more free public universities.

src: 他說失業和缺少教育機會將更多青少年推向加入犯罪集團這條不歸路。
mt: He said unemployment and lack of educational opportunities would push more teenagers onto the road to joining a criminal gang.
ref: He has said that unemployment and a lack of educational opportunities draws youth to criminal gangs.

src: 美國應對人工智能增加雙倍資助
mt: US to double funding for AI
ref: U.S. should double A.I. funding

src: 投資者和人工智能從業者李開復表示，隨著中國在人工智能方面發展日漸活躍，美國應將用於該領域研究的資金增加為雙倍。李開復曾在 Google、微軟 (Microsoft) 和 Apple 工作。
mt: Investor and AI practitioner Li Kai-fu said the US should double its funding for research in the area as China is becoming increasingly active in AI. Li has worked at Google, Microsoft and Apple.
ref: As China becomes more active in artificial intelligence, the U.S. should double the amount it spends on research in the field, says investor and AI practitioner Kai-Fu Lee, who has worked for Google, Microsoft and Apple.

src: 儘管美國整體仍欠缺一份正式的人工智能戰略，美國政府各部門卻發布了人工智能公告，讓李有感而發發表了上述言論。
mt: Despite the overall lack of a formal artificial intelligence strategy in the US, various US government departments released an artificial intelligence announcement, which prompted Lee to make the above-mentioned remarks.
ref: The comments come after various parts of the U.S. government have made AI announcements, even as the U.S. overall lacks a formal AI strategy.

src: 同時，中國在去年推出了計畫：政府目標計畫在 2030 年前成為人工智能創意的第一名。
mt: At the same time, China launched a plan last year: the government's goal is to become the first place in artificial intelligence creativity by 2030.
ref: Meanwhile, China introduced its plan last year: it's aiming to be No.1 in AI innovation by 2030.

src: 「增加雙倍的人工智能研究資金是一個好的開始，尤其是所有其他國家都大幅落後於美國的研究，而我們正尋求人工智能的下一次突破，」李說道。
mt: “The doubling of AI research funding is a good start, especially since all other countries are far behind the US, and we’re looking for a next breakthrough in AI,” said Lee.
ref: "Double the AI research budget would be a good start, given that all other countries are so much farther behind U.S., and we're looking for the next breakthrough in AI," said Lee.

src: 增加雙倍的資金可以增加雙倍的機會讓美國獲得下一次人工智能的重大成果，李在這個禮拜與 CNBC 的一場訪問中表示。
mt: Increasing the double of funding can increase the chances of a double that the US will achieve significant results in the next artificial intelligence project, Lee said in an interview with CNBC this week.
ref: Doubling funding could double the chances that the next big AI achievement will be made in the U.S., Lee told CNBC in an interview this week.

src: 李的著作《人工智能超能力：中國、矽谷和新世界秩序 (AI Superpowers: China, Silicon Valley and the New World Order)》在這個月由 Houghton Mifflin Harcourt 出版。他是創新工場 (Sinovation Ventures) 的總裁，並且曾投資中國最傑出的人工智能公司之一— Face++。
mt: Lee’s book, AI Superpowers: China, Silicon Valley and the New World Order, was published this month by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt. He is the president of Innovation Ventures and has invested in Face++, one of China’s most outstanding AI companies.
ref: Lee, whose book "AI Superpowers: China, Silicon Valley and the New World Order" was published this month by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, is CEO of Sinovation Ventures, which has invested in one of the most prominent AI companies in China, Face++.

src: 在 1980 年代的卡內基美隆大學 (Carnegie Mellon University)，李曾研發打敗美國黑白棋第一名玩家的人工智能系統，而在之後他亦分別在微軟研究 (Microsoft Research) 中擔任行政人員和在 Google 的中國分部擔任總裁一職。
mt: At Carnegie Mellon University in the 1980s, Lee developed an artificial intelligence system that beat the number one player in black-and-white chess in the United States, and later served as an executive at Microsoft Research and president of Google's China division.
ref: In the 1980s at Carnegie Mellon University he worked on an AI system that beat the highest-ranked American Othello player, and later he was an executive at Microsoft Research and president of Google's China branch.

src: 李承認例如國防高級研究計劃局的機器人挑戰賽 (Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency's Robotics Challenge) 等由前任美國政府舉辦的科技競賽，並詢問下一次比賽將是什麼時候，以幫助找出具備遠見的人才。
mt: Lee acknowledged that, for example, the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency's Robotics Challenge, a technology competition organised by the former US government, and asked when the next competition would be, to help find visionary talent.
ref: Lee acknowledged previous U.S. government technology competitions like the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency's Robotics Challenge and asked when the next one would be, in order to help identify the next visionaries.

src: 李表示，在美國的研究人員經常需要勤奮工作以爭取政府補助。
mt: Lee says that researchers in the US often have to work hard to get government subsidies.
ref: Researchers in the U.S. often have to work hard in order to win government grants, Lee said.

src: 「其實搶走學術領袖的不是中國；而是公司，」李說道。
mt: "In fact, it's not China that has taken away academic leaders; it's companies," says Li.
ref: "It's not China that is taking away the academic leaders; it's the corporates," Lee said.

src: Facebook、Google 和其他科技公司在近幾年已聘請來自各大學的領域專家以進行人工智能研究。
mt: Facebook, Google and other tech companies have hired experts from various universities to conduct AI research in recent years.
ref: Facebook, Google and other technology companies have hired luminaries from universities to work on AI in recent years.

src: 李說移民政策的變動亦可幫助美國加強在人工智能方面的研究。
mt: Lee said changes to immigration policies can also help the US strengthen research in artificial intelligence.
ref: Lee said immigration policy changes could also help the U.S. bolster its AI efforts.

src: 「我認為應該自動向專攻人工智能研究的博士生提供綠卡，」他說道。
mt: "I think we should automatically provide green cards to PhD students specializing in artificial intelligence research," he says.
ref: "I think green cards should automatically be offered to PhD's in AI," he said.

src: 中國國務院在 2017 年 7 月發布了國家的新一代人工智能發展規劃。
mt: In July 2017, the State Council of China issued a new generation of AI development plan for the country.
ref: China's State Council issued its Next Generation Artificial Intelligence Development Plan in July 2017.

src: 中國的國家自然科學基金向學數組織的專家提供資金補助，就好像美國國家科學基金會和其他政府組織向美國研究人員提供金錢補助，但中國的學術研究品質明顯較低，李說道。
mt: China's National Natural Science Fund provides financial assistance to experts at the academic number organization, similar to the US National Science Foundation and other government organizations providing financial assistance to American researchers, but China's academic research quality is obviously lower, Li said.
ref: China's National Natural Science Foundation provides funding to people at academic institutions similar to the way that the National Science Foundation and other government organizations dole out money to U.S. researchers, but the quality of academic work is lower in China, Lee said.

src: 在今年年初，美國國防部設立了一個人工智能聯合中心 (Joint Artificial Intelligence Center)，旨在連結業界和學術界夥伴共同參與研究。白宮亦宣告成立人工智慧專責委員會 (Select Committee on Artificial Intelligence)。
mt: Early this year, the U.S. Department of Defense set up a Joint Artificial Intelligence Center to connect industry and academic partners to participate in research. The White House also announced the establishment of the Select Committee on Artificial Intelligence.
ref: Earlier this year the U.S. Defense Department established a Joint Artificial Intelligence Center, which is meant to involve partners from industry and academia, and the White House announced the formation of Select Committee on Artificial Intelligence.

src: 在這個月，DARPA 宣布在一個名為「下一步人工智能 (AI Next)」的項目投入 $20 億。
mt: This month, DARPA announced that it has invested $2 billion in a project called AI Next.
ref: And this month DARPA announced a $2 billion investment in an initiative called AI Next.

src: 至於 NSF，目前每年已在人工智能研究中投入超過 $1 億。
mt: As for NSF, more than $100 million has been invested annually in artificial intelligence research.
ref: As for the NSF, it currently invests more than $100 million per year in AI research.

src: 與此同時，尋求建立國家人工智能安全委員會的美國立法法案卻在幾個月以來未見有任何行動。
mt: At the same time, the US legislative bill seeking to establish a national artificial intelligence safety committee has seen no action in several months.
ref: Meanwhile, U.S. legislation that sought to create a National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence has not seen action in months.

src: 馬其頓舉行公投決定國家是否改名
mt: A referendum was held in Macedonia to decide if the country should change its name.
ref: Macedonians vote in referendum on whether to change country's name

src: 馬其頓公民在禮拜天舉行公投決定是否將國家名稱改為「北馬其頓共和國」。此舉旨在解決數十年來與希臘的紛爭，讓希臘不得在阻撓馬其頓申請加入歐盟和北大西洋公約組織 (NATO)。
mt: Citizens of Macedonia held a Sunday referendum to decide whether to change the name of the country to the Republic of North Macedonia. The aim was to resolve decades of conflict with Greece, so that Greece could not prevent Macedonia from applying for membership in the European Union and NATO.
ref: The people of Macedonia voted in a referendum on Sunday on whether to change its name to "Republic of North Macedonia," a move that would resolve a decades-old dispute with Greece which had blocked its membership bids for the European Union and NATO.

src: 希臘境內的一個省份亦名為馬其頓，並以此堅稱其北方睦鄰的名稱代表其應為希臘領土，因而否決馬其頓加入 NATO 和歐盟的申請。
mt: A province within Greece, also known as Macedonia, was denied the application to join NATO and the European Union by claiming its northern neighbor's name on the Greek territory.
ref: Greece, which has a province called Macedonia, maintains that its northern neighbor's name represents a claim on its territory and has vetoed its entrance into NATO and the EU.

src: 兩國政府在六月就新的國家名稱達成協議，但反對的國家主義者表示是次改名將破壞馬其頓斯拉夫人佔多數的民族意識。
mt: The two governments reached an agreement on the new national name in June, but anti-nationalists said that this change would destroy the ethnic consciousness of the majority of Macedonian Slavs.
ref: The two governments struck a deal in June based on the proposed new name, but nationalist opponents argue the change would undermine the ethnic identity of Macedonia's Slavic majority population.

src: 總統 Gjorge Ivanov 表示他不將參與公投，且杯葛計畫將為投票率是否會達到公投有效所需的最低百分之 50 投下未知因素。
mt: President Gjorge Ivanov said he will not participate in the referendum, and boycotting plans will cast unknown factors for whether the voting rate will reach the minimum required 50% of the referendum's validity.
ref: President Gjorge Ivanov has said he will not be voting in the referendum and a boycott campaign has cast doubts on whether turnout will meet the minimum 50 percent required for the referendum to be valid.

src: 公投票上列明的問題是：「您是否支持贊成與希臘達成的協議以加入 NATO 和歐盟。」
mt: The question set out in the public vote is: "Do you support an agreement with Greece to join NATO and the European Union?"
ref: The question on the referendum ballot read: "Are you for NATO and EU membership with acceptance of the agreement with Greece."

src: 是次改名的支持者，其中包括總理 Zoran Zaev，認為這對於前身為南斯拉夫聯邦成員之一的馬其頓而言，是值得為了加入例如歐盟何 NATO 等組織而付出的代價。
mt: Supporters of this renaming, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, believe that this is a price worth paying to join organizations such as NATO, which was one of the former members of the Yugoslav Federation in Macedonia.
ref: Supporters of the name change, including Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, argue that it is a price worth paying to pursue admission into bodies such as the EU and NATO for Macedonia, one of the countries to emerge from the collapse of Yugoslavia.

src: 「我今天到這裡是為了投下決定國家未來的一票，是為了讓馬其頓的年輕一代可以在歐盟的庇護下自由生活，為我們大家的生活帶來安全保障，」Skopje 的 79 歲 Olivera Georgijevska 說道。
mt: "I'm here today to vote for a country's future, so that the younger generation of Macedonia can live freely under the protection of the European Union and bring security to the lives of all of us," said 79-year-old Olivera Georgijevska of Skopje.
ref: "I came today to vote for the future of the country, for young people in Macedonia so they can be live freely under the umbrella of the European Union because it means safer lives for all of us," said Olivera Georgijevska, 79, in Skopje.

src: 儘管未受法律約束，但國會足夠人數的成員已表明將履行並落實公投結果。
mt: Although not subject to legal constraints, a sufficient number of members of parliament have already stated that they will implement and implement the results of the referendum.
ref: Although not legally binding, enough members of parliament have said they will abide by the vote's outcome to make it decisive.

src: 是次改名將需要國會三分之二大多數成員的支持。
mt: This renaming will require the support of a two-thirds majority of members of parliament.
ref: The name change would requires a two-thirds majority in parliament.

src: 國家選舉委員會表示截至下午 1 點，未收到任何違規行為的報告。
mt: The National Election Committee stated that as of 1 pm, no reports of violations have been received.
ref: The state election commission said there had been no reports of irregularities by 1 p.m.

src: 但是，投票率僅為百分之 16，有別於上一次在 2016 年舉行的國會選舉的百分之 34，當中百分之 66 的註冊選民都有參與投票。
mt: However, the voting rate was only 16%, unlike the previous parliamentary election held in 2016, which had a voter turnout of 34%, with 66% of registered voters participating in voting.
ref: However, turnout stood at only 16 percent, compared to 34 percent in last parliamentary election in 2016 when 66 percent of the registered voters cast their ballot.

src: 「我是為了我的孩子、我們在歐洲的一席之地出來投票的，」Skopje 的 62 歲選民 Gjose Tanevski 說道。
mt: “I vote for my child, for our place in Europe,” said Gjose Tanevski, a 62-year-old voter at Skopje.
ref: "I came out to vote because of my children, our place is in Europe," said Gjose Tanevski, 62, a voter in the capital, Skopje.

src: 馬其頓的總理 Zoran Zaev、他的妻子 Zorica 和兒子 Dushko 亦參與投票，投下支持馬其頓改名的三票，以讓國家成功在 2018 年 9 月 30 日在馬其頓的 Strumica 加入 NATO 和歐盟。
mt: Macedonian Prime Minister Zoran Zaev, his wife Zorica and son Dushko also participated in the vote, voting for three votes in support of Macedonia's name change to allow the country to successfully join NATO and the EU at Strumica in Macedonia on September 30, 2018.
ref: Macedonia's PM Zoran Zaev, his wife Zorica and his son Dushko cast their ballot for the referendum in Macedonia on changing the country's name that would open the way for it to join NATO and the European Union in Strumica, Macedonia September 30, 2018.

src: 在 Skopje 的國會前，54 歲的 Vladimir Kavardarkov 正在杯葛公投人士搭建的帳篷前建造一個小舞台和觀眾座位。
mt: In front of Skopje's parliament, 54-year-old Vladimir Kavardarkov is building a small stage and audience seating in front of a tent built by a referendumer.
ref: In front of parliament in Skopje, Vladimir Kavardarkov, 54, was preparing a small stage and pulling up chairs in front of tents set up by those who will boycott the referendum.

src: 「我們支持加入 NATO 和歐盟，但我們希望帶有尊嚴地加入，而不是透過退讓勉強加入」Kavadarkov 說道。
mt: “We support NATO and the European Union, but we want to join with dignity, not by giving in,” Kavadarkov said.
ref: "We are for NATO and EU, but we want to join with our heads up, not through the service door" Kavadarkov said.

src: 「我們是一個貧窮的國家，但我們還保有尊嚴。
mt: "We're a poor country, but we still have dignity.
ref: "We are a poor country, but we do have dignity.

src: 如果他們不以馬其頓之名接納我們，我們也還是可以聯合中國和俄羅斯等國家加入歐亞聯盟。」
