mt: If they don't accept us in the name of Macedonia, we can still join the Eurasian Union with countries like China and Russia."
ref: If they don't want to take us as Macedonia, we can turn to others like China and Russia and become part of Euro-Asia integration."

src: 總理 Zaev 表示 NATO 成員資格將為馬其頓帶來國家急切所需的投資，幫助緩解超過百分之 20 的失業率。
mt: Prime Minister Zaev stated that NATO membership will bring the country's urgent investment to Macedonia, helping alleviate unemployment rates of over 20 percent.
ref: Prime Minister Zaev says NATO membership will bring much needed investment to Macedonia, which has an unemployment rate of more than 20 percent.

src: 「我相信大部分公民將投下贊成票，因為超過百分之 80 的公民支持加入歐盟和 NATO，」Zaev 在投下他的一票後表示。
mt: “I believe most citizens will vote for it because over 80 percent of citizens support joining the EU and NATO,” Zaev said after he voted.
ref: "I believe the huge majority will be in favor because more than 80 percent of our citizens are in favor of EU and NATO," Zaev said after casting his ballot.

src: 他表示，「贊成」結果將「確定我們的未來」。
mt: He said, " ⁇ " would "confirm our future".
ref: He said that a "yes" result would be "confirmation of our future."

src: 馬其頓政策研究機構在上禮拜一進行的一項調查顯示，百分之 30 至 43 的選民將參加公投—遠低於所需要的投票率。
mt: A survey conducted last Monday by the Macedonian Policy Research Institute found that 30 to 43 percent of the electorate will participate in a referendum—far lower than the required turnout.
ref: A poll published last Monday by Macedonia's Institute for Policy Research said between 30 and 43 percent of voters would take part in the referendum - below the required turnout.

src: 另一項由馬其頓的 Telma 電視台進行的調查顯示，百分之 57 的參加者計畫將在禮拜天參與投票。
mt: Another Macedonian Telma TV survey revealed that 57 percent of the participants planned to vote on Sunday.
ref: Another poll, conducted by Macedonia's Telma TV, found 57 percent of respondents planning to vote on Sunday.

src: 其中，百分之 70 選民表示將投下贊成一票。
mt: Among them, 70 percent of voters said they would cast a vote in favor.
ref: Of those, 70 percent said they would vote yes.

src: 為了讓公投成功，投票率必須超過百分之 50 加一票。
mt: In order for the referendum to be successful, the voting rate must exceed 50 percent plus one vote.
ref: For the referendum to be successful turnout needs to be 50 percent plus one vote.

src: 公投失敗將代表去年五月接任以來的親西方政府面臨政策上的首個嚴重打擊。
mt: The failure of the referendum will represent the first serious blow to the pro-Western government since taking office last May.
ref: A failure in the referendum would represent the first serious blow to policy of the pro-Western government since it took over in May last year.

src: 觀看：曼城的 Sergio Aguero 輕鬆避開布萊頓的防守射門
mt: Watch: Sergio Aguero in Manchester City easily avoids Brighton's defensive shots
ref: Watch: Manchester City's Sergio Aguero navigates through entire Brighton defense for goal

src: 在禮拜六的英格蘭曼徹斯特的 Etihad Stadium，Sergio Aguero 和 Raheem Sterling 瓦解了布萊頓的防守，成功為曼城取得 2-0 勝績。
mt: On Saturday at the Etihad Stadium in Manchester, England, Sergio Aguero and Raheem Sterling broke down Brighton's defenses, successfully securing a 2-0 victory for Manchester City.
ref: Sergio Aguero and Raheem Sterling dispatched of the Brighton defense in Manchester City's 2-0 win on Saturday at Etihad Stadium in Manchester, England.

src: Aguero 在第 65 分鐘輕鬆射門。
mt: Aguero shot easily in the 65th minute.
ref: Aguero made it look ridiculously easy on his score in the 65th minute.

src: 這名阿根廷前鋒在序列開始時在中場接到傳球。
mt: This Argentine striker received a pass in the middle of the game at the beginning of the sequence.
ref: The Argentine striker received a pass at midfield at the start of the sequence.

src: 他跑過三名布萊頓防守，闖入無人防衛的場地。
mt: He ran over three Brighton defenders, breaking into an undefended field.
ref: He raced between three Brighton defenders, before slashing into the open field.

src: Aguero 立即意識到身邊圍上了四名身穿綠色球衣的敵對球員。
mt: Aguero immediately realized that there were four opposing players wearing green jerseys surrounding him.
ref: Aguero then found himself surrounded by four green shirts.

src: 他在避開一名防守後，跑過數名敵對球員逼近布萊頓的罰球區。
mt: After avoiding a defensive position, he ran past several opposing players approaching the penalty area of Brighton.
ref: He pushed around one defender before outrunning several more at the edge of the Brighton box.

src: 他在躲過左邊的攻勢後看到了 Sterling。
mt: He saw Sterling after he dodged the left-hand attack.
ref: He then pushed a pass to his left, finding Sterling.

src: 這名英國球員在罰球區首次觸球後，將球回傳給 Aguero。Aguero 之後抬起右腳射門，射球直接飛越布萊頓守門員 Mathew Ryan 射入網的右側。
mt: The British player returns the ball to Aguero after the first touch in the penalty area. Aguero then raises his right foot and shoots the ball straight over to the right side of the net of Brighton goalkeeper Mathew Ryan.
ref: The English forward used his first touch in the box to give the ball back to Aguero, who used his right boot to beat Brighton keeper Mathew Ryan with a shot into the right side of the net.

src: 「Aguero 的腳出現了一些問題，」曼城球隊經理 Pep Guardiola 向記者表示。
mt: "Aguero's feet have some problems," says Pep Guardiola, manager of the Manchester City team.
ref: "Aguero is struggling with some problems in his feet," City manager Pep Guardiola told reporters.

src: 「我們與他商討只上場 55 至 60 分鐘。
mt: "We discussed with him only 55 to 60 minutes of playing.
ref: "We spoke about him playing 55, 60 minutes.

src: 然後就發生了這次的事情。
mt: And then this happened.
ref: That's what happened.

src: 他在那個時候射門對我們而言是非常幸運的。」
mt: He was very lucky for us to shoot at that time."
ref: We were lucky he scored a goal in that moment."

src: 但 Sterling 才是讓藍隊在英超聯賽混戰中搶得先機的功臣。
mt: But Sterling was the key to getting the Blues to a head start in the Premier League.
ref: But it was Sterling who gave the Sky Blues the initial advantage in the Premier League scuffle.

src: 他在第 29 分鐘射門。
mt: He shot in the 29th minute.
ref: That goal came in the 29th minute.

src: Aguero 當時在布萊頓的地盤接到球。
mt: Aguero caught the ball on the ground in Brighton.
ref: Aguero received the ball deep in Brighton territory on that play.

src: 他向左邊的 Leroy Sane 傳出一記漂亮傳球。
mt: He threw a beautiful pass to Leroy Sane on the left.
ref: He sent a beautiful through ball along the left flank to Leroy Sane.

src: Sane 在數次觸球後將 Sterling 引領至了遠方的龍門。
mt: Sane led Sterling to the Long Gate after several touchdowns.
ref: Sane took a few touches before leading Sterling toward the far post.

src: 藍隊在滑出界外前一抬腳即將球射入網內。
mt: The blue team will kick the ball into the net as soon as they slide out of bounds.
ref: The Sky Blues forward tapped the ball into the net just before sliding out of bounds.

src: 曼城將在德國辛斯海姆的 Rhein-Neckar-Arena，在禮拜二下午 12:55 的歐洲冠軍聯賽小組賽對戰賀芬咸 (Hoffenheim)。
mt: Manchester City will play against Hoffenheim in the Rhein-Neckar-Arena of Sinsheim, Germany, in the UEFA Champions League group stage at 12:55 p.m. on Tuesdays.
ref: City battles Hoffenheim in Champions League group play at 12:55 p.m. on Tuesday at Rhein-Neckar-Arena in Sinsheim, Germany.

src: Scherzer 迎戰落磯隊敗局已定
mt: Scherzer, the Los Angeles team's defeat has been set.
ref: Scherzer wants to play spoiler vs. Rockies

src: 隨著國民隊在季後賽爭奪戰中被淘汰出局，已經沒有什麼原因引起另一番激戰。
mt: As the Nationals were eliminated from the playoff game, there was no reason to cause another fierce battle.
ref: With the Nationals eliminated from playoff contention, there wasn't much reason to force another start.

src: 但好勝的 Scherzer 卻在禮拜天對戰科羅拉多落磯隊時投球。但對於在國家聯盟西區大賽中領先洛杉磯道奇隊一場勝仗的落磯隊而言，季後賽已然失去了意義。
mt: But on a Sunday, the winning Scherzer pitched against the Colorado Rockies. But the postseason lost its significance for the Rockies, who led the Los Angeles Dodgers in a game in the National League West Division Series.
ref: But the ever-competitive Scherzer hopes to take the mound on Sunday against the Colorado Rockies, but only if there are still playoff implications for the Rockies, who hold a one-game lead over the Los Angeles Dodgers in the NL West.

src: 落磯隊在禮拜五晚上以 5-2 勝於國民隊，至少可獲得外卡參賽資格，但仍然試圖鞏固其分組第一名的頭銜。
mt: The Rockies won 5-2 over the Nationals on Friday night, and at least earned a wild card qualification, but still tried to solidify their group first place title.
ref: The Rockies clinched at least a wild-card spot with a 5-2 win over the Nationals on Friday night, but are still looking to lock up their first division title.

src: 「儘管我們並未為了什麼而戰，但至少我們可以在丹佛盡力一戰，正如人群和其他球隊的士氣可能是今年我將面臨的最高水平。
mt: “Although we don’t fight for anything, at least we can do our best in Denver, just as the crowd and the morale of other teams may be the highest I’ll face this year.
ref: "Even though we're playing for nothing, at least we can be able to toe the rubber knowing that the atmosphere here in Denver with the crowd and the other team would be playing at probably the highest level of any point I would face this year.

src: 我為什麼不會想要參加這場比賽？」
mt: Why don't I want to participate in this competition?"
ref: Why wouldn't I want to compete in that?"

src: 國民隊未公布禮拜天的先發投手，但據報傾向讓 Scherzer 在這種情況下投球。
mt: The Nationals did not announce Sunday's starting pitcher, but it was reported that they tended to let Scherzer throw the ball in this situation.
ref: The Nationals have yet to announce a starter for Sunday, but are reportedly inclined to let Scherzer pitch in such a situation.

src: Scherzer 將投出他的第 34 個先發投球，在禮拜四進行牛棚練習並將在其正常休息日禮拜天進行投球。
mt: Scherzer will throw his 34th start, practice in the cowshed on Thursday, and pitch on his normal Sunday rest day.
ref: Scherzer, who would be making his 34th start, threw a bullpen session on Thursday and would be pitching on his normal rest Sunday.

src: 華盛頓隊的右撇子目前季度成績為 18-7，並在 220 2/3 次投球中投出 2.53 ERA 和 300 個好球。
mt: Washington's right-hander currently has a quarter-season record of 18-7, and has pitched 2.53 ERA and 300 good balls in 220 two-thirds of the time.
ref: The Washington right-hander is 18-7 with a 2.53 ERA and 300 strikeouts in 220 2/3 innings this season.

src: 川普參加西維吉尼亞的集會
mt: Trump at West Virginia rally
ref: Trump rallies in West Virginia

src: 總統在談及共和黨投票對中期選舉中的重要性時，提到了他的最高法院提名人布雷特·卡瓦諾 (Brett Kavanaugh) 的情況。
mt: When discussing the importance of Republican voting in midterm elections, the President mentioned his Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh.
ref: The President obliquely referred to the situation surrounding his Supreme Court pick Brett Kavanaugh while talking about the importance of Republican turnout in the midterm elections.

src: 「我們之前做的一切都取決於十一月的決定。
mt: "Everything we did before depended on the decision of November.
ref: "All of what we've done is at stake in November.

src: 五個禮拜之後，我們將面臨認證最重要的選舉之一。
mt: Five weeks later, we will face one of the most important certified elections.
ref: Five weeks away from one of the most important elections in our lifetimes.

src: 這將是一次非常、非常重大—我沒有參選，但我積極參與其中，這就是我四處奔波為優秀的候選人爭取支持的原因，」他說道。
mt: It's going to be a very, very important time -- I didn't run, but I actively participated in it, which is why I ran around to get support for excellent candidates, "he said.
ref: This is one of the big, big -- I'm not running but I'm really running that's why I'm all over the place fighting for great candidates," he said.

src: 川普繼續說道，「你會看到民主黨的一群群恐怖至極的激進團隊，他們現在就在採取激進行動。
mt: Trump continued to say, "You'll see a group of the Democratic Party's most terrifying radical groups, who are taking radical action now.
ref: Trump continued, "You see this horrible, horrible radical group of Democrats, you see it happening right now.

src: 而且他們決心不惜採用一切手段取得權力，你可以看到他們的刻薄無情。
mt: And they were determined to do whatever it took to get power, and you can see their cruelty and cruelty.
ref: And they're determined to take back power by using any means necessary, you see the meanness, the nastiness.

src: 他們不在意傷害了誰、需要擊倒誰以取得權力和控制權，這正是他們想要的，而我們不會將權力和控制權交到他們手上。」
mt: They don't care who hurts or who needs to be defeated to gain power and control. That's exactly what they want, and we don't give them power and control."
ref: They don't care who they hurt, who they have to run over in order to get power and control, that's what they want is power and control, we're not going to give it to them."

src: 他說，民主黨員正試圖「抵抗並從中阻撓」。
mt: He said that Democrats are trying to "resist and obstruct from it".
ref: Democrats, he said, are on a mission to "resist and obstruct."

src: 「而你也可以在過去四天中清楚看到，」他說道，並把民主黨員形容為「憤怒、刻薄、野蠻且不值得信任」的一群。
mt: “And you can see it clearly in the last four days,” he said, describing the Democrats as “angry, mean, savage and untrustworthy.”
ref: "And you see that over the last four days," he said, calling the Democrats "angry and mean and nasty and untruthful."

src: 他直指參議院司法委員會列席的民主黨參議員黛安·范斯坦 (Dianne Feinstein)，並獲得觀眾的大片噓聲。
mt: He directly pointed out Democratic Senator Dianne Feinstein, who was a member of the Senate Judiciary Committee, and received large-scale audience boos.
ref: He referenced Senate Judiciary Committee ranking Democratic Sen. Dianne Feinstein by name, which received loud boos from the audience.

src: 「記得她的回應嗎？
mt: "Remember her response?
ref: "Remember her answer?

src: 你是否有洩露文件？
mt: Did you leak the files?
ref: Did you leak the document?

src: 呃，呃，什麼。
mt: Uh, uh, what.
ref: Uh, uh, what.

src: 沒有，呃沒有，我等一—那是非常差勁的肢體語言—我看過最差勁的肢體語言。」
mt: No, uh, no, I'm waiting-- that's really bad body language -- the worst body language I've ever seen."
ref: No, uh no, I wait one - that was really bad body language - the worst body language I've ever seen."

src: 工黨不再是包容力強的教堂。
mt: The Labour Party is no longer an inclusive church.
ref: Labour is no longer a broad church.

src: 它無法容忍說出心底話的那群人。
mt: It can't tolerate the group of people who say what's in their hearts.
ref: It is intolerant of those who speak their minds

src: 當「力量運動」支持者在我的當地選區投票譴責我的時候，我一點也不值得驚奇。
mt: When Power Movement supporters voted to condemn me in my local constituency, I was not surprised at all.
ref: When Momentum's activists in my local party voted to censure me, it was hardly a surprise.

src: 說到底，我是最近一群被告知我們不被歡迎的工黨國會議員之一—因為我們勇於說出真心話。
mt: To be honest, I'm one of the Labour MPs recently told we're not welcome—because we're brave enough to say what we really mean.
ref: After all, I'm the latest in a line of Labour MPs to be told we are not welcome - all for speaking our minds.

src: 我的國會同僚 Joan Ryan 也受到了類似待遇，因為她毅然反對反猶主義。
mt: My fellow congressional colleague, Joan Ryan, was treated similarly, because she resolutely opposed anti-Semitism.
ref: My parliamentary colleague Joan Ryan received similar treatment because she resolutely stood up to antisemitism.

src: 至於我，譴責行動批評我不應反對傑雷米·科爾賓 (Jeremy Corbyn)。
mt: As for me, the condemnation action criticized me for not opposing Jeremy Corbyn.
ref: In my case, the censure motion criticized me for disagreeing with Jeremy Corbyn.

src: 在負責任的經濟政策重要性、國家安全、歐洲等議題上，諷刺的是，這些全部都是傑雷米與之前的領袖持有不同意見的議題。
mt: Ironically, on issues such as the importance of responsible economic policy, national security and Europe, these are all issues that Jeremy and his previous leaders held different views on.
ref: On the importance of a responsible economic policy, on national security, on Europe, ironically similar issues on which Jeremy disagreed with previous leaders.

src: 禮拜五的東諾丁漢工黨會議通知表明「我們希望會議具有包容性且富有成效的」。
mt: A notice from the East Nottingham Labour Party conference on Friday said "we want the conference to be inclusive and productive."
ref: The notice for the Nottingham East Labour meeting on Friday stated that "we want the meetings to be inclusive and productive."

src: 在我任職當地工黨議員的八年期間的大部分時間內，禮拜五晚舉行的 GC 會議大多正如通告所述。
mt: For most of the eight years I served as a local Labour MP, the GC meetings on Friday nights were mostly as described in the notice.
ref: For most of my eight years as the local Labour MP, the Friday night GC meetings have been exactly that.

src: 但在今天，大多會議都不再是如此，且也已經全然忘記「更友善、更溫柔」的政治承諾，這是如果這個承諾有開始被履行的前提下。
mt: But today, most meetings are no longer like this, and have completely forgotten the political promise of "more friendly and gentle", which is a premise that if this commitment has been fulfilled.
ref: Sadly today, it is not the tone of many meetings and the promise of "kinder, gentler" politics has long been forgotten if, indeed, it ever began.

src: 這已經越來越明顯，工黨不再容忍其他觀點，且每名成員的看法都必須與黨主席的觀點一致。
mt: This has become increasingly evident, the Labour Party no longer tolerates other views, and each member's view must be consistent with the party chairman's view.
ref: It has become increasingly apparent that differing views are not tolerated in the Labour party and every opinion is judged on whether it is acceptable to the party leadership.

src: 情況是在傑雷米成為主席後開始的，隨著我之前一致認為與我持有相似政治觀感的同僚開始希望我做出截然不同的行為，並採納我在任何情況下皆不可能同意的看法—不論是在國家安全還是歐洲單一市場議題上。
mt: The situation began after Jeremy became president, as my colleagues who had previously agreed to share a similar political view began to want me to take radically different actions and adopt the views that I would never agree with under any circumstances – whether on national security or European single market issues.
ref: This started shortly after Jeremy became leader, as colleagues with whom I had previously thought I shared a similar political outlook began expecting me to do a U-turn and take positions I would never have otherwise agreed with - whether on national security or the EU single market.

src: 每當我公開發言—而我說的內容其實根本無關緊要—總會引發社交媒體上濫用行為，要求取消我的選舉資格、譴責政治的中央思想，並告訴我不應該繼續留在工黨。
mt: Whenever I speak out publicly—and what I say is actually irrelevant—it will lead to abuse on social media, demanding the cancellation of my election qualifications, censure of the central idea of politics, and telling me that I should not continue to stay with the Labour Party.
ref: Whenever I speak publicly - and it doesn't really matter what I say - there follows a tirade of abuse on social media calling for deselection, denouncing the politics of the center, telling me I should not be in the Labour party.

src: 而這不單單發生在我一人身上。
mt: And it didn't just happen to me alone.
ref: And that is not just my experience.

src: 確實，我知道我比我的一些同僚幸運，因為那些針對我的留言都僅為政治言論。
mt: Indeed, I know I'm lucky than some of my colleagues, because all the comments about me are just political speech.
ref: Indeed, I know I am more fortunate than some of my colleagues as the comments directed at me tend to be political.

src: 對於那些每天都要面對大量的性別歧視或種族歧視言論但從不退縮的同僚，我對他們所表現出的專業性和決心感到無比崇拜。
mt: I admire my colleagues who have to face a lot of sexist or racist comments every day but never back down, for their professionalism and determination.
ref: I am in awe of the professionalism and determination of those colleagues who face a torrent of sexist or racist abuse every day but never shy away.

src: 這個年代的政治其中一個最令人寒心的方面，就是不同等級的歧視都被視為正常言行。
mt: One of the most chilling aspects of politics in this era is that discrimination at different levels is considered normal behavior.
ref: One of the most disappointing aspects of this era of politics is how levels of abuse have become normalized.

src: 傑雷米·科爾賓在上禮拜表示工黨應設立容忍文化。
mt: Jeremy Corbyn said last week that the Labour Party should establish a culture of tolerance.
ref: Jeremy Corbyn claimed last week that the Labour party should foster a culture of tolerance.

src: 但實際上，我們不再是那個寬容的教堂，而每個「不信任」動議或甄選規則的改變都讓政黨變得更狹隘。
mt: But in fact, we are no longer that tolerant church, and every "no confidence" motion or change in the selection rules has made political parties even narrower.
ref: The reality is we are no longer that broad church and with every "no-confidence" motion or change of selection rules the party becomes narrower.

src: 在過去的兩年間，很多人都建議我收斂鋒芒，不要積極發聲以確保我「不會有事」。
mt: Over the past two years, many people have suggested that I stay aloof and not speak up actively to ensure that I "will be fine."
ref: I have had lots of advice over the past two years urging me to keep my head down, not to be so vocal and then I would "be all right."

src: 但這不是我投身政治的初衷。
mt: But that wasn't my intention to go into politics.
ref: But that is not what I came into politics to do.

src: 32 年前，出於對撒切爾政府對教育的忽視讓當時的綜合教育近乎癱瘓的不滿，我以學生身分加入了工黨。自此之後，我致力於為那些最需要的人群提供更好的公共服務—無論是作為地方議員還是政府部長。
mt: Thirty-two years ago, I joined the Labour Party as a student out of dissatisfaction with the government’s neglect of education, which nearly paralyzed the then-comprehensive education. Since then, I have dedicated my life to providing better public services to those who need it most – whether as a local councilor or government minister.
ref: Ever since I joined Labour 32 years ago as a school pupil, provoked by the Thatcher government's neglect that had left my comprehensive school classroom literally falling down, I've sought to champion better public services for those who need them most - whether as a local councilor or government minister.

src: 我從來沒有隱藏過我的政治意圖，其中包括在最近的選舉中。
mt: I have never hidden my political intentions, including in recent elections.
ref: I have never hidden my politics, including at the last election.

src: 我的政策立場和對現任政府的反對態度明確，在東諾丁漢沒有任何人會對此存疑。
mt: My policy stance and opposition to the current government are clear, with no one in East Nottingham doubting this.
ref: No one in Nottingham East could have been in any way confused about my policy positions and areas of disagreement with the current leadership.

src: 對於那些在禮拜五支持動議的人，我能說的是，在國家經歷可能傷害人民、商業和公共服務的脫歐政策的情況下，我不明白為什麼要在我是否對工黨領袖盡忠的這個問題上耗費這般時間和精力。
mt: For those who supported the motion on Friday, I can say that in the context of a country experiencing a Brexit policy that could harm people, business and public services, I don't understand why I'm wasting my time and effort on the question of whether I'm loyal to Labour leaders.
ref: To those who promoted the motion on Friday, all I would say is that when the country is ploughing towards a Brexit that will hurt households, businesses and our public services, I do not understand the desire to waste time and energy on my loyalty to the Labour party leader.

src: 但說到底，我不想特別向諾丁漢力量運動支持者喊話，我想對我的選民說，不論他們是否為工黨成員：我很榮幸可以為你們服務，而我承諾這些取消選舉的威脅或政治權宜不將阻止我堅持我相信將為你們帶來最大利益的事情。
mt: But in the end, I don't want to especially shout to supporters of the Nottingham Power Movement, I want to say to my voters, whether they are a Labour Party member or not: I am honored to serve you, and I promise that these election cancellation threats or political expediency will not prevent me from insisting that I believe will bring you the best interests.
ref: But really the one message I have is not to Nottingham Momentum, it is to my constituents, whether Labour members or not: I am proud to serve you and I promise that no amount of deselection threats or political expediency will deter me from acting in what I believe are the best interests of you all.

src: Chris Leslie 為東諾丁漢的國會議員
mt: Chris Leslie is a Member of Parliament for East Nottingham.
ref: Chris Leslie is MP for Nottingham East

src: Ayr 以 38 - 17 勝 Melrose：不敗 Ayr 榮登榜首
mt: Ayr 38 - 17 wins Melrose: Undefeated Ayr topped the charts
ref: Ayr 38 - 17 Melrose: Unbeaten Ayr go top

src: 即便最後的兩次嘗試可能扭轉最終成績，但 Ayr 在今天這場娛樂性十足的 Tennent 聯賽的勝利仍然為無可置疑的。
mt: Even though the last two attempts may reverse the final result, Ayr's victory in today's entertaining Tennent League remains undisputed.
ref: Two late tries may have skewed the final result somewhat, but there is no doubt Ayr deserved to triumph in this wonderfully-entertaining Tennent's Premiership match of the day.

src: 他們現在名列榜首，為十隻隊伍裡面為一一隊擁有不敗戰績的。
mt: They are currently ranked number one, with one undefeated record among the ten teams.
ref: They now top the table, the only unbeaten side of the ten.

src: 在最後，是他們的出色防守，以及對於把握機會將球帶回達陣區的獨到見解。教練 Peter Murchie 應該對球隊的表現感到無比驕傲。
mt: In the end, it was their excellent defense and their unique insight into taking the opportunity to bring the ball back to the touchdown area. Coach Peter Murchie should be extremely proud of the team’s performance.
ref: In the end, it was their superior defense, as much as their better chance-taking, which carried the home side and coach Peter Murchie had every right to be pleased.

src: 「我們已在各場比賽中嘗試了不同策略，而我們仍然保持不敗紀錄，所以我很欣慰，」他說道。
mt: "We've tried different strategies in every game, and we've still maintained an undefeated record, so I'm very pleased," he says.
ref: "We've been tested over our games this far, and we're still unbeaten, so I have to be happy," he said.

src: Melrose 的 Robyn Christie 表示：「Ayr 表現很好，他們比我們更懂得如何把握機會。」
mt: “Ayr is doing well, and they know better than us how to take advantage of it,” says Robyn Christie, Melrose.
ref: Robyn Christie of Melrose said: "Credit to Ayr, they took their chances better than we did."

src: Grant Anderson 在第 14 分鐘由 Frazier Climo 助攻的觸地得分，讓 Ayr 領先。但之後蘇格蘭隊長 Rory Hughes 因阻擋 Warriors 而收到的黃牌，卻讓 Jason Baggot 佔得機會得分，為 Melrose 追回兩隊分數差距。
mt: Grant Anderson led Ayr in the 14th minute with Frazier Climo's assist to score a run-down goal. But then Scottish captain Rory Hughes, who blocked Warriors, got a yellow card and gave Jason Baggot a chance to score, which helped Melrose regain the gap between the two teams.
ref: Grant Anderson's 14th minute try, converted by Frazier Climo, put Ayr in front, but, a yellow card for Scotland cap Rory Hughes, released for the game by Warriors, allowed Melrose to make numbers tell and Jason Baggot grabbed an unconverted try.

src: Climo 在中場休息前的罰球為 Ayr 拉開領先優勢。他在踢門後單人觸地，讓 Ayr 在中場休息期間領先分數 17-5。
mt: Climo’s penalty kick before midfield break gives Ayr a lead. He hit the ground single after the kick, allowing Ayr to lead by 17-5 points during the midfield break.
ref: Climo stretched the Ayr lead with a penalty, before, right on half-time, he scored then converted a solo try to make it 17-5 to Ayr at the break.

src: 但 Melrose 在下半場奮起直追。由 Baggot 傳球，Patrick Anderson 的觸地將差距縮減至五分。
mt: But Melrose took the second half. With Baggot passing, Patrick Anderson’s touchdown narrowed the gap to five points.
ref: But Melrose began the second half well and Patrick Anderson's try, converted by Baggot, reduced the leeway to five points.

src: 之後由於 Ruaridh Knott 的嚴重傷況比賽被迫暫時停止。Knott 之後由擔架抬走。在比賽重新開始後，Ayr 的 Climo 傳球給 Stafford McDowall 觸地得分，再次拉開兩隊分數差距。
mt: After the serious injury of Ruaridh Knott, the match was forced to be temporarily suspended. Knott was then carried away by a stretcher. After the game restarted, Ayr's Climo passed the ball to Stafford McDowall to score the ground again, opening up the score gap between the two teams.
ref: There was then a lengthy hold-up for a serious injury to Ruaridh Knott, who was stretchered off, and from the restart, Ayr surged further ahead through a Stafford McDowall try, converted by Climo.

src: Ayr 的代理隊長 Blair Macpherson 之後收到黃牌。而 Melrose 也再次利用敵隊缺少一名球員的情況，由 Bruce Colvine 掙脫敵隊壓制，在無傳球的情況下觸地得分。
mt: Blair Macpherson, the acting captain of Ayr, received a yellow card. Melrose also used the absence of one player from the opposing team to break free from the opposing team's hold and score a goal without passing.
ref: Ayr acting captain Blair Macpherson was then yellow-carded, and again, Melrose made the extra man pay with an unconverted Bruce Colvine try, at the end of a spell of fierce pressure.

src: 但是，主隊後來重新振作。隨著 Struan Hutchinson 因在 Climo 未持球的情況下推倒他而收到黃牌，MacPherson 在罰球中在 Ayr 球隊背面成功觸地。
mt: However, the home team rebounded later. With Struan Hutchinson’s yellow card for pushing him down without Climo’s possession, MacPherson successfully touched the ground on the back of the Ayr team in the free throw.
ref: The home side came back, however, and when Struan Hutchinson was yellow-carded for tackling Climo without the ball, from the penalty line-out, MacPherson touched down at the back of the advancing Ayr maul.

src: 就在 Kyle Rowe 接到 David Armstrong 的禁區踢球後，由 Climo 正如他在比賽重新開始後一般傳球助攻，由前翼鋒 Gregor Henry 為主隊帶來第五次觸地得分。
mt: Just after Kyle Rowe received David Armstrong's penalty area kick, Climo, like he did after the game restarted, generally passed assists, led by forward Gregor Henry to bring the team's fifth touchdown score.
ref: Climo converted, as he did again almost from the restart, after Kyle Rowe gathered David Armstrong's box kick and sent flanker Gregor Henry away for the home side's fifth try.

src: Still Game 男星準備好在餐飲業大展拳腳
mt: Still Game Male Stars Ready to Run in the Catering Industry
ref: Still Game star looks set for new career in restaurant industry

src: Still Game 明星 Ford Kieran 在被發現被列為註冊餐廳公司總監後，已經準備好打入觀光服務業。
mt: Still Game star Ford Kieran is ready to enter the tourism industry after he is found to be a company officer of a registered restaurant.
ref: Still Game star Ford Kieran looks set to move into the hospitality industry after it was discovered he's been named as the director of a licensed restaurants company.

src: 56 歲的 Kieran 在 BBC 熱門電視劇中扮演 Jack Jarvis。他同時也擔任電視劇編劇，並與合作多年的戲劇搭檔 Greg Hemphill 領銜主演。
mt: Kieran, 56, plays Jack Jarvis in the BBC’s popular TV series. He also writes TV series and starred in Greg Hemphill, a longtime drama partner.
ref: The 56-year-old plays Jack Jarvis on the popular BBC show, which he writes and co-stars with long-time comedy partner Greg Hemphill.

src: 二人已宣布即將推出的第九季將為該電視劇系列的最後一季，而看來 Kiernan 已在籌畫停演 Craiglang 之後的人生。
mt: The two have announced that the upcoming ninth season will be the final season of the TV series, and it seems that Kiernan is already planning a life after Craiglang's suspension.
ref: The duo have announced that the upcoming ninth series will be the final one in the show's run, and it appears Kiernan is planning for life after Craiglang.

src: 根據官方紀錄名單，他為 Adriftmorn Limited 的總監。
mt: According to the official list, he is the director of Adriftmorn Limited.
ref: According to official record listings, he is the director of Adriftmorn Limited.

src: 這名演員拒絕作出回應，但一名 Scottish Sun 消息表示 Kiernan 正尋找機會加入格拉斯哥的「蓬勃餐飲行業」。
mt: The actor refused to respond, but a Scottish Sun messaged that Kiernan was looking for an opportunity to join Glasgow's "boosting food industry".
ref: The actor declined to comment on the story, though a Scottish Sun source hinted that Kiernan was looking to get involved in Glasgow's "thriving restaurant trade."

src: 「這是我們的大海」：內陸玻利維亞希望法庭將重開通往太平洋的道路
mt: "This is our sea": the inland Bolivia hopes that the court will reopen the road to the Pacific Ocean
ref: 'The sea is ours': landlocked Bolivia hopes court will reopen path to Pacific

src: 水手在拉巴斯的一個裝備齊全的海軍總部巡遊。
mt: Sailor patrols at a fully equipped naval headquarters in La Paz.
ref: Sailors patrol a rigging-clad naval headquarters in La Paz.

src: 公共建築物高掛海藍色的旗幟。
mt: Public buildings are hung with a sea blue flag.
ref: Public buildings fly an ocean-blue flag.

src: 從的的喀喀湖到亞馬遜的海軍總部均展示口號：「大海本應屬於我們。
mt: From Lake Titicaca to the Amazon's naval headquarters, slogans are displayed: "The sea should belong to us.
ref: Naval bases from Lake Titicaca to the Amazon are daubed with the motto: "The sea is ours by right.

src: 收回它是我們的義務。」
mt: It's our duty to take it back."
ref: To recover it is a duty."

src: 在內陸地區的玻利維亞，上一次在 19 世紀的一次流血資源紛爭中向智利割讓海岸的慘痛記憶猶存—人們熱切渴望能再一次在太平洋上航行。
mt: In inland Bolivia, the painful memory of the last time Chile ceded its coast to Chile in a blood resource strife in the 19th century is still alive—people are eager to sail the Pacific again.
ref: Throughout landlocked Bolivia, the memory of a coastline lost to Chile in a bloody 19th-century resource conflict is still vivid - as is the yearning to sail the Pacific Ocean once more.

src: 隨著玻利維亞經過五年的審議，等待國際法院於 10 月 1 日作出裁決，這大概是在數十年來最有機會實現他們的希望的一次。
mt: Following five years of deliberation in Bolivia, awaiting the International Court of Justice's ruling on October 1, this is probably the most likely opportunity for them to realize their hopes in decades.
ref: Those hopes are perhaps at their highest in decades, as Bolivia awaits a ruling by the international court of justice on 1 October after five years of deliberations.

src: 「玻利維亞擁有氣勢、團結且和平的力量，對這次裁決結果持有正面期許，」玻利維亞的一名外交官 Roberto Calzadilla 表示。
mt: "Bolivia has the strength to be strong, united and peaceful, with a positive expectation of the outcome of the decision," said Roberto Calzadilla, a Bolivian diplomat.
ref: "Bolivia has the momentum, a spirit of unity and serenity, and is of course expecting with a positive view the outcome," said Roberto Calzadilla, a Bolivian diplomat.

src: 許多玻利維亞公民將在全球各地的大螢幕上收看 ICJ 裁決，期待海牙法庭將支持玻利維亞的訴求—在經歷數十年的適當會談後—讓智利同意就授予玻利維亞海上主權出口進行談判。
mt: Many Bolivian citizens will watch the ICJ ruling on big screens around the world, hoping that the Hague Court will support Bolivia's demands - after decades of appropriate talks - Chile agreed to grant Bolivian maritime sovereignty exports for negotiations.
ref: Many Bolivians will watch the ICJ ruling on big screens across the country, hopeful that the tribunal in The Hague will find in favor of Bolivia's claim that - after decades of fitful talks - Chile is obliged to negotiate granting Bolivia a sovereign outlet to the sea.

src: 玻利維亞富有魅力的原住民裔總統 Evo Morales —面臨爭議不斷的明年連任選舉挑戰—仍然密切關注禮拜一的判決。
mt: Bolivia’s charismatic Indigenous president Evo Morales, facing the challenge of his ongoing re-election next year, is still closely following Monday’s ruling.
ref: Evo Morales, Bolivia's charismatic indigenous president - who faces a controversial battle for re-election next year - also has plenty riding on Monday's ruling.

src: 「我們離回到太平洋只有一步的距離，」他在八月末承諾。
mt: "We're only one step away from returning to the Pacific," he promised at the end of August.
ref: "We are very close to returning to the Pacific Ocean," he vowed in late August.

src: 但一些分析稱法庭有很大機會不會支持玻利維亞的訴求—即便法庭表示支持，情況仍然不會得到多大改變。
mt: However, some analysis suggests that the court has a large chance of not supporting Bolivia's demands - even if the court expresses its support, the situation will still not be changed as much.
ref: But some analysts believe that the court is unlikely to decide in Bolivia's favor - and that little would change if it did.

src: 總部設立在荷蘭的聯合國組織沒有權力分派智利領土，並已表明不將決定可能發生的談判結果。
mt: The United Nations organization, headquartered in the Netherlands, has no power to allocate Chilean territory and has stated that it will not decide on possible negotiations.
ref: The Netherlands-based UN body has no power to award Chilean territory, and has stipulated that it will not determine the outcome of possible talks.

src: ICJ 的判決僅在最後的爭論發生的六個月後發出，表明情況「並不複雜」，一名智利的國際法專家 Paz Zárate 說道。
mt: ICJ’s decision was issued just six months after the final debate, indicating that the situation was “not complex”, said Paz Zárate, a Chilean international law expert.
ref: That the ICJ's ruling comes only six months after the final arguments were heard indicates the case "wasn't complicated," said Paz Zárate, a Chilean expert in international law.

src: 而與其於有助於玻利維亞的訴求，過去的四年更可能讓情況倒退。
mt: And rather than being helpful to Bolivia's demands, the past four years have been even more likely to bring the situation back.
ref: And far from furthering Bolivia's cause, the past four years may have set it back.

src: 「對於大海的存取權已被現任玻利維亞的行政管理劫持，」Zárate 說道。
mt: "The right to access the sea has been hijacked by the current administration of Bolivia," says Zárate.
ref: "The issue of access to the sea has been hijacked by the current Bolivian administration," said Zárate.

src: 她表示，Morales 的好戰宣言已抹殺了智利僅存的任何好意。
mt: She said that Morales' declaration of war had erased any remaining good intentions in Chile.
ref: Morales's belligerent rhetoric has sapped any residual Chilean goodwill, she suggested.

src: 玻利維亞和智利將在之後繼續談話，但在此之後要作任何討論將為極其困難。
mt: Bolivia and Chile will continue to talk afterwards, but any discussion after that will be extremely difficult.
ref: Bolivia and Chile will at some point continue to talk, but it will be extremely difficult to hold discussions after this.

src: 兩國自 1962 年以來已再未交換外交人員。
mt: The two countries have not exchanged diplomatic personnel since 1962.
ref: The two countries have not exchanged ambassadors since 1962.

src: 前任總統 Eduardo Rodríguez Veltzé 為玻利維亞在海牙的代表，並已否認了法院的決策異常迅速的這一說法。
mt: Former President Eduardo Rodríguez Veltzé, representing Bolivia in the Hague, has denied the claim that the court's decision was unusually rapid.
ref: Former president Eduardo Rodríguez Veltzé, Bolivia's representative at The Hague, rejected the idea that the court's decision-making was unusually speedy.

src: 禮拜一將為玻利維亞帶來「開啟與智利關係新時代的絕佳機會」，以及一個機會以「終結 139 多年來對共同權益的紛爭，」他說道。
mt: Monday will bring Bolivia "an excellent opportunity to open a new era of relations with Chile" and an opportunity to "end the 139-year-old conflict over common interests," he said.
ref: Monday will bring Bolivia "an extraordinary opportunity to open a new era of relations with Chile" and a chance to "put an end to 139 years of disagreements with mutual benefits," he said.

src: Calzadilla 亦不認為 Morales —拉丁美洲最受歡迎的總統之一—將海事糾紛作為政治籌碼所用。
mt: Calzadilla also does not consider Morales, one of the most popular presidents in Latin America, to use maritime disputes as a political chip.
ref: Calzadilla also denied that Morales - still one of Latin America's most popular presidents - was using the maritime issue as a political crutch.

src: 「玻利維亞永遠不會放棄其與太平洋連結的權利，」他表示。
mt: "Bolivia will never give up its right to connect with the Pacific," he says.
ref: "Bolivia will never give up its right to have access to the Pacific Ocean," he added.

src: 「裁決為釐清我們需要擺脫過去的一次機會。」
mt: “The ruling is to clarify the one opportunity we need to get rid of in the past.”
ref: "The ruling is an opportunity to see that we need to overcome the past."

src: 北韓表示除非美國變得可信，否則將永不解除核武
mt: North Korea says it will never lift its nuclear weapons unless the United States becomes credible
ref: North Korea says nuclear disarmament won't come unless it can trust US

src: 北韓外交部長李容浩 (Ri Yong Ho) 表示，如果無法相信華盛頓，他的國家將永遠不會解除核武。
mt: North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho said that if he could not believe Washington, his country would never lift nuclear weapons.
ref: North Korean Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho says his nation will never disarm its nuclear weapons first if it can't trust Washington.

src: 李在禮拜六在聯合國大會發表言論。
mt: Lee made a speech at the United Nations General Assembly on Saturday.
ref: Ri was speaking Saturday at the United Nations General Assembly.

src: 他要求美國履行兩國領導人在新加坡會談中許下的承諾。
mt: He demanded that the US fulfill its commitments made by leaders of both countries during talks in Singapore.
ref: He called on the United States to follow through on promises made during a summit in Singapore between the rivals' leaders.

src: 他對美國國務卿邁克·蓬佩奧 (Mike Pompeo) 發表的言論似乎要在與北韓金正恩 (Kim Jong Un) 新加坡會談後三個多月重啟陷入僵局的核外交。
mt: His statement to US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo seems to be set to reopen a deadlocked nuclear diplomacy three months after talks with North Korea's Kim Jong Un Singapore.
ref: His comments come as US. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo seems to be on the verge of restarting deadlocked nuclear diplomacy more than three months after the Singapore with North Korea's Kim Jong Un.

src: 李表示利用持續制裁和美國反對結束北韓戰爭的宣言意圖使北韓屈服為「天方夜譚」。
mt: Lee stated that he intended to make North Korea's surrender by using the declaration of continued sanctions and U.S. opposition to ending the North Korean War as a "heavenly tale".
ref: Ri says it's a "pipe dream" that continued sanctions and U.S. objection to a declaration ending the Korean War will ever bring the North to its knees.

src: 華盛頓在平壤沒有首先做出重大裁軍行動的情況下，對此宣言表示同意持謹慎態度。
mt: Washington agreed to be cautious in this declaration, without first making a major disarmament in Pyongyang.
ref: Washington is wary of agreeing to the declaration without Pyongyang first making significant disarmament moves.

src: 金和美國總統唐納德·川普 (Donald Trump) 希望舉行第二次會面。
mt: Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump hope to have a second meeting.
ref: Both Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump want a second summit.

src: 但人們普遍對平壤是否真的放棄了該國可能認為是保障其安全的唯一途徑的核武器抱持疑慮。
mt: However, people generally have doubts about whether Pyongyang has truly given up nuclear weapons, which the country may consider to be the only way to ensure its safety.
ref: But there is widespread skepticism that Pyongyang is serious about renouncing an arsenal that the country likely sees as the only way to guarantee its safety.

src: 蓬佩奧正計畫在下月造訪平壤，以為第二次金川會談作準備。
mt: Peng Pei-o is planning to visit Pyongyang next month, preparing for the second Jinchuan talks.
ref: Pompeo is planning to visit Pyongyang next month to prepare for a second Kim-Trump summit.

src: 巴黎時裝秀展出大量頭飾的最新產品線，正準備攻入你附近的商業街
mt: The Paris Fashion Show showcases a wide range of new headwear lines, ready to break into your neighborhood’s business street
ref: Paris fashion shows reveal latest line in massive headwear on it's way to a High Street near you

src: 如果你希望擴大你的帽子收藏，或完全遮擋太陽，你不需要繼續找了。
mt: If you want to expand your hat collection, or completely block the sun, you don’t need to keep looking.
ref: If you want to upsize your hat collection or completely block out the sun then look no further.

src: 設計品牌華倫天奴 (Valentino) 和湯姆·布朗 (Thom Browne) 在他們的 2019 年春夏系列時裝秀推出了一系列怪誕的大型頭飾，為巴黎時裝週帶來讓人眼花繚亂的炫目風格。
mt: Design brands Valentino and Thom Browne have launched a series of bizarre large-scale headwear pieces at their 2019 Spring/Summer Collection show, bringing dazzling glamour to Paris Fashion Week.
ref: Designers Valentino and Thom Browne unveiled an array of wacky oversized head gear for their SS19 collection on the runway which dazzled the style set at Paris Fashion Week.

src: 這些高度不切合日常穿搭的帽款在這個夏天席捲 Instagram，而這些設計師品牌也在伸展台上展示了他們的酷炫設計。
mt: These hats, which are highly unfit for everyday wear, have swept across Instagram this summer, and these designer brands have also shown their cool designs on the runway.
ref: Highly impractical hats have swept Instagram this summer and these designers have sent their eye-popping creations down the catwalk.

src: 華倫天奴最為突出的設計為一道浮誇的米色帽款，上面繡有羽毛般的粗帽邊，徹底掩蓋了模特兒的頭部。
mt: The most striking design of Warren's is a bold and fluffy beige hat style, embroidered with thick feather-like hat edges, completely covering the model's head.
ref: The stand out piece by Valentino was an over-the-top beige hat adorned with a feather-like wide brim that swamped the models heads.

src: 其他過大的配飾包括鑲有珠寶的西瓜、巫師帽，甚至是一個鳳梨—但他們的設計用意並不是為你的頭部保暖。
mt: Other oversized accessories include jeweled watermelons, wizard hats, and even a pineapple—but their design was not intended to keep your head warm.
ref: Other over-sized accessories included bejeweled watermelons, a wizard hat and even a pineapple - but they are not designed to keep your head warm.

src: 湯姆·布朗亦展出了一系列怪異的面具—正好趕上在萬聖節以前。
mt: Tom Brown also exhibited a series of strange masks - just in time for Halloween.
ref: Thom Browne also revealed a selection of bizarre masks- and just in time for Halloween.

src: 很多這些色彩繽紛的面罩嘴巴被縫上，比起高訂服裝，看起來更像是食人魔漢尼拔·萊克特 (Hannibal Lecter)。
mt: Many of these colorful masks' mouths are sewn up, looking more like the ogre Hannibal Lecter than their high-end attire.
ref: Many of the colorful masks had sewn up lips and resembled more like Hannibal Lecter than haute couture.

src: 其中一個設計更配備呼吸管和護目鏡，看起來與水肺潛水裝備幾乎如出一轍，另一個設計則看起來更像一個已融化的冰淇淋甜筒。
mt: One of the designs is more equipped with respirators and goggles, looking almost identical to scuba diving equipment, while the other looks more like a melted ice cream cone.
ref: One creation resembled scuba diving gear complete with snorkel and goggles, while another looked like a melted ice cream cone.

src: 如果你繼續堅持大型的時裝宣言—你走運了。
mt: If you keep holding on to the big fashion statement, you're in luck.
ref: And if you continue the huge fashion statement- you are in luck.

src: 專家預測巨型帽子可能正入主你附近的商業街時裝品牌。
mt: Experts predict that giant hats could be hosting street fashion brands near you.
ref: Style watchers predict that the enormous bonnets could be making their way to high streets near you.

src: 在「La Bomba」暴紅之後，從蕾哈娜 (Rihanna) 到艾蜜莉·瑞特考斯基 (Emily Ratajkowski)，幾乎所有人頭上都戴有這頂擁有兩英尺寬帽邊的草帽，從而掀起大型帽款的熱潮。
mt: After La Bomba's popularity, from Rihanna to Emily Ratajkowski, almost everyone wears this hat with a two-foot-wide hat edge on their heads, sparking a craze for large hats.
ref: The out-sized hats come hot on the heels of 'La Bomba', the straw hat with a two-foot wide brim that's been seen on everyone from Rihanna to Emily Ratajkowski.

src: 這些滿布社交媒體的高度不切合日常穿搭的帽款背後的流行標籤，為伸展台帶來另一波大型設計—一個近乎和穿著泳裝的模特一樣大的草編沙灘包。
mt: These social media-filled hats with their heights do not fit the popular labels behind the hats worn on a daily basis, bringing another wave of large-scale designs to the stretcher—a handcrafted beach bag almost the size of a model in a swimsuit.
ref: The cult label behind the highly impractical hat that was splashed across social media sent another big creation down the catwalk - a straw beach bag almost as big as the swimsuit-clad model toting it.

src: 這個褐橘色草編包款，綴有草編流蘇以及一個白色皮革把手，為品牌 Jacquemus 在巴黎時裝週展出的 2019 年春夏系列 La Riviera 的代表設計。
mt: This brown-orange woven bag is adorned with a cursor and a white leather handle, and is the representative design of the 2019 Spring/Summer Collection La Riviera by Jacquemus at the Paris Fashion Week.
ref: The burnt orange raffia bag, trimmed with raffia fringing and topped with a white leather handle, was the stand out piece in Jacquemus' La Riviera SS19 collection at Paris Fashion Week.

src: 明星造型師 Luke Armitage 向 FEMAIL 表示：「我預計將在這個夏天的商業街時裝品牌中看到很多大型帽子和沙灘包款—由於設計師已經展現了對大型飾品的追求，因此其他品牌很難忽視市場對這類巨型配件的需求。」
mt: Star stylist Luke Armitage told FEMAIL, “I’m expecting to see a lot of big hats and beach bags this summer at the commercial streetwear brands—because designers have already shown their pursuit of big accessories, it’s hard for other brands to ignore the market demand for these huge accessories.”
ref: Celebrity stylist Luke Armitage told FEMAIL: 'I'm expecting to see large hats and beach bags arrive on the high street for next summer - as the designer has made such a huge impact it would be hard to ignore the demand for the oversized accessories.'

src: John Edward：語言能力對全球公民來說都是必備的
mt: John Edward: Language skills are essential for global citizens
ref: John Edward: Languages skills essential for global citizens

src: 蘇格蘭的獨立學校持續保持卓越學術表現的記錄，並在 2018 年繼續交出另一套優秀的考試成績單，而只有學生在體育、藝術、音樂和其他社區活動方面獲得個人和團隊成就才能為學校帶來這一優良成績。
mt: Independent schools in Scotland continue to maintain a record of outstanding academic performance and deliver another set of excellent test scores in 2018, with only students achieving personal and team achievements in sports, art, music and other community activities bringing this excellent result to the school.
ref: Scotland's independent schools maintain a track record of academic excellence, and this has continued in 2018 with another set of outstanding exam results, which is only strengthened by individual and collective success in sports, art, music and other community endeavors.

src: 隨著蘇格蘭的 30,000 名學生人數持續攀升，這些由蘇格蘭獨立學校理事會 (Scottish Council of Independent Schools, SCIS) 代表的學校，致力於向他們的學生及家長提供最高級別的服務。
mt: As the number of 30,000 students in Scotland continues to climb, these schools represented by the Scottish Council of Independent Schools (SCIS) are committed to providing their students and parents with the highest level of service.
ref: With upwards of 30,000 pupils across Scotland, these schools, represented by The Scottish Council of Independent Schools (SCIS), strive to deliver the best level of service to their pupils and parents.

src: 獨立學校旨在幫助學生為進修和高等教育、他們選擇的職業以及他們作為全球公民的角色做好準備。
mt: Independent schools are designed to help students prepare for further education and higher education, the professions they choose, and their role as global citizens.
ref: Independent schools aim to prepare their pupils for further and higher education, their chosen career and their place as global citizens.

src: 作為擁有設計和落實定制的學校課程的自由的教育機構，我們看到當代語言繼續成為學校內廣受學生歡迎且希望選讀的科目。
mt: As a free educational institution with the design and implementation of customized school curriculum, we see that contemporary languages continue to be a popular subject in the school that students want to take.
ref: As an education sector that can design and implement a bespoke school curriculum, we are seeing modern languages continue as a popular and desired subject of choice within schools.

src: 納爾遜·曼德拉 (Nelson Mandela) 曾說道：「如果你用一個人會的語言和他交談，他會用腦記住你說的話。
mt: Nelson Mandela once said, "If you talk to him in a language that a person can speak, he will remember what you say with his brain.
ref: Nelson Mandela said: "If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head.

src: 如果你用一個人的母語和他交談，他會用心記住你說的話。」
mt: If you talk to him in his native language, he will remember what you say with all his heart. "
ref: If you talk to him in his own language that goes to his heart."

src: 有鑑及此，我們在希望與來自其他國家/地區的人建立關係和信任的時候，不能僅僅依賴英文。
mt: In view of this, when we want to build relationships and trust with people from other countries, we cannot rely solely on English.
ref: This is a powerful reminder that we can't just rely on English when wanting to build relationships and trust with people from other countries.

src: 從今年最新的考試成績來看，我們會發現榜單上獨立學校及格率最高的幾個科目都是語言科目。
mt: From the latest examination results this year, we will find that the top few subjects on the list of independent schools with the highest scores are all language subjects.
ref: From this year's recent exam results, we can see that languages are topping the league tables with the highest pass rates within independent schools.

src: 修讀外國語言中的百分之 68 的學生考取了高級別 A 等。
mt: 68% of students who studied foreign languages passed the Advanced Level A.
ref: A total of 68 per cent of pupils who studied foreign languages achieved a Higher grade A.

src: 這項從 SCIS 的 74 家成員學校獲取的數據，顯示百分之 72 的學生在中文考取了高級別 A 等，選修德文的則有百分之 72，法文的為百分之 69，而選修西班牙文的則有百分之 63 成功考取高級別 A 等。
mt: The data from 74 SCIS member schools showed that 72 % of students tested into the high A class in Chinese, 72 % took German as an elective, 69 % in French, and 63 % took Spanish as an elective.
ref: The data, collected from SCIS's 74 member schools, showed that 72 per cent of students achieved a Higher grade A in Mandarin, while 72 per cent of those studying German, 69 per cent of those studying French and 63 per cent studying Spanish also achieved an A.

src: 這表示蘇格蘭的獨立學校支援學生修讀外國語言，且相信孩童和青少年在未來將需要用上這些必備的語言能力。
mt: This means that independent schools in Scotland support students to study foreign languages, and believe that children and teenagers will need to use these necessary language skills in the future.
ref: This demonstrates that independent schools in Scotland are supporting foreign languages as vital skills that children and young people will undoubtedly require in the future.

src: 現在，語言作為選修科目，在獨立學校課程和其他領域皆被視為與主幹 (STEM) 科目（即科學、科技、工程和數學）擁有同等比重。
mt: Currently, as an elective subject, language is considered to have the same proportion as STEM subjects (science, technology, engineering and mathematics) in independent school courses and other fields.
ref: Languages now, as a subject choice, are being held in the same regard as STEM subjects (science, technology, engineering and mathematics) in independent school curriculums and elsewhere.

src: 一個由英國就業和技能委員會 (UK Commission for Employment and Skills) 在 2014 年進行的調查顯示，百分之 17 的雇主表示因為求職者語言能力欠缺才在空缺徵才時無法徵得合適人才。
mt: A 2014 survey conducted by the UK Commission for Employment and Skills found that 17% of employers said they were unable to recruit suitable candidates due to a lack of language ability.
ref: A survey by the UK Commission for Employment and Skills in 2014 found that of reasons employers gave for struggling to fill vacancies, 17 per cent were attributed to a languages skills shortage.

src: 因此，語言能力逐漸成為年輕一代為達致其未來職業期許的必備條件。
mt: Therefore, language ability has gradually become a necessary condition for the younger generation to achieve their future professional expectations.
ref: Therefore more and more, language skills are becoming imperative in order to prepare young people for their future careers.

src: 隨著越來越多徵才職缺對語言能力設有一定要求，這些能力在全球化社會中同樣亦為必備的。
mt: As more and more job openings have set certain requirements for language ability, these abilities are also necessary in a global society.
ref: With more prospective job opportunities requiring languages, these skills are essential in a globalized world.

src: 不論個人選擇的行業為何，如果他們擁有第二種語言能力，他們在將來會因此終身能力享有明顯優勢。
mt: Regardless of the industry chosen by individuals, if they have second language ability, they will enjoy a significant advantage in the future due to this lifelong ability.
ref: Regardless of the career someone chooses, if they've learned a second language, they'll have a real advantage in the future having a life-long skill such as this.

src: 可以直接與來自其他國家的人溝通，讓一個會多國語言的人才在求職競爭中將自動被優先考慮。
mt: You can communicate directly with people from other countries, so that a multilingual person will be automatically prioritized in the job search competition.
ref: Being able to communicate directly with people from foreign countries will automatically put a multilingual person ahead of the competition.

src: 根據一項 YouGov 調查，在 2013 年英國超過 4,000 名成年人（百分之七十五）沒有說另一種語言的能力，而法文是唯一一種有雙位數百分比（百分之十五）人數會講的外國語言。
mt: According to a YouGov survey, more than 4,000 adults (75 percent) in the UK did not have the ability to speak another language in 2013, and French was the only foreign language with a double-digit percentage (15 percent) speaking.
ref: According to a YouGov poll of more than 4,000 UK adults in 2013, 75 per cent were unable to speak a foreign language well enough to hold a conversation and with French being the only language spoken by a double-digit percentage, 15 per cent.

src: 因此，在語言教學中投入更多資源對現在的孩童而言為極其重要的。
mt: Therefore, investing more resources in language teaching is extremely important for today's children.
ref: This is why putting the investment into language teaching now is important for today's children.

src: 會講多國語言，尤其是發展中國家的官方語言，將讓孩童擁有更大的機會在將來找到一份有意義的職業。
mt: Speaking multiple languages, especially official languages of developing countries, will give children a greater chance to find a meaningful profession in the future.
ref: Having multiple languages, particularly those of developing economies, will equip children with a better chance of finding meaningful employment.

src: 在蘇格蘭，每間學校將提供不同的語言教學。
mt: In Scotland, each school will provide different language teaching.
ref: Within Scotland, each school will differ in the languages they teach.

src: 一部分學校將專注於教授那些較古典的現代語言，而其他學校則將教授對英國在 2020 年之後發展較為重要的國家官方語言，例如中文或日文。
mt: Some schools will focus on teaching those more classical modern languages, while others will teach the most important national official languages for the UK to develop after 2020, such as Chinese or Japanese.
ref: A number of schools will focus on the more classic modern languages, whereas others will teach languages that are deemed to be most important for the UK when looking ahead to 2020, such as Mandarin or Japanese.

src: 不論你的孩子興趣為何，總能在獨立學校提供的廣泛語言選項中找到適合的選擇，並接受這方面的專家指導。
mt: Whatever your child’s interests, you’ll always find the right option in the wide range of language options available at independent schools and receive expert guidance on this.
ref: Whatever your child's interest, there will always be a number of languages to choose from within independent schools, with teaching staff who are specialists in this area.

src: 蘇格蘭的獨立學校致力於營造一個良好學習環境，無論以後的發展為何，為孩童提供成功所需的技能。
mt: Independent schools in Scotland are committed to creating a good learning environment, providing children with the skills they need to succeed no matter what future development may be.
ref: Scottish independent schools are dedicated to providing a learning environment that will prepare children and arm them with the skills required to succeed, whatever the future holds.

src: 但在這個國際商業環境，無可置疑的是，語言將對國家的未來發展繼續起到重要作用，所以教育必須做出相應配合。
mt: However, in this international business environment, it is undeniable that language will continue to play an important role in the country's future development, so education must make corresponding adjustments.
ref: It can't be denied at this time, in a global business environment, that languages continue to be vitally important to the country's future, so this must be mirrored in education.

src: 確實，現代語言應該被視為「國際溝通技能」。
mt: Indeed, modern languages should be considered as "international communication skills".
ref: Indeed, modern languages should really be considered "international communication skills."

src: 獨立學校將繼續為蘇格蘭的年輕一代提供廣泛、多元化的優質選項。
mt: Independent schools will continue to offer a wide and diverse range of quality options for Scotland's younger generation.
ref: Independent schools will continue to offer this choice, diversity and excellence for Scotland's young people.

src: 這是必須的 (Il faut bien le faire)。
mt: This is necessary (Il faut bien le faire).
ref: Il faut bien le faire.

src: John Edward 為蘇格蘭獨立學校理事會主席
mt: John Edward is Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Scottish Independent School
ref: John Edward is Director of the Scottish Council of Independent Schools

src: 勒布朗 (LeBron) 將在禮拜天的聖地牙哥首次為湖人出戰
mt: LeBron will be fighting for the Lakers for the first time in San Diego on Sunday.
ref: LeBron to make Lakers debut Sunday in San Diego

src: 粉絲們引頸期盼的勒布朗·詹姆士 (LeBron James) 即將為洛杉磯湖人隊首次征戰。
mt: Fans are excited to see LeBron James make his Los Angeles Lakers debut.
ref: The wait is nearly over for fans looking to see LeBron James make his first start for the Los Angeles Lakers.

src: 湖人教練路克·華頓 (Luke Walton) 已宣布詹姆士將出戰禮拜天在聖地牙哥對戰丹佛金塊隊 (Denver Nuggets) 的季前開幕戰。
mt: Lakers coach Luke Walton has announced that James will be playing in the preseason opening game against Denver Nuggets in San Diego on Sunday.
ref: Lakers coach Luke Walton has announced that James will play in Sunday's preseason opener against the Denver Nuggets in San Diego.

src: 但仍未決定他將上場多少分鐘。
mt: However, it has yet to be decided how many minutes he will play.
ref: But just how many minutes he'll play has yet to be determined.

src: 「他將出戰超過一分鐘，但少於 48 分鐘，」華頓在湖人的官方網站上表示。
mt: "He's going to fight for more than a minute, but less than 48 minutes," Watton said on the Lakers' official website.
ref: "It will be more than one and less than 48," said Walton on the Lakers" official website.

src: 湖人記者 Mike Trudell 發表 tweet 推送表示詹姆士有很大機會只會出戰一小段時間。
mt: Lakers reporter Mike Trudell posted a tweet saying James had a good chance of only fighting for a short time.
ref: Lakers reporter Mike Trudell tweeted that James will likely play limited minutes.

src: 在這個禮拜初的練習後，詹姆士被問及他在湖人這六場季前賽的安排。
mt: After practice at the beginning of this week, James was asked about his arrangements for the six preseason games with the Lakers.
ref: Following practice earlier this week, James was asked about his plans for the Lakers" six-game preseason schedule.

src: 「到了我職業生涯的這個階段，我已經不需要參加季前賽進行熱身，」他說道。
mt: "At this stage of my career, I no longer need to go into preseason games to get warmed up," he says.
ref: "I don't need preseason games at this stage of my career to get ready," he said.

src: 川普的西維吉尼亞集會時段，YouTube 頻道
mt: Trump’s West Virginia Rally, YouTube Channel
ref: Trump's West Virginia Rally Time, YouTube Channel

src: 總統唐納德·川普 (Donald Trump) 今晚將在西維吉尼亞的 Wheeling 展開一系列競選集會活動。
mt: President Donald Trump is holding a series of campaign rallies tonight at Wheeling, West Virginia.
ref: President Donald Trump begins a flurry of campaign rallies tonight in Wheeling, West Virginia.

src: 這是川普在接下來的一個禮拜內安排的五場集會中的第一場，其中包括在田納西和密西西比等友好地區的停站活動。
mt: This was Trump's first of five meetings scheduled over the next week, including stop-and-go activities in friendly areas such as Tennessee and Mississippi.
ref: It's Trump's first of five scheduled rallies in the next week, including stops in friendly places including Tennessee and Mississippi.

src: 隨著他對高等法院空缺的推薦人選確認票被予以保留，共和黨面臨在十一月投票後可能失去議會控制的危機，所以川普正積極為之後的中期選舉建立支持。
mt: As his confirmation of the recommendation vote for the High Court vacancy was retained, the Republican Party faced a crisis that could lose parliamentary control after the November vote, so Trump is actively building up support for subsequent midterm elections.
ref: With the confirmation vote on hold for his pick to fill the Supreme Court vacancy, Trump is aiming to build support for upcoming mid-term elections since Republicans are at risk of losing control of Congress when votes are cast on Nov.

src: 川普今晚的西維吉尼亞集會將在什麼時候舉行？我可以透過什麼渠道在網上收看？
mt: When will Trump's West Virginia rally be held tonight? What channels can I watch online?
ref: What time is Trump's West Virginia rally tonight and how do you watch online?

src: 川普的西維吉尼亞州 Wheeling 集會計畫將在今天（2018 年 9 月 29日）晚上 7 點（東部時間）舉行。
mt: Trump’s Wheeling session in West Virginia will take place today (September 29, 2018) at 7 p.m. ET.
ref: Trump's Wheeling, West Virginia rally is scheduled for 7 p.m. ET tonight, Saturday, September 29, 2018.

src: 你可以透過下列 YouTube 的直播收看川普的西維吉尼亞集會。
mt: You can watch Trump’s West Virginia rally live on YouTube here.
ref: You can watch Trump's West Virginia rally online below via live stream on YouTube.

src: 川普預計將提及這個禮拜就他的最高法院提名人布雷特·卡瓦諾 (Brett Kavanaugh) 的聽證會。相關提名在聯邦調查局調查期間，本來預定的參議院確認投票因針對卡瓦諾的性騷擾指控被擱置長達一周，讓局勢變得日漸緊張。
mt: Trump expects to mention a hearing this week about his Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh. The nomination, which was supposedly scheduled during the FBI investigation, has been put on hold for a week after the Senate confirmed that the vote for sexual harassment against Kavanaugh has become increasingly tense.
ref: Trump is likely to address this week's hearings for Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh, which became tense over sexual misconduct allegations with an anticipated Senate confirmation vote on hold for up to a week while the FBI investigates.

src: 但這系列集會的主要目的是為了幫助在十一月的選舉支持率不足的共和黨員爭取民眾支持。
mt: However, the main purpose of this series of meetings is to help Republicans with insufficient election support in November win public support.
ref: But the primary aim of this flurry of rallies is helping Republicans facing touch November elections gain some momentum.

src: 因此，根據路透社報導，總統川普的競選內容表示接下來一個禮拜的五場集會旨在「在共和黨員試圖保護和擴大他們在參議院和眾議院中佔多數的控制情況下，爭取志願者和支持者的投票支持」。
mt: Therefore, according to a Reuters report, the content of President Trump's campaign stated that the next five meetings in the next week were aimed at "seeking support from volunteers and supporters in cases where Republicans tried to protect and expand their majority control in the Senate and House of Representatives".
ref: Thus, President Trump's campaign said these five rallies in the next week are aimed at "energizing volunteers and supporters as Republicans try to protect and expand the majorities they hold in the Senate and House of Representatives," according to Reuters.

src: 「國會控制權對他的政策而言極其關鍵，所以總統將在之後的競選拉票季節儘量造訪眾多州份，」一名選擇匿名的川普競選活動發言人向路透社表示。
mt: "Congress control is extremely critical to his policies, so the president will visit as many states as possible during the upcoming campaign season," a Trump campaign spokesman who chose to remain anonymous told Reuters.
ref: "Control of Congress is so critical for his agenda that the president will travel to as many states as possible as we head into the busy campaign season," a Trump campaign spokesman who declined to be named told Reuters.

src: 今晚的集會計畫將在 Wheeling 的 Wesbanco Arena 舉行，且將吸引來自「俄亥俄州和賓夕法尼亞州的支持者，並博得匹茲堡媒體的報導，」西維吉尼亞 Metro 新聞報導稱。
mt: Tonight's rally plan will be held at Wheeling's Wesbanco Arena and will attract supporters from "Ohio and Pennsylvania, and be featured in the Pittsburgh media," West Virginia Metro News reported.
ref: Scheduled for Wesbanco Arena in Wheeling, tonight's rally could bring supporters from "Ohio and Pennsylvania and draw coverage from the Pittsburgh media," according to the West Virginia Metro News.

src: 在禮拜六，川普將在過去一個月內第二次造訪西維吉尼亞州，也就是他在 2016 年以超過百分之 40 贏得選舉的州份。
mt: On Saturday, Trump will visit West Virginia for the second time in the past month, the state he won more than 40 percent of the election in 2016.
ref: Saturday will be the second time in the past month that Trump has visited West Virginia, the state he won by more than 40 percentage points in 2016.

src: 川普正嘗試幫助民調落後的西維吉尼亞共和黨參議員提名人 Patrick Morrisey 爭取支持。
mt: Trump is trying to help Patrick Morrisey, the under-reported West Virginia Republican Senator nominee, fight for support.
ref: Trump is trying to help West Virginia Republican Senate candidate Patrick Morrisey, who is trailing in the polls.

src: 「對 Morrisey 而言，總統需要到這裏為他爭取民調上的支持並不是一件好事，」西維吉尼亞大學的政治學家 Simon Haeder 向路透社表示。
mt: "For Morrisey, it's not a good thing that the president needs to come here to get his support for polls," said Simon Haeder, a political scientist at West Virginia University, to Reuters.
ref: "It's not a good sign for Morrisey that the president has to come to try to give him a boost in the polls," said Simon Haeder, a political scientist at West Virginia University, according to Reuters.

src: 2018 年萊德杯：美國隊為希望打入禮拜天的單打賽，展現無窮鬥志
mt: 2018 Ryder Cup: The United States team has shown a lot of fighting spirit in their hopes of reaching Sunday’s singles tournament
ref: Ryder Cup 2018: Team USA show stomach for fight to keep hopes alive heading into Sunday singles

src: 在三場實力懸殊的比賽後，禮拜六下午的四人賽可能才是萊德杯觀眾期待的激烈戰況。
mt: After three of the most competitive matches, the four-man race on Saturday afternoon may be the fierce battle that the audience of the Ryder Cup is expecting.
ref: After three one-sided sessions, Saturday afternoon's foursomes might just have been what this Ryder Cup needed.

src: 旋轉擺的勢頭雖然只是一個沒有根據的運動概念，但從這些比賽中可以看到，球員們明顯都極其相信這一說法。
mt: Although the momentum of the rotating pendulum is just an unfounded concept of sports, it can be seen from these competitions that players are obviously extremely convinced of this statement.
ref: The swinging pendulum of momentum is a completely invented sporting concept but one that players truly believe in, and never more so than at competitions like these.

src: 所以按照專家所言，現在的勢頭又在誰身上呢？
mt: So, according to experts, who is the current position?
ref: So where would they say the momentum is now?

src: 「他們本享有六分的領先優勢，但現在卻變成了四分，所以我們大概可以將這個優勢視為一種小小的勢頭，」喬丹·史畢斯 (Jordan Spieth) 在出門前表示。
mt: “They were supposed to have a six-point lead, but now they’re four, so we can probably think of that as a small momentum,” said Jordan Spieth before he left.
ref: "They had a six-point lead and now it's four, so we are carrying that as a little bit of momentum I guess," said Jordan Spieth as he strolled off for the day.

src: 歐洲隊當然也有優勢，除了本來就領先四分外之後還有十二分。
mt: Of course, the European team also had an advantage, with a four-point lead and 12 points behind it.
ref: Europe have the advantage, of course, four points ahead with twelve more in play.

src: 但正如史畢斯所說，美國隊看似表現未如預期，但卻仍然作出值得鼓勵的表現。至少史畢斯和賈斯汀·湯瑪斯 (Justin Thomas) 這兩個每天一起比賽的選手就每人都將三分的得分拉至了四分。
mt: But, as Spis said, the U.S. team seemed to have failed to do what they expected, but they still did something to encourage them. At least two players, Spis and Justin Thomas, who played together every day, each scored three points to four points.
ref: The Americans, as Spieth says, feel they have a little wind in their sails though and they have plenty to be encouraged by, not least the form of Spieth and Justin Thomas who played together all day and each boast three points from four.

src: 史畢斯從發球點到果嶺球球逼人，並以身作則名列榜首。
mt: Spies went from serving point to scoring on the Fruit Ridge, and he led the list.
ref: Spieth has been lethal from tee to green and is leading by example.

src: 那些發自肺腑的歡呼聲隨著他的比賽繼續變得震耳欲聾。當他和湯瑪斯在兩場比賽中失利後，他的一次關鍵推桿入球，讓四場比賽結果平手。
mt: The cheers that came from his lungs grew deafening as his game continued to grow. When he and Thomas lost in two games, one of his key-pitch goals tied the four games.
ref: Those guttural screams of celebration got louder as his round went on, sinking a crucial putt to take match four all-square when he and Thomas had been two down after two.

src: 他在 15 局為隊伍贏得比賽的推桿贏得了支持者的歡呼吶喊，讓大家相信美國隊還未全然出局。
mt: He won cheers and cheers from supporters for the team to win the game's putter in 15 innings, convincing everyone that the US team had not yet been completely eliminated.
ref: His putt that won them the match on 15 was met with a similar scream, the sort that tells you he believes that the American team is not out of this.

src: 「你真的需要用力揮桿並專注於你自己的比賽，」史畢斯說道。
mt: "You really need to swing hard and focus on your own game," Spies said.
ref: "You've really just got to dig deep and worry about your own match," Spieth said.

src: 這也是現在每名球員需要抱持的心態。
mt: This is also the mindset that every player needs now.
ref: It is all each of these players has left now.

src: 18 球為一局。
mt: 18 balls in one game.
ref: 18 holes to make a mark.

src: 比史畢斯和湯瑪斯在過去兩天獲得更高分的為莫里納瑞 (Francesco Molinari) 和湯米·弗利特伍德 (Tommy Fleetwood)。他們可謂萊德杯無可爭議的傳奇故事。
mt: More points than Spies and Thomas have scored in the past two days are Francesco Molinari and Tommy Fleetwood. They can be called the undisputed legend of the Ryder Cup.
ref: The only players with more points than Spieth and Thomas over the past two days are Francesco Molinari and Tommy Fleetwood, the indisputable story of the Ryder Cup.

src: 歐洲隊這對奇妙的組合獲得滿分，已然勝券在握。
mt: The European team won a perfect score for this wonderful combination, and the winning ticket was already in hand.
ref: Europe's odd but adorable couple are four from four and can do no wrong.

src: 「莫里伍德 (Moliwood)」組合為在禮拜六下午為一一對沒有打出博忌 (bogey) 的組合，但他們亦在禮拜六早上、禮拜五下午和禮拜五早上的後九洞避開了博忌。
mt: “Moliwood” was a combination of a pair of non-bogeys on Saturday afternoons, but they also avoided them on Saturday mornings, Friday afternoons and Friday mornings at the back nine holes.
ref: "Moliwood" were the only pair not to shoot a bogey on Saturday afternoon, but they also avoided bogeys on Saturday morning, Friday afternoon and the back nine on Friday morning.

src: 那場比賽以及他們的能量似乎與打氣人群相連接，讓他們成為了其他球員在禮拜天最希望擊敗的敵人。弗利特伍德或莫里納瑞也成為了最有機會為歐洲帶來國家高爾夫球場 (Le Golf National) 凱旋勝利的熱門人選。
mt: The match and their energy seem to be connected to the cheering crowd, making them the most sought-after opponents for other players on Sunday. Fleetwood or Moline also became the most popular choice for bringing the Le Golf National victory to Europe.
ref: That run, and the way their energy seems to flow both to and from this boisterous crowd cements that they are the players to beat on Sunday, and there would be no more popular player to seal a potential European victory as the sun sets over Le Golf National than Fleetwood or Molinari.

src: 最好的是，兩人同時在不同洞局獲得相同分數。
mt: The best thing is that both players get the same score in different holes simultaneously.
ref: Preferably both simultaneously on different holes.

src: 但是，歐洲獲冠一說仍為時過早。
mt: However, it is still too early for Europe to be crowned.
ref: Talk of European glory remains premature, though.

src: 布巴·華生 (Bubba Watson) 和韋伯·辛普森 (Webb Simpson) 在對戰早上的四球局英雄賈西亞 (Sergio Garcia) 和亞歷山大·諾倫 (Alex Noren) 時失利。
mt: Bubba Watson and Webb Simpson lose to Sergio Garcia and Alex Noren, the four-inning hero of the morning.
ref: Bubba Watson and Webb Simpson made short work of Sergio Garcia, the morning's fourballs hero, when he was paired with Alex Noren.

src: 在前九個洞的一記博忌和兩記雙博忌，讓這名西班牙和瑞典選手組合陷入無法翻身的困局。
mt: The first nine holes of a bo-ji and two double bo-ji, put this Spanish and Swedish team into a difficult situation to turn over.
ref: A bogey and two doubles on the front nine dug the Spaniard and the Swede into a hole they never got close to climbing out of.

src: 但在禮拜天，只有自己可以幫助自己爬出困局。
mt: But on Sundays, only I can help myself get out of trouble.
ref: On Sunday, though, there is nobody to help you out of your hole.

src: 這場四球的四人戰況精采絕倫，其中隊伍間的互動、互相給予和保留的建議，以及其中涉及的戰略可以在一瞬間扭轉戰況。
mt: The four-ball battle was extremely thrilling, with interactions between teams, mutual advice and reservations, as well as strategies involved that could turn the situation around in an instant.
ref: The fourballs and foursomes are so fascinating to watch up close because of the interactions between pairings, the advice they give, the advice they don't and the way that a strategy can change in an instant.

src: 歐洲隊作為一個團隊而言已打出出色表現，並已明顯優勢進入決賽日。但這次的四人賽賽果亦顯示美國隊，雖然飽受一部份人（尤其是美國主義者）質疑，仍有足夠底氣爭取最終勝利。
mt: The European team, as a team, has performed outstandingly and has clearly gained an advantage to advance to the finals day. However, the results of the four-man match also show that the US team, although questioned by some people (especially Americanists), still has enough strength to fight for the final victory.
ref: Europe have played better as a team thus far and take a significant lead into the final day but this foursomes session also showed that Team USA has the stomach for the fight that some, especially Stateside, had been doubting.

src: 歐洲隊以 10-6 領先姿態打入最後一天的萊德杯比賽
mt: European team leads 10-6 to the final of the Ryder Cup.
ref: Europe take 10-6 lead into Ryder Cup final day

src: 在禮拜六的四球局和四人賽後，歐洲隊將以對美國隊的 10-6 明顯領先優勢進入萊德杯的最後一天比賽。
mt: After a four-goal and four-goal game on Saturday, the European team will enter the final day of the Ryder Cup with a clear 10-6 lead over the US team.
ref: Europe will take a healthy advantage into the final day of the Ryder Cup after emerging from Saturday's fourballs and foursomes matches with a 10-6 lead over the United States.

src: 其中表現優越的二人組湯米·弗利特伍德 (Tommy Fleetwood) 和莫里納瑞 (Francesco Molinari) 更以的兩場勝者姿態領先表現平平的老虎伍茲 (Tiger Woods)，讓他們在國家高爾夫球場 (Le Golf National) 的積分領先至四分。
mt: The two-team duo, Tommy Fleetwood and Francesco Molinari, outperformed the mediocre Tiger Woods by winning two games, leading them to a four-point lead on Le Golf National.
ref: Inspired duo Tommy Fleetwood and Francesco Molinari led the charge with two victories over a struggling Tiger Woods to take their tally so far at Le Golf National to four points.

src: 湯瑪斯·碧陽 (Thomas Bjorn) 的歐洲隊，一心希望贏回他們兩年前在 Hazeltine 錯失的獎杯，則在早上的四球局中輕鬆壓制頻頻出錯的美國隊，以 3-1 取得勝利。
mt: Thomas Bjorn's European team, eager to win back their two-year-old Hazeltine-lost trophy, easily suppressed the US team that had been making frequent mistakes in the morning's four-inning game, and won with a score of 3-1.
ref: Thomas Bjorn's European side, bidding to retain the trophy they lost at Hazeltine two years ago, dominated a misfiring American side in the morning fourballs, taking the series 3-1.

src: 美國隊在四人賽表現回穩並贏回兩場賽事，但他們卻不可因此鬆懈。
mt: The U.S. team performed well in the four-man game and won back two games, but they cannot relax from it.
ref: The U.S. offered more resistance in the foursomes, winning two matches, but they could not eat into the deficit.

src: 吉姆·佛瑞克 (Jim Furyk) 領軍的美國隊需要在禮拜天的十二場單人賽事中贏回八分以成功衛冕。
mt: The U.S. team led by Jim Furyk needs to win back eight points on Sunday's 12 singles matches to successfully defend their title.
ref: Jim Furyk's side need eight points from Sunday's 12 singles matches to retain the trophy.

src: 弗利特伍德為第一名首次參賽就連續贏得四分的歐洲新手。他與莫里納瑞（簡稱為「莫里伍德 (Molliwood)）的組合在周末的激烈賽事過後，為第二隊在萊德杯歷史上自開場的四場比賽贏得四分的隊伍。
mt: Flitwood is the first European newcomer to win four points in a row for the first time. He teamed up with Molliwood to win four points for the second team in four games in the history of the Ryder Cup after a weekend of intense competition.
ref: Fleetwood is the first European rookie to win four points in a row while he and Molinari, dubbed "Molliwood" after a sensational weekend are only the second pair to win four points from their opening four matches in Ryder Cup history.

src: 在四球局中輾壓伍茲和派崔克·瑞德 (Patrick Reed) 後，他們以更明顯的 5&4 局擊敗士氣全失的伍茲和美國新人萊森·狄尚博 (Bryson Dechambeau)。
mt: After toppling Woods and Patrick Reed in four innings, they defeated the American rookie Bryson Dechambeau with a more pronounced 5-4 score.
ref: Having crushed Woods and Patrick Reed in the fourballs they then gelled superbly to beat a deflated Woods and American rookie Bryson Dechambeau by an even more emphatic 5&4.

src: 伍茲在經歷禮拜六的兩場比賽後，偶爾打出漂亮成績。但他已然在 29 場四球局和四人賽中已經輸掉了 19 場，且已連續失利七場比賽。
mt: Woods has occasionally had a good record after two Saturday matches. But he has already lost 19 of his 29 four-innings and four-way matches, and has also lost seven straight games.
ref: Woods, who dragged himself through two matches on Saturday, showed occasional bursts of brilliance but he has now lost 19 of his 29 matches in fourballs and foursomes and seven in a row.

src: 賈斯汀·羅斯 (Justin Rose) 在為上午的四球局休息後，與搭檔亨瑞克·史坦森 (Henrik Stenson) 回歸參加四人賽，並以 2&1 的比數勝於世界排名分別為第一和第三的達斯丁·強森 (Dustin Johnson) 和布魯克斯·柯普卡 (Brooks Koepka)。
mt: After a four-inning rest in the morning, Justin Rose returned with his partner Henrik Stenson to compete in the four-player tournament, and won 2-1 against world No. 1 and No. 3 Dustin Johnson and Brooks Koepka.
ref: Justin Rose, rested for the morning fourballs, returned to partner Henrik Stenson in the foursomes to a 2&1 defeat of Dustin Johnson and Brooks Koepka - ranked one and three in the world.

src: 在這個巴黎西南部的藍天下，歐洲隊卻也未獲得壓倒性的勝果。
mt: In the blue sky of southwest Paris, the European team also failed to achieve a crushing victory.
ref: Europe did not have it al their own way though on a pleasant, breezy day south west of Paris.

src: 三次大滿貫贏家喬丹·史畢斯 (Jordan Spieth) 和賈斯汀·湯瑪斯 (Justin Thomas) 就在禮拜六為美國隊帶來兩分進帳。
mt: Three Grand Slam champions Jordan Spieth and Justin Thomas scored two points for the U.S. team on Saturday.
ref: Three-times major winner Jordan Spieth and Justin Thomas set the benchmark for the Americans with two points on Saturday.

src: 他們在對戰西班牙的霍恩·拉姆 (Jon Rahm) 和伊恩·波特 (Ian Poulter) 的四球局中好不容易獲得 2&1 的勝局，並在之後回歸在四人賽中僅輸去了首兩個洞，以 4&3 的成績打敗波特和羅瑞·麥克羅伊 (Rory McIlroy)。
mt: They had a hard time winning 2&1 in the four-inning game against Spain's Jon Rahm and Ian Poulter, and later returned to win only the first two holes in the four-way match, beating out Rory McIlroy with a score of 4&3.
ref: They earned a gritty 2&1 win over Spain's Jon Rahm and Ian Poulter in the fourballs and returned later to beat Poulter and Rory McIlroy 4&3 in the foursomes having lost the opening two holes.

src: 萊德杯歷史中只有兩次曾有一個隊伍在四分落後的情況下進入單人賽，但作為衛冕隊伍，佛瑞克領軍的美國隊只需要打成平局即可繼續衛冕。
mt: In the history of the Ryder Cup, there have been only two times in which a team was four points behind and entered the singles competition, but as the defending champion, the US team led by Fredrick only needed to tie the game to continue defending their title.
ref: Only twice in Ryder Cup history has a team come back from a four-point deficit going into the singles, although as holders Furyk's side need only draw to retain the trophy.

src: 但是，在連續兩天打出第二名的成績後，是否能在禮拜天作出猛烈反擊看來仍為未知之數。
mt: However, after two consecutive days of second place results, whether it can make a fierce counterattack on Sunday is still unknown.
ref: After being second-best for two days, however, a Sunday counter-attack looks as though it will be beyond them.

src: 北韓稱「不可能」在未建立信任關係的情況下單方面解除核武
mt: North Korea says "im ⁇ " unilaterally disarming a nuclear weapon without establishing a trust relationship
ref: North Korea says 'no way' will disarm unilaterally without trust

src: 北韓的外交部長在禮拜六向聯合國表示，持續制裁正加深北韓對美國的不信任，而北韓也不可能在此等情況下單方面解除核武。
mt: North Korea's foreign minister told the United Nations on Saturday that continued sanctions have deepened North Korea's distrust of the United States, and it is unlikely that North Korea will unilaterally lift nuclear weapons under such circumstances.
ref: North Korea's foreign minister told the United Nations on Saturday continued sanctions were deepening its mistrust in the United States and there was no way the country would give up its nuclear weapons unilaterally under such circumstances.

src: 李容浩 (Ri Yong Ho) 在國際組織的年度大會中表示，北韓已在過去一年採取「重大的友好行動」，例如停止核彈和飛彈測試、解散核測試基地，以及承諾不進一步發展核武和核技術。
mt: Ri Yong Ho said at an international organization's annual meeting that North Korea has taken "major friendly actions" over the past year, such as stopping nuclear and missile testing, disbanding nuclear testing bases, and promising not to further develop nuclear weapons and nuclear technology.
ref: Ri Yong Ho told the world body's annual General Assembly that North Korea had taken "significant goodwill measures" in the past year, such as stopping nuclear and missiles tests, dismantling the nuclear test site, and pledging not to proliferate nuclear weapons and nuclear technology.

src: 「但是，我們沒有看到美國作出任何相應回應，」他說道。
mt: "But we don't see any response from the US," he says.
